## <a name="gx_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1567">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1567">gx_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1568">Pulsante Crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1568">Create button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1569">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1569">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_create(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1570">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1570">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1571">Questo servizio crea un pulsante come specificato e associa il pulsante al widget padre fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1571">This service creates a button as specified and associates the button with the supplied parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1572">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1572">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1573">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1573">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1574">**name** Nome logico del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1574">**name** Logical name of button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1575">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1575">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1576">**style** Stile del pulsante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1576">**style** Button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1577">**L'Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget, nonché stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1577">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1578">**button_id** ID del pulsante definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1578">**button_id** Application-defined ID of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1579">**size** Dimensioni del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1579">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1580">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1580">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1581">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione del pulsante riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1581">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1582">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1582">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1583">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1583">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1584">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1584">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1585">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1585">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1586">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1587">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1587">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1588">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1588">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BUTTON my_top_button;

/* Create a stop button. */
status = gx_button_create(&my_stop_button, "my stop button",
                            &my_parent_window,
                            GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE,
                            MY_STOP_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_button_deselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1603">gx_button_deselect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1603">gx_button_deselect</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1604">Pulsante Deseleziona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1604">Deselect button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1605">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1605">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_deselect(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_BOOL gen_event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1606">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1606">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1607">Questo servizio deseleziona il pulsante specificato e genera un evento segnale a seconda degli stili dei pulsanti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1607">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>


| <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1608">Stile pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1608">Button Style</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1609">Segnale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1609">Signal</span></span>                     |
|---------------------------|----------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1610">Nessuno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1610">None</span></span>                      | <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1611">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1611">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1612">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1612">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span></span>  | <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1613">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1613">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1614">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1614">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1615">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1615">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span></span>     |



### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1616">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1616">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1617">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1617">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1618">**gen_event** Se GX_TRUE, il pulsante genererà un evento GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT o GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET a seconda dello stile del pulsante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1618">**gen_event** If GX_TRUE, the button will generate a GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT, or GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET event depending on the button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1619">Se GX_FALSE, il pulsante non genererà alcun evento di livello superiore anche se normalmente lo genera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1619">If GX_FALSE, the button will not generate any higher level event even if it would normally do so.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1620">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1620">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1621">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pulsante Operazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1621">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button deselect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1622">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1622">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1623">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1623">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1624">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1624">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1625">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1625">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1626">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1626">Threads</span></span>

```C
/* Deselect button. */
status = gx_button_deselect(&my_stop_button, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully deselected. */
```

## <a name="gx_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1642">gx_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1642">gx_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1643">Pulsante Disegna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1643">Draw button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1644">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1644">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1645">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1645">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1646">Questo servizio disegna il pulsante specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1646">This service draws the specified button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1647">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget dei pulsanti personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1647">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1648">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1648">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1649">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1649">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1650">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1650">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1651">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1651">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1652">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1652">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1653">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1653">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1654">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1654">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom button draw function. */
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default button draw. */
    gx_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1669">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1669">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1670">Evento del pulsante Elabora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1670">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1671">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1671">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1683">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1683">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1735">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1735">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1736">Impostare il valore di alpha blend per canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1736">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1737">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1737">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1738">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1738">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1739">Questo servizio imposta il valore di alpha blend per l'area di disegno specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1739">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1740">I valori alfa dell'area di disegno possono variare da 0 (trasparente) a 255 (completamente opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1740">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1741">La fusione delle aree di disegno sovrapposte richiede il supporto del livello grafico hardware o del software tramite la creazione di un'area di disegno composita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1741">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1742">Il supporto hardware per la fusione di canvas viene abilitato richiamando l'API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() prima di impostare il valore alfa dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1742">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1743">Quando un'area di disegno è associata a un livello grafico hardware, la chiamata all'API gx_canvas_alpha_set() richiama direttamente i servizi di fusione del livello di grafica hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1743">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1744">Per usare il supporto software per la fusione di aree di disegno, l'applicazione deve creare un'area di disegno con stile GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE, in cui tutte le altre aree di disegno gestite vengono composte prima della visualizzazione finale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1744">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1745">Il supporto software per la fusione di canvas viene fornito solo quando si esegue con un driver di visualizzazione di 16 bpp o una profondità di colore superiore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1745">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1746">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1746">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1747">**canvas** Puntatore al blocco di controllo canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1747">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1748">**alfa** Valore di alpha blend, compreso tra 0 (trasparente) e 255 (opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1748">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1749">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1749">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di valori alpha-blend riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1751">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1751">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1752">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1752">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1753">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Area di disegno non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1753">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1754">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1754">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1755">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1755">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1756">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1756">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1766">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1766">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1767">Disegnare un arco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1767">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1768">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1769">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1770">Questo servizio disegna un arco circolare nell'area di disegno usando il pennello corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1770">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1771">L'arco circolare viene ritagliato nell'area di disegno non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1771">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1772">Questo servizio richiede GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT essere definito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1772">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1773">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1774">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1774">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1775">**Posizione ycenter** y del centro dell'arco circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1775">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1776">**r** Raggio dell'arco circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1776">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1777">**start_angle** Angolo iniziale dell'arco circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1777">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1778">**end_angle** Angolo finale dell'arco circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1778">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1779">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1779">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Disegno di arco riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1782">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1782">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1783">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1783">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1799">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1799">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1800">Spostare un blocco di pixel dell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1800">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1801">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1801">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1802">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1802">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1803">Questo servizio sposta un blocco di dati pixel dell'area di disegno nella direzione specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1803">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1804">Questo servizio viene usato internamente da GUIX per eseguire lo scorrimento rapido, ma può anche essere usato dal software dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1804">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1805">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1805">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1806">**blocco** Coordinate dell'area da spostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1806">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1807">**x_shift** Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1807">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1808">**y_shift** Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1808">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1809">**dirty** Se lo spostamento del blocco ha esito positivo, questa funzione restituisce la parte del rettangolo di origine ancora dirty per il chiamante in questo parametro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1809">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1810">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1810">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1811">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostamento del blocco riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1811">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1812">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Spostamento del blocco non riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1812">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1813">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1813">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1814">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1814">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1815">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1815">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1816">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1816">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1817">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1817">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1830">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1830">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1831">Disegnare un cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1831">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1832">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1832">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1833">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1833">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1834">Questo servizio disegna un cerchio nell'area di disegno usando il pennello corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1834">This service draws a circle on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1835">Il cerchio viene ritagliato nell'area di disegno non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1835">The circle is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1836">Questo servizio richiede GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT essere definito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1836">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1837">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1838">**xcenter** x-coord del centro del cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1838">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the circle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1839">**ycenter** y-coord del centro del cirlce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1839">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1840">**r** Raggio del cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1840">**r** Radius of the circle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1841">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1841">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1842">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Disegno cerchio riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1842">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1844">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Raggio cerchio non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1844">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1845">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1845">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1846">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1846">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle of radius 10 centered at (100, 100). */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circle has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1861">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1861">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1862">Creare un'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1862">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1863">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1864">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1865">Questo servizio crea l'area di disegno con le proprietà specificate e la memoria associata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1865">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1866">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1866">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1867">**canvas** Puntatore al blocco di controllo canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1867">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1868">**name** Nome logico per l'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1868">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1869">**display** Puntatore alla visualizzazione creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1869">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1870">**type** Tipo di area di disegnoI tipi di canvas includono:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1870">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1871">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** Area di disegno della memoria usata per il disegno fuori schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1871">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1872">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** Area di disegno che viene scaricata automaticamente nella visualizzazione attiva, come parte del processo di compilazione composito o come parte dell'operazione di attivazione/disattivazione del buffer per le architetture a area di disegno singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1872">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1873">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** Questo flag può essere usato per attivare e disattivare un'area di disegno, senza perdere il contenuto del disegno dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1873">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1874">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Riservato per un uso futuro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1874">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1875">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** Questo flag viene usato dall'applicazione quando si configura un sistema con più canvas che compose più canvas gestite nell'area di disegno composita e il composito è guidato al buffer dei frame hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1875">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1876">**width** Larghezza in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1876">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1877">**altezza** Altezza in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1877">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1878">**memory_area** Area di memoria per l'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1878">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1879">Questo valore può</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1879">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1880">**GX_NULL** al momento della creazione dell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1880">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1881">**e** successivamente inizializzati usando gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1881">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1882">**memory_size** Dimensione dell'area di memoria in byte oppure 0 se la memoria dell'area di disegno verrà definita dopo la creazione dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1882">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1883">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1883">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione canvas riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1887">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1887">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1888">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo canvas non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1888">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1889">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Tipo di area di disegno non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1889">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1891">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1892">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1897">gx_canvas_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1897">gx_canvas_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1898">Eliminare un'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1898">Delete canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1899">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1899">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1900">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1900">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1901">Questo servizio elimina l'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1901">This service deletes the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1902">L'area di disegno viene rimossa dall'elenco collegato interno di canvas gestito da GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1902">The canvas is removed from the internal linked list of canvas maintained by GUIX.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1908">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1908">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1909">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Area di disegno non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1909">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1911">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1911">Initialization and threads</span></span>


## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1920">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1920">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1921">Completare il disegno dell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1921">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1922">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1922">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1923">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1924">Questo servizio consente a GUIX di sapere che il disegno dell'applicazione nell'area di disegno specificata è completo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1924">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1925">L'applicazione può usare questo servizio per forzare il disegno immediato in un'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1925">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1926">In questo modo l'area di disegno viene scaricata nel buffer dei frame visibile e/o viene attivata un'operazione di attivazione/disattivazione dei bug, a seconda dell'architettura della memoria di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1926">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1927">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato solo dall'applicazione per chiudere una sequenza di disegno iniziata con gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1927">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1928">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1928">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1929">**canvas** Puntatore al blocco di controllo canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1929">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1930">**scaricamento** Se **_GX_TRUE_**, le modifiche all'area di disegno vengono scaricate nella visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1930">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1931">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1931">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1932">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Completamento del disegno riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1932">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1933">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1933">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1934">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1934">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1935">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1936">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1936">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1937">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```


### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1938">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1938">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1942">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1942">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1943">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1943">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1944">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1944">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1945">Avviare il disegno dell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1945">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1946">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1946">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1947">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1947">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1948">Questo servizio avvia il disegno nell'area di disegno specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1948">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1949">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente come parte dell'operazione di disegno posticipata eseguita automaticamente da GUIX quando è necessario aggiornare un'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1949">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1950">Tuttavia, all'applicazione è consentito ignorare l'algoritmo di disegno posticipato GUIX ed eseguire il disegno immediato e diretto su un'area di disegno chiamando prima gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, quindi chiamando le funzioni di disegno desiderate, quindi chiamando gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1950">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1951">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1952">**canvas** Puntatore al blocco di controllo canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1952">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1953">**who** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del widget del chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1953">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1954">Questo parametro viene usato per inizializzare i parametri di visualizzazione e ritaglio del disegno per le operazioni di disegno successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1954">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1955">**dirty_area** Area in cui disegnare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1955">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1956">Questo parametro viene passato dal chiamante per indicare l'area in cui il chiamante vuole ritagliare tutte le operazioni di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1956">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1957">Si tratta in genere dell'area contrassegnata in precedenza come dirty, ma il chiamante è libero di espandere o comprimere l'area di ritaglio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1957">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1958">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1958">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1959">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Avvio del disegno riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1959">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1960">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Supera il numero massimo di annidamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1960">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1961">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) Nessun viewport per il chiamante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1961">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1964">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Area di disegno non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1964">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

```C
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */

    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1974">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1974">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1975">Disegnare un'ellisse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1975">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1976">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1977">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1978">Questo servizio disegna un'ellisse nell'area di disegno usando il pennello corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1978">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1979">L'ellisse viene ritagliata nell'area di disegno non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1979">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1980">Questo servizio richiede GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT essere definito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1980">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1981">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1981">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1982">**xcenter** x-coord del centro dell'ellisse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1982">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1983">**ycenter** y-coord del centro dell'ellisse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1983">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1984">**a** Lunghezza dell'asse semi-principale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1984">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1985">**b** Lunghezza dell'asse semi-secondario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1985">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1986">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1986">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1987">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Disegno del cerchio riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1987">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1988">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1988">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1990">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1990">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1991">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1991">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1992">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1992">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-1993">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-1993">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2006">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2006">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2007">Associare l'area di disegno al livello grafico hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2007">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2008">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2008">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2009">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2009">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2010">Questo servizio associa un'area di disegno GUIX a un livello grafico hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2010">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2011">Questo servizio è necessario solo per i dispositivi hardware che supportano più livelli di grafica hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2011">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2012">L'associazione di un'area di disegno a un livello di grafica hardware comporta l'implementazione diretta delle API gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set() e gx_canvas_offset_set() dai servizi driver di visualizzazione hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2012">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2013">Se il driver di visualizzazione hardware non supporta più livelli di grafica, questo servizio avrà esito negativo GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2013">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2014">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2015">**Canvas** da implementare nell'hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2015">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2016">**livello** di grafica hardware del livello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2016">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2017">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2017">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2018">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Associazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2018">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2019">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Servizio livello di visualizzazione non è definito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2019">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2020">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Puntatori non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2020">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2021">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2021">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2022">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Area di disegno non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2022">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2023">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Non supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2023">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2024">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2024">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2025">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2025">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2026">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2026">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2027">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2027">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2030">gx_canvas_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2030">gx_canvas_hide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2031">Nascondere un'area di disegno, rendendola invisibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2031">Hide a canvas, making it invisible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2032">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2032">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2033">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2033">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2034">Questo servizio nasconde un canvas GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2034">This service hides a GUIX canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2035">Se l'area di disegno è stata associata a un livello di grafica hardware usando gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), questo servizio viene implementato usando il supporto hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2035">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), this service is implemented using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2036">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2036">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2037">**Canvas** da nascondere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2037">**canvas** canvas to be hidden</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2038">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2038">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2039">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Nascondi riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2039">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2040">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Area di disegno non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2040">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2041">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Puntatori non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2041">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2042">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2042">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2043">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2043">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2044">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2044">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2045">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2045">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make my_canvas invisible. */
status = gx_canvas_hide(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas has been hidden. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_line_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2055">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2055">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2056">Disegnare una linea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2056">Draw line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2057">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2057">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_line_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2058">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2058">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2059">Questo servizio disegna una linea nell'area di disegno usando il pennello corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2059">This service draws a line on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2060">La linea viene ritagliata nell'area di disegno non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2060">The line is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2061">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2061">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2062">**x_start** Posizione x iniziale della riga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2062">**x_start** Starting x-position of the line</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2087">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2087">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2088">Definire la memoria dell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2088">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2089">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2089">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2090">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2090">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2091">Questo servizio può essere usato per assegnare l'indirizzo di memoria canvas dopo la creazione dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2091">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2092">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2092">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2093">**canvas** Puntatore all'area di disegno creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2093">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2094">**memoria** Indirizzo di memoria canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2094">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2095">**memsize** Dimensioni in byte del blocco di memoria canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2095">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2096">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2096">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2097">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Assegnazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2097">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2098">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Blocco di controllo non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2098">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2100">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2100">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2101">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2102">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2102">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2106">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2106">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2107">Definire l'immagine del cursore del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2107">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2108">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2108">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2109">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2109">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2110">Questo servizio definisce le informazioni del mouse per l'area di disegno specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2110">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2111">Questo servizio richiede GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT essere definito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2111">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2112">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2112">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2113">**canvas** Puntatore al blocco di controllo canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2113">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2114">**info** Puntatore alle informazioni sul cursore del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2114">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2115">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2115">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2116">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2116">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2117">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set (Set di informazioni mouse riuscito)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2117">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2118">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2118">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2119">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2119">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2120">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2120">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2121">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2121">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2122">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2122">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2165">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2165">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2166">Assegnare l'offset di visualizzazione x,y dell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2166">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2167">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2167">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2168">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2168">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2169">Questo servizio assegna un offset di visualizzazione x,y per l'area di disegno specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2169">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2170">Controlla la posizione in cui l'area di disegno viene composita nel buffer dei frame visibile e viene spesso usata quando l'area di disegno è più piccola della visualizzazione fisica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2170">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2171">Se l'area di disegno è stata associata a un livello di grafica hardware usando l'API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), il servizio gx_canvas_offset_set viene implementato direttamente usando il supporto hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2171">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2172">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2173">**canvas** Puntatore al blocco di controllo canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2173">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2174">**Coordinata x** X dell'offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2174">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2175">**Coordinata** Y Y dell'offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2175">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2176">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2176">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Assegnazione dell'offset riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2180">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Area di disegno non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2180">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2181">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2181">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2182">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2182">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2183">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2183">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_offset_set(&my_canvas, 20, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```
