## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2193">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2193">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2194">Disegnare una torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2194">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2195">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2195">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2196">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2196">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2197">Questo servizio disegna una torta nell'area di disegno usando il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2197">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2198">La torta viene ritagliata nell'area di disegno non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2198">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2199">Questo servizio richiede la definizione dell'GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT di configurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2199">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2200">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2200">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2201">**xcenter** x-position del centro della torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2201">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2202">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2202">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2203">**r** Raggio della torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2203">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2204">**start_angle** Angolo iniziale della torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2204">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2205">**end_angle** Angolo finale della torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2205">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2206">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2206">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Disegno dell'arco riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2209">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2209">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2210">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2210">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2211">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2211">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2212">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2212">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2213">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2213">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a pie from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_pie_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pie has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2226">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2226">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2227">Pixel di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2227">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2228">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2228">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2229">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2229">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2230">Questo servizio disegna un pixel nell'area di disegno usando il colore della linea del pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2230">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2231">Se l'opzione GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT è definita, unire il pixel con , altrimenti disegnare il pixel come completamente opaco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2231">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2232">**punto** x, posizione y del pixel da disegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2232">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2233">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2233">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2234">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Disegno mappa pixel riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2234">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2235">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2235">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2236">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2236">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2237">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2237">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2238">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2238">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2239">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2239">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2244">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2244">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2245">Blend pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2245">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2246">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2246">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2247">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2247">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2248">Questo servizio combina una mappa pixel con lo sfondo dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2248">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2249">Il rapporto di fusione viene specificato dal chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2249">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2250">Il valore alfa può essere compreso tra 0 (completamente trasparente) e 255 (completamente opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2250">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2251">La mappa pixel può includere anche un canale alfa interno, combinato con il valore di fusione in ingresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2251">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2252">Questo servizio è supportato solo dai driver di visualizzazione in esecuzione a una profondità di colore di 16 bpp e versioni successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2252">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2253">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2253">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2254">**x_start** Posizione x iniziale della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2254">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2255">**y_end** Posizione y iniziale della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2255">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2256">**mappa pixel** Puntatore alla mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2256">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2257">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Disegno mappa pixel riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2261">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Non supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2261">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2293">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2293">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2294">Ottenere una mappa pixel dell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2294">Get canvas pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2295">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2295">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_get(GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2296">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2296">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2297">Questo servizio restituisce una struttura GX_PIXELMAP che punta ai dati dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2297">This service returns a GX_PIXELMAP structure pointing to the canvas data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2298">Il formato della mappa pixel è impostato sul formato di colore di visualizzazione corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2298">The pixelmap format is set to the current display color format.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2299">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2299">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2300">**mappa pixel** Mappa pixel restituita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2300">**pixelmap** Returned pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2301">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2301">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2311">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2311">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2312">Disegnare una mappa pixel ruotata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2312">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2313">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2313">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2314">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2315">Questo servizio ruota una mappa pixel in base all'angolo specificato ed esegue il rendering della mappa pixel direttamente nell'area di disegno durante l'esecuzione della rotazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2315">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2316">Questo servizio è diverso da gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate perché il rendering dell'output della rotazione viene eseguito direttamente nella memoria dell'area di disegno e la mappa pixel ruotata non viene restituita al chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2316">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2317">Il vantaggio di questo servizio rispetto gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate è che non è necessaria memoria aggiuntiva per contenere la mappa pixel ruotata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2317">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2318">Lo svantaggio è che il codice di rotazione deve essere eseguito ogni volta che viene disegnata la mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2318">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2319">La convalida del ritaglio e del viewport viene applicata durante il rendering della mappa pixel ruotata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2319">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2320">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2321">**x_position** Posizione x iniziale della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2321">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2322">**y_position** Posizione y iniziale della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2322">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2323">**pixelmap** Puntatore alla mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2323">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2324">**angolo** Angolo di rotazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2324">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2325">**rot_cx** X-coord del centro di rotazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2325">**rot_cx** X-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2326">Se questo valore è impostato su -1, il centro dell'immagine viene usato come centro di rotazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2326">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the rotation center.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2327">**rot_cy** Asse Y del centro di rotazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2327">**rot_cy** Y-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2328">Se questo valore è impostato su -1, il centro dell'immagine viene usato come centro di rotazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2328">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the center of rotation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2329">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2329">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2330">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Disegno mappa pixel riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2330">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2331">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2331">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2333">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2333">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2334">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2334">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2335">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2335">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2336">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2336">Example</span></span>

```C
/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction and draw in on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(10, 20, &my_pixelmap, 30,
    -1, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rotated pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been drawn. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2354">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2354">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>


- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2376">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2376">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2419">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2419">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2420">Disegnare testo ruotato intorno a un punto centrale (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2420">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2421">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2421">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2422">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2422">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2423">Questa API è stata deprecata a favore o gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2423">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2424">Anche se sono ancora supportate, le nuove applicazioni non devono usare questa API e devono usare gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2424">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2425">Questo servizio disegna testo nell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2425">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2426">Il testo viene disegnato ruotato intorno al punto centrale richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2426">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2427">Il tipo di carattere del contesto di disegno corrente e il colore della linea del contesto di disegno vengono usati per eseguire il rendering del testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2427">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2428">Questo servizio usa la funzione gx_utility_string_to_alphamap per eseguire il rendering della stringa di testo in una mappa pixel temporanea a 8bpp contenente solo valori alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2428">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2429">Il servizio ruota quindi la mappa alfa usando la funzione gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2429">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2430">Dopo il rendering della mappa alfa finale nell'area di disegno, questo servizio libera la mappa alfamap temporanea e la memoria associata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2430">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2431">Poiché è necessaria una mappa alfa temporanea per eseguire il rendering del testo ruotato, l'applicazione deve configurare il gx_system_memory_allocator tramite l'API gx_system_memory_allocator_set() chiamante prima di tentare di disegnare testo ruotato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2431">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2432">Questo servizio deve essere usato solo per eseguire il rendering del testo ruotato "una sola volta".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2432">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2433">Se la stessa stringa di testo verrà disegnata più volte in posizioni diverse o in angoli di rotazione diversi, è più efficiente usare la funzione di utilità gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() per creare la mappa alfanumerico una sola volta, quindi usare gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate più volte per ruotare ripetutamente la mappa alfa risultante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2433">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2434">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2435">**text** Stringa di testo da disegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2435">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2436">**xCenter** Positon centrale intorno al quale verrà ruotato il testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2436">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2437">**yCenter** Posizione centrale intorno alla quale verrà ruotato il testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2437">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2438">**angolo** Angolo di rotazione del testo desiderato, in gradi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2438">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2439">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2439">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2440">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Rendering del testo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2440">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2441">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2441">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2443">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memoria insufficiente o gx_system_memory_allocator non è stata assegnata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2443">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2444">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2444">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2445">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2446">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2446">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2447">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2447">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2455">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2455">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2456">Disegnare testo ruotato intorno a un punto centrale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2456">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2457">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2457">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2458">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2458">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2459">Questo servizio disegna testo nell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2459">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2460">Il testo viene disegnato ruotato intorno al punto centrale richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2460">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2461">Il tipo di carattere del contesto di disegno corrente e il colore della linea del contesto di disegno vengono usati per eseguire il rendering del testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2461">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2462">Questo servizio usa la funzione gx_utility_string_to_alphamap per eseguire il rendering della stringa di testo in una mappa pixel di 8bpp temporanea contenente solo valori alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2462">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2463">Il servizio ruota quindi la mappa alfa usando la funzione gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2463">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2464">Dopo il rendering della mappa alfa finale nell'area di disegno, questo servizio libera la mappa alfa temporanea e la memoria associata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2464">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2465">Poiché è necessaria una mappa alfa temporanea per eseguire il rendering del testo  ruotato, l'applicazione deve configurare il gx_system_memory_allocator dall'API gx_system_memory_allocator_set chiamante prima di tentare di disegnare testo ruotato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2465">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2466">Questo servizio deve essere usato solo per eseguire il rendering del testo ruotato "una sola volta".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2466">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2467">Se la stessa stringa di testo verrà disegnata più volte in posizioni diverse o angolazioni di rotazione diverse, è più efficiente usare la funzione di utilità gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() per creare la mappa alfa del testo una sola volta, quindi usare gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate più volte per ruotare ripetutamente la mappa alfa risultante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2467">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2468">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2468">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2469">**text** Stringa di testo da disegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2469">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2470">**xCenter** Positon centrale intorno al quale verrà ruotato il testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2470">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2471">**yCenter** Posizione centrale intorno alla quale verrà ruotato il testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2471">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2472">**angolo** Angolo di rotazione del testo desiderato, in gradi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2472">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2473">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2473">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2474">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Rendering del testo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2474">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2475">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2475">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2476">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2476">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2477">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Contesto di disegno non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2477">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2478">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memoria insufficiente o gx_system_memory_allocator non è stata assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2478">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2479">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2479">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2480">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2480">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2481">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2481">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2482">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2482">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2490">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2490">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2491">Maiusc canvas by x,y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2491">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2492">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2492">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2493">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2493">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2494">Questo servizio sposta l'offset dell'area di disegno specificato in base alla quantità specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2494">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2495">Ciò influisce sulla posizione in cui viene eseguito il rendering dell'area di disegno all'interno del buffer di frame visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2495">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2496">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2496">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2497">**canvas** Puntatore al blocco di controllo canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2497">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2498">**x** Pixel da spostare sull'asse X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2498">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2499">**y** Pixel da spostare sull'asse Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2499">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2500">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2500">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostamento dell'area di disegno riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2503">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2503">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2504">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Area di disegno non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2504">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2505">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2506">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2507">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift canvas “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_shift(&my_canvas, 10, 15);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas has been shifted by 10 pixels
    on the X axis and 15 on the Y axis. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2514">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2514">gx_canvas_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2515">Rendere visibile un'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2515">Make a canvas visible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2516">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2516">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2517">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2517">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2518">Questo servizio rende visibile un canvas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2518">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2519">Se l'area di disegno è stata associata in precedenza a un livello di grafica hardware usando l'API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), il servizio gx_canvas_show() viene implementato direttamente usando il supporto hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2519">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2520">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2520">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2521">**canvas** Puntatore al blocco di controllo canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2521">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2522">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2522">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2523">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Assegnazione dell'offset riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2523">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2526">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Area di disegno non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2526">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2527">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2527">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2528">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2528">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2529">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2529">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make this canvas visible. */
status = gx_canvas_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now visible */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2538">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2538">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2539">Disegnare testo (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2539">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2540">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2540">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2541">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2541">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2544">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2544">Parameters</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2604">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2604">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2605">Casella di controllo Crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2605">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2606">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2606">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2607">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2608">Questo servizio crea un widget casella di controllo con le proprietà specificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2608">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2609">GX_CHECKBOX deriva da GX_TEXT_BUTTON e tutti i gx_text_button possono essere usati con GX_CHECKBOX widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2609">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2610">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2611">**casella di controllo** Puntatore al nome del blocco di controllo casella di controllo Nome logico del widget della casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2611">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2612">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2612">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2613">**text_id** ID risorsa del testo della casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2613">**text_id** Resource ID of checkbox text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2614">**style** Stile della casella di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2614">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2615">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2615">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2616">**checkbox_id** Casella di controllo ID definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2616">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2617">**size** Dimensioni della casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2617">**size** Dimensions of checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2618">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2618">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2619">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione della casella di controllo riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2619">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2620">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2620">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2621">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2621">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2622">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2622">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2623">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2623">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2624">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2624">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2625">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2625">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2626">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2626">Example</span></span>

```C

    &my_parent,
    MY_CHECKBOX_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_CHECKBOX_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the checkbox “my_checkbox” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2631">gx_checkbox_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2631">gx_checkbox_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2632">Casella di controllo Disegna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2632">Draw checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2633">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2634">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2635">Questo servizio disegna la casella di controllo specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2635">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2636">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget delle caselle di controllo personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2636">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2637">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2637">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2638">**Casella di controllo** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2638">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2639">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2640">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2640">**None**</span></span>

## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2648">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2648">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2649">Evento della casella di controllo Elabora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2649">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2650">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2650">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2651">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2651">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2652">Questo servizio elabora un evento per la casella di controllo specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2652">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2653">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione degli eventi della casella di controllo personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2653">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2654">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2654">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2655">**Casella di controllo** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2655">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2656">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2656">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2657">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2657">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo evento casella di controllo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2661">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2661">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2662">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2662">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2663">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2663">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2664">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2664">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2669">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2669">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2670">Impostare la mappa pixel per la casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2670">Set pixelmap for checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2671">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2671">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2672">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2672">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2673">Questo servizio assegna le mappe pixel che devono essere visualizzate dalla casella di controllo specificata per ogni stato della casella di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2673">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified checkbox for each checkbox state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2674">Gli ID risorsa possono essere duplicati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2674">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2675">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2675">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2676">**casella di controllo** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2676">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2677">**unchecked_id** Mappa pixel usata per lo stato deselezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2677">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2678">**checked_id** Mappa pixel usata per lo stato selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2678">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2679">**unchecked_disabled_id** Mappa pixel usata per una casella di controllo disabilitata e deselezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2679">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2680">**checked_disabled_id** Mappa pixel usata per una casella di controllo disabilitata e selezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2680">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2681">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2681">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2682">**GX_SUCCESS** casella di controllo (0x00) Operazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2682">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2683">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2683">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2685">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2685">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2686">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2686">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2687">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2687">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(&my_checkbox,
    PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_ID, PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_DISABLED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_SIABLED_ID));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps are assigned to the checkbox “my_checkbox” */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2754">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2754">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2755">Impostare i parametri di animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2755">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2756">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2757">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2758">Questo servizio imposta i passaggi di animazione e il tempo di ritardo per un widget del misuratore circolare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2758">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2759">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2759">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2760">**misuratore** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2760">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2761">**passaggi** Passaggi totali per una rotazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2761">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2762">**ritardo** Tempo di ritardo per ogni passaggio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2762">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2763">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2763">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2764">**GX_SUCCESS** casella di controllo (0x00) Operazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2767">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2767">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2768">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2768">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2769">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2769">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2770">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2770">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2778">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2778">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2779">Disegnare lo sfondo del misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2779">Draw circular gauge background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2780">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2780">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2781">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2781">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2782">Questo servizio disegna lo sfondo del misuratore circolare specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2782">This service draws background of the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2783">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente dalla funzione gx_circular_gauge_draw, ma viene esposto all'applicazione per facilitare la scrittura di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2783">This service is normally called internally by the gx_circular_gauge_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2786">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2786">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2787">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2787">**None**</span></span>


## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2798">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2798">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2799">Creare un misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2799">Create circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2800">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2801">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2802">Questo servizio crea un widget misuratore circolare con le proprietà specificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2802">This service creates a circular gauge widget with the specified properties.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2803">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2804">**misuratore** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2804">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2805">**name** Nome logico del widget misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2805">**name** Logical name of circular gauge widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2806">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2806">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2807">**info** Puntatore alla struttura delle informazioni del misuratore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2807">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2808">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO struttura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2808">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2809">**background_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel di sfondo del misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2809">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2810">**style** Stile del misuratore circolare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2810">**style** Style of circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2811">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2811">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2812">**circular_gauge_id** ID definito dall'applicazione del misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2812">**circular_gauge_id** Application-defined ID of circular gauge</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2813">**xpos** Posizione della coordinata x del misuratore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2813">**xpos** Gauge x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2814">**ypos** Posizione della coordinata y del misuratore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2814">**ypos** Gauge y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2815">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2815">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2816">**GX_SUCCESS** casella di controllo (0x00) Operazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2819">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2819">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2820">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2820">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2821">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2821">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2822">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2822">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2823">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2823">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2834">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2835">Questo servizio disegna il misuratore circolare specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2835">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2836">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per widget del misuratore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2836">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2837">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2838">**misuratore** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2838">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2839">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2839">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2840">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2840">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2841">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2841">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2842">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2842">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2843">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2843">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom circular gauge draw function. */
VOID custom_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge)
{
    /* Call default circular gauge draw. */
    gx_circular_gauge_draw(gauge);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2851">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2851">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2852">Elaborare l'evento del misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2852">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2853">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2853">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2854">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2854">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2855">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il misuratore circolare specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2855">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2856">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2856">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2857">**misuratore** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del misuratore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2857">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2858">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2858">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2859">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2859">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo evento misuratore riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2863">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2863">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2864">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2864">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2865">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2865">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2900">gx_context_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2900">gx_context_brush_define</span></span>

```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2903">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2904">Questo servizio definisce il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2904">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>
