- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2909">**fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2909">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2910">**L'appendice B** contiene ID risorsa a colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2910">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2911">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa a colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2911">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2912">**style** Stile del pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2912">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2913">**L'appendice D** descrive gli stili del pennello supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2913">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2914">Gli stili del pennello possono essere combinati in un'unica variabile usando l'operazione OR bit per bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2914">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2919">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2919">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2920">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2920">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2938">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2938">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2939">Ottiene il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2939">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2940">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2940">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2941">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2941">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2942">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore al pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2942">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2943">Se non è presente alcun contesto di disegno attivo, il servizio ha esito negativo e restituisce un puntatore NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2943">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2944">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2944">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2945">**return_brush** Puntatore alla destinazione per il pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2945">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2946">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recupero del pennello di contesto completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2950">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2951">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2951">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2952">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2952">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2967">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2967">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2968">Impostare il modello del pennello del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2968">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2969">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2969">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2970">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2970">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2971">Questo servizio imposta il modello del pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2971">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2972">Il modello di pennello viene usato per disegnare linee verticali orizzontali e tratteggiate tratteggiate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2972">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2973">Quando viene chiamato gx_canvas_line_draw() e la linea è orizzontale o verticale e il campo brush.gx_brush_line_pattern è diverso da zero, viene disegnata una linea del motivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2973">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2974">La maschera del motivo del pennello è attualmente supportata solo per le linee orizzontali e verticali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2974">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2975">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2976">**modello** Modello da usare per il pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2976">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2977">Si tratta di un semplice modello di on/off esadecimale da usare per il disegno della linea del modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2977">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2978">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2978">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2979">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di pennelli di contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2979">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2980">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Contesto di disegno non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2980">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2981">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2981">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2982">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2982">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2983">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2983">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2997">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2997">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2998">Imposta il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2998">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-2999">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-2999">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3000">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3000">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3001">Questo servizio imposta il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3001">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3002">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3003">**pennello** Puntatore al pennello da usare per il contesto corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3003">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3004">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3004">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3005">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di pennelli di contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3005">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3006">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3006">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3008">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3008">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3009">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3009">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3010">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3010">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3025">gx_context_brush_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3025">gx_context_brush_style_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3026">Impostare lo stile del pennello del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3026">Set brush style of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3027">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3027">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_style_set(UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3028">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3028">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3030">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3030">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3035">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3035">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_width_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3053">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3053">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3054">Impostare la larghezza del pennello del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3054">Set brush width of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3055">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3055">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_width_set(UINT width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3056">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3056">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3057">Questo servizio imposta la larghezza del pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3057">This service sets the width of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3058">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3058">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3059">**width** Larghezza del pennello in pixel del contesto corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3059">**width** Brush width in pixels of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3060">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3060">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostazione della larghezza del pennello del contesto riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush width set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3062">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3062">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3063">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3063">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3064">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3064">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3065">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3065">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush width of the current context to 10 pixels. */
status = gx_context_brush_width_set(10); /*

If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush width of the current context has been set to 10. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3080">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3080">gx_context_color_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3081">Ottiene il valore del colore associato all'ID colore nel contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3081">Get color value associated with color ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3082">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3082">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_color_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3083">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3083">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3084">Questo servizio recupera il valore del colore associato all'ID colore indicato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3084">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3085">Il valore del colore viene restituito nel formato di colore della visualizzazione del contesto attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3085">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3086">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato solo dall'interno di un'operazione di disegno attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3086">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3087">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3087">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3088">**color_id** ID risorsa del colore richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3088">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3089">**return_color** Indirizzo della variabile per contenere il valore del colore restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3089">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3090">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3090">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3092">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3092">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3093">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3093">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3095">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3095">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3096">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3096">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3097">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3097">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR color_value;

/* Get the color vaue. */
status = gx_context_color_get(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID, &color_value);
```

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3112">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3112">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3113">Imposta il colore di riempimento del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3113">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3114">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3114">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3115">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3115">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3116">Questo servizio imposta il colore di riempimento del pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3116">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3117">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3117">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3118">**fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del contesto corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3118">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3119">**L'appendice B** contiene gli ID risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3119">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3120">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3120">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3121">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori di riempimento contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3123">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3123">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3124">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3124">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3125">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3125">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3126">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3126">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3127">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3127">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3142">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3142">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3143">Ottiene il tipo di carattere associato all'ID carattere nel contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3143">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3144">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3145">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3146">Questo servizio recupera il puntatore del tipo di carattere associato all'ID del tipo di carattere indicato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3146">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3147">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato solo dall'interno di un'operazione di disegno attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3147">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3148">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3148">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3149">**font_id** ID risorsa del tipo di carattere richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3149">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3150">**return_font** Indirizzo della variabile per contenere il puntatore del tipo di carattere restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3150">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3151">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3151">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Il tipo di carattere è stato recuperato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3155">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3155">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3156">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3156">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3157">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3157">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3158">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3158">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3173">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3173">gx_context_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3174">Imposta il tipo di carattere del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3174">Set font of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3175">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3175">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3176">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3176">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3177">Questo servizio imposta il tipo di carattere nel pennello attivo del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3177">This service sets the font in the active brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3178">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3178">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3179">**font_id** ID risorsa del tipo di carattere del contesto corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3179">**font_id** Font resource ID of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3180">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3180">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3181">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di caratteri di contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3181">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context font set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3182">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3182">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3183">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3183">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3184">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3184">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3185">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3185">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3186">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3186">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the font of the current context to MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_context_font_set(MY_FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3201">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3201">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3202">Impostare il colore della linea del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3202">Set line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3203">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3204">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3205">Questo servizio imposta il colore della linea del pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3205">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3206">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3206">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3207">**line_color_id** Colore della linea del contesto corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3207">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3208">**L'appendice B** contiene gli ID risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3208">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3209">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3209">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3210">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3210">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3211">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori della linea di contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3211">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3212">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3212">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3213">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3213">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3214">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3214">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3215">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3215">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3216">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3216">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the line color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3231">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3231">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3232">Ottiene la mappa pixel associata all'ID mappa pixel nel contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3232">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3233">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3234">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3235">Questo servizio recupera il puntatore della mappa pixel associato all'ID mappa pixel indicato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3235">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3236">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3237">**pixelmap_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3237">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3238">**return_map** Indirizzo della variabile per contenere l'indirizzo della mappa pixel restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3238">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3239">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3239">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3240">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperato correttamente la mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3240">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3241">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3241">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3242">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3242">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3243">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore mappa pixel non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3243">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3262">Imposta la mappa pixel del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3262">Set pixelmap of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3263">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3264">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3265">Questo servizio assegna la mappa pixel del pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3265">This service assigns the pixelmap of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3266">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3266">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3267">**pixelmap_id** ID risorsa pixelmap da usare per il contesto corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3267">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID to use for current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3268">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3269">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di pixelmap di contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3269">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3270">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3270">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3271">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Contesto non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3271">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3272">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3272">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3273">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3273">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3274">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3274">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap of the current context to MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_set(MY_PIXELMAP_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3289">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3289">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3290">Definire il pennello non elaborato del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3290">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3291">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3292">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3293">Questo servizio definisce il pennello non elaborato del contesto dello schermo corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3293">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3294">Le definizioni non elaborati vengono usate quando i valori di colore ARGB a 32 bit devono essere passati al pennello anziché agli ID colore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3294">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3295">Le definizioni dei colori non elaborati sono utili quando il colore desiderato non è presente nella tabella dei colori di sistema corrente o quando il valore del colore RGB viene calcolato in fase di esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3295">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3296">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3296">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3297">**line_color** Colore della linea in formato colore ARGB non elaborato a 32 bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3297">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3298">**L'appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3298">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3299">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3299">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3300">**fill_color** Colore di riempimento in formato arGB non elaborato a 32 bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3300">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3301">**L'appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3301">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3302">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3302">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3303">**style** Stile del pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3303">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3304">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3304">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3305">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3305">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3306">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definizione del pennello non elaborato del contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3306">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3307">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3307">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3308">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3308">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3309">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3309">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3310">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3310">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3325">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3325">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3326">Imposta il colore di riempimento non elaborato del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3326">Set raw fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3327">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3327">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3328">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3328">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3329">Questo servizio imposta il colore di riempimento non elaborato del contesto dello schermo corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3329">This service sets the raw fill color of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3330">Il line_color è un valore di colore non elaborato in formato ARGB a 32 bit, anziché un valore ID colore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3330">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3331">Le definizioni dei colori non elaborati sono utili quando il colore desiderato non è presente nella tabella dei colori di sistema corrente o quando il valore del colore RGB viene calcolato in fase di esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3331">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3332">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3332">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3333">**line_color** Colore della linea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3333">**line_color** Color of line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3334">**L'appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3334">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3335">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3335">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3336">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3336">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3337">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori di riempimento non elaborato del contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3337">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw fill color set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_raw_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3356">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3356">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3357">Imposta il colore della linea non elaborata del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3357">Set raw line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3358">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3358">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3359">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3359">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3360">Questo servizio imposta il colore della linea del pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3360">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3361">Il line_color è un valore di colore non elaborato in formato ARGB a 32 bit, anziché un valore ID colore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3361">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3362">Le definizioni dei colori non elaborati sono utili quando il colore desiderato non è presente nella tabella dei colori di sistema corrente o quando il valore del colore RGB viene calcolato in fase di esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3362">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3363">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3363">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3364">**line_color** Colore del valore della linea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3364">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3365">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3365">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3366">Si noti che anche l'applicazione può aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3366">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3367">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3367">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3368">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori della linea non elaborata di contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3368">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3369">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3369">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3370">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3370">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3386">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3386">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3388">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get(GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3389">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3390">Questa API deprecata restituisce la stringa associata all'ID stringa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3390">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3391">Le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_context_string_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3391">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3392">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3393">**string_id** ID stringa generato dall'applicazione GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3393">**string_id** String ID generated by the GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3394">**return_string** Indirizzo della variabile per restituire il puntatore di stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3394">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3395">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori della linea non elaborata del contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3397">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3397">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3398">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3398">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3399">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3399">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3400">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3400">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
status = gx_context_string_get(GX_ID_ERROR, &text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string pointer has been returned. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3405">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3405">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3406">Recupera la stringa associata all'ID stringa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3406">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3407">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3408">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3409">Questo servizio restituisce la stringa associata a un ID stringa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3409">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3410">Questo servizio può essere richiamato solo quando è presente un contesto di disegno attivo, ad esempio dall'interno della funzione di disegno di un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3410">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3411">Questo servizio identifica l'area di disegno attiva e visualizza e recupera la stringa dall'istanza di visualizzazione individuata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3411">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3412">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3412">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3413">**string_id** ID stringa usato per identificare la stringa, come generato da GUIX Studio nel file di intestazione delle risorse dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3413">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3414">**return_string** Indirizzo della GX_STRING in cui verranno restituiti il puntatore di stringa e la lunghezza della stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3414">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3415">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3415">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3416">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori della linea non elaborata di contesto riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3416">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3417">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3417">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3419">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Nessun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3419">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3420">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3420">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3422">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3422">Example</span></span>


```C

/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */

string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```
