## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3437">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3437">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3438">Assegnare la lingua attiva di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3438">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3439">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3439">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3440">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3440">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3441">Questo servizio assegna la lingua attualmente attiva per la visualizzazione indicata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3441">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3442">L'indice della lingua corrisponde alle lingue definite nella tabella della lingua di visualizzazione e non è un identificatore di lingua ANSI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3442">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3443">Diversi display in un sistema a più schermi possono eseguire lingue attive diverse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3443">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3444">Prima di usare questa API, è necessario assegnare la tabella della lingua di visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3444">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3445">Quando una visualizzazione viene inizializzata gx_studio_display_configure, la tabella della lingua viene installata automaticamente e l'applicazione passa l'indice della lingua attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3445">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3446">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3446">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3447">**visualizzazione** Puntatore per visualizzare il blocco di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3447">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3448">**language** Indice della lingua attiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3448">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3449">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3449">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3450">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Assegnazione della lingua riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3450">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore di visualizzazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3452">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Indice di lingua non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3452">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3453">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3453">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3454">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3454">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3455">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3455">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3456">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3456">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3457">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3457">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3458">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3458">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3459">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3459">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3460">Rias assegnare un valore di colore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3460">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3461">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3461">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3462">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3462">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3463">Questo servizio assegna nuovamente il valore del colore associato all'ID colore specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3463">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3464">Può essere usato per modificare la tabella dei colori di una visualizzazione senza fornire una tabella dei colori completamente nuova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3464">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3465">Il valore del colore specificato deve essere nel formato nativo supportato dalla visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3465">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3466">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3466">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3467">**display** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3467">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3468">**color_id** ID colore da riassegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3468">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3469">**new_color** Valore del colore da assegnare a color_id slot</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3469">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3470">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Riassegnazione colori riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3472">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID colore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3472">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3474">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Visualizzazione non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3474">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3475">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3476">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3477">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3478">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3478">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3479">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3479">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3480">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3480">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3481">Assegnare la tabella dei colori di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3481">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3482">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3482">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3483">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3483">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3484">Questo servizio riassegnerà la tabella dei colori che verrà usata dalla visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3484">This service re-assigns the color table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3485">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato dalla funzione di configurazione della visualizzazione generata da GUIX Studio, ma può essere chiamato anche dal software dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3485">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3486">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3486">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3487">**visualizzazione** Puntatore per visualizzare il blocco di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3487">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3488">**color_table** Matrice di valori di colore in formato nativo di visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3488">**color_table** Array of color values in display native format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3489">**color_count** Indica il numero di voci nella tabella dei colori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3489">**color_count** Indicates number of entries in color table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3490">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3490">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3491">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di tabelle colori riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3491">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3492">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3492">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3494">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Visualizzazione non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3494">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3495">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3495">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3496">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3496">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3497">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3497">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

/* Change the color table */
status = gx_display_color_table_set(&my_display, default_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color table has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3498">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3498">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3499">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3499">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3500">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3500">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3501">Creare una visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3501">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3502">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3502">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3503">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3504">Questo servizio crea una visualizzazione e chiama la funzione di configurazione del driver di visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3504">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3505">GUIX accetta questa visualizzazione e la aggiunge al relativo elenco interno di schermi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3505">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3506">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3506">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3507">**visualizzazione** Puntatore per visualizzare il blocco di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3507">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3508">**name** Nome della visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3508">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3509">**display_driver_setup** Puntatore alla funzione di configurazione del driver di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3509">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3510">**optional_driver_info** Puntatore alle informazioni facoltative sul driver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3510">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3511">**color_format** Formato dei colori, come definito **nell'appendice C**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3511">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3512">**width** Numero di pixel sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3512">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3513">**height** Numero di pixel sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3513">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3514">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3514">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3515">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione visualizzazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3515">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3516">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Non è possibile configurare la visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3516">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3519">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo di visualizzazione non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3519">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3520">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3521">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3521">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3522">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3522">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3523">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3523">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3524">gx_display_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3524">gx_display_delete</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3525">gx_display_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3525">gx_display_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3526">Eliminazione della visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3526">Destroy display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3527">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3527">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_delete(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    VOID (*display_driver_cleanup)(GX_DISPLAY *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3528">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3528">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3529">Questo servizio arresta una visualizzazione e pulisce le risorse allocate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3529">This service shuts down a display, and cleans up allocated resources.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3530">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3530">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3531">**display** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3531">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3532">**display_driver_cleanup** Puntatore alla funzione di pulizia del driver di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3532">**display_driver_cleanup** Pointer to display driver cleanup function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3550">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3550">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3551">Assegnare la tabella dei caratteri di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3551">Assign display font table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3552">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_font_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_FONT **font_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3553">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3554">Questo servizio riassegnerà la tabella dei tipi di carattere che verrà usata dalla visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3554">This service re-assigns the font table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3555">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato dalla funzione di configurazione della visualizzazione generata da GUIX Studio, ma può essere chiamato anche dal software dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3555">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3556">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3556">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3557">**visualizzazione** Puntatore per visualizzare il blocco di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3557">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3558">**font_table** Matrice di GX_FONT puntatori.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3558">**font_table** Array of GX_FONT pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3559">**table_size** Numero di tipi di carattere nella tabella</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3559">**table_size** Number of fonts in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3560">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3560">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3561">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di tabelle dei tipi di carattere riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3561">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3562">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3562">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3563">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3563">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3564">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3564">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3565">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3565">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3566">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3566">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = { … };

/* Assign font table */
status = gx_display_font_table_set(&my_display, font_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font table has been reassigned. */
```

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE *language_count,
    UINT *string_table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3574">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3575">Questo servizio recupera la tabella delle lingue dalla visualizzazione indicata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3575">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3576">Questo servizio può essere usato da un'applicazione per modificare la tabella delle lingue di visualizzazione, in fase di esecuzione, usando stringhe definite in modo dinamico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3576">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3577">Questa API è deprecata e supportata solo per le applicazioni che usano la tabella del linguaggio obsoleto, ovvero il file di risorse generato da Studio viene generato per la versione della libreria precedente alla versione 5.6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3577">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3578">Le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3578">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3581">**tabella** Indirizzo per la ricezione del puntatore di tabella</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3581">**table** Address to receive table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3582">**language_count** Indirizzo per la ricezione del numero di lingue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3582">**language_count** Address to receive language count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3583">**string_table_size** Indirizzo per la ricezione delle dimensioni della tabella delle stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3583">**string_table_size** Address to receive string table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3584">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3584">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3585">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di tabelle dei tipi di carattere completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3585">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3586">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3586">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3587">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3587">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3620">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3620">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3621">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3621">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3622">Questo servizio è deprecato e le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_language_table_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3622">This service is deprecated and new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3623">Questo servizio è supportato solo per la compatibilità con i file di risorse generati da Studio che hanno come destinazione versioni della libreria precedenti alla versione 5.6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3623">This service is supported only for compatibility with Studio generated resources files targeting library versions prior to version 5.6.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_theme_install"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3779">gx_display_theme_install</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3779">gx_display_theme_install</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3780">Installare i temi nella visualizzazione specificata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3780">Install themes to the specified display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3781">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3781">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_theme_install(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_THEME *theme_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3782">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3782">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3783">Questo servizio installa i temi nella visualizzazione specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3783">This service install themes to the specified display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3784">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato dalla funzione di configurazione della visualizzazione generata da Studio, ma può anche essere chiamato dal software dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3784">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3785">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3785">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3786">**display** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3786">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3787">**theme_table** Tabella dei temi da installare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3787">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3788">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3788">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Tabella dei temi installata correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore di tabella del tema non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3792">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Visualizzazione non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3792">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3793">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3794">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3795">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3795">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3819">gx_drop_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3819">gx_drop_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3820">Creare un elenco a discesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3820">Create a drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3821">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3821">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_create(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list, 
    GX_CONST
    GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    INT open_height,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT drop_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3822">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3823">Questo servizio crea un elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3823">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3824">Un elenco a discesa è una combinazione del widget elenco a discesa e di un elenco verticale popup visualizzato all'apertura dell'elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3824">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3825">L'elenco verticale popup viene creato automaticamente quando viene creato il widget elenco a discesa e visualizzato o nascosto rispettivamente quando il widget elenco a discesa viene aperto o chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3825">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3826">Il widget elenco a discesa supporta due mappe pixel associate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3826">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3827">Il primo, descritto come "Sfondo elenco" nella visualizzazione delle proprietà di Studio, è la mappa pixel dello sfondo facoltativa che viene visualizzata come sfondo dell'elenco verticale visualizzato quando viene aperto il widget elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3827">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3828">La seconda mappa pixel, descritta come "Immagine di sfondo" nella visualizzazione delle proprietà di Studio, è un'immagine facoltativa visualizzata come sfondo dell'elenco a discesa stesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3828">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3829">Un widget elenco a discesa può avere (ma non è necessario) un widget figlio usato per aprire e chiudere l'elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3829">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3830">Si tratta in genere di un widget icona o pulsante, ma anche un widget personalizzato può essere usato come interruttore di apertura/chiusura per l'elenco a discesa padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3830">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3831">L'impostazione chiave che fa funzionare questo widget figlio nell'elenco a discesa è che questo widget figlio deve avere l'ID del widget predefinito ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3831">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3832">Per definire un widget figlio che aprirà e chiuderà l'elenco a discesa, primaaggiungi e il widget figlio all'elenco a discesa e posiziona questo elemento figlio all'interno dell'elenco a discesa come desiderato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3832">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![Screenshot dell'elenco a discesa.](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3834">Usare quindi la visualizzazione delle proprietà di Studio per assegnare a questo widget figlio il valore ID ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, ovvero un valore ID definito internamente riconosciuto dall'elenco a discesa padre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3834">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Screenshot della visualizzazione delle proprietà di Studio.](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3839">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3839">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3840">**total_rows** Numero totale di righe nell'elenco a discesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3840">**total_rows** Total number of rows in the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3841">**open_height** Altezza dell'elenco verticale visualizzato all'apertura dell'elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3841">**open_height** The height of the vertical list displayed when the drop list is opened.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3842">**callback** Funzione chiamata dall'elenco verticale quando si scorre l'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3842">**callback** Function called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3843">Per altre informazioni, vedere GX_VERTICAL_LIST documentazione di .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3843">Refer to the documentation of GX_VERTICAL_LIST for more information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3844">**style** Stile del bordo dell'elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3844">**style** The drop-down list border style.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3845">**drop_list_id** ID definito dall'applicazione dell'elenco a discesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3845">**drop_list_id** Application-defined ID of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3846">**size** Dimensioni dell'elenco a discesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3846">**size** Dimensions of the drop list</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione dell'elenco a discesa riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list create</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3851">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3851">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3854">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3854">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST my_drop_list;
VOID list_row_create(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *list,
                     GX_WIDGET *row, INT index);
{
    …
}

GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 80, 40);

status = gx_drop_list_create(&my_drop_list,
    "my drop list", GX_NULL,
    10, 100, list_row_create,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RECESSED | GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
    ID_DROP_LIST, &size)

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, the drop list was successfully created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3863">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_DROP_LIST *list, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3864">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3865">Questo servizio elabora un evento per l'elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3865">This service processes an event for the drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3866">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3866">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3867">**drop_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco a discesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3867">**drop_list** Drop list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3868">**evento** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3868">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3869">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3869">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Elaborazione dell'evento elenco a discesa completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3871">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3871">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3872">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3872">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3873">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3873">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3874">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3874">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3875">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3875">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3902">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3902">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3903">Assegnare un'immagine di sfondo all'elenco a discesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3903">Assign a background image to the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3904">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3904">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3905">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3905">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3906">Assegnare un'immagine di sfondo all'elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3906">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3907">Questa mappa pixel viene usata come sfondo per il widget dell'elenco a discesa e non per l'elenco verticale popup visualizzato all'apertura dell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3907">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3908">Per assegnare una mappa pixel al popup dell'elenco a discesa, è necessario prima chiamare gx_drop_list_popup_get per recuperare un puntatore all'elenco popup e quindi usare gx_window_wallpaper_set() per assegnare una mappa pixel a questo elenco popup.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3908">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3909">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3909">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3910">**drop_list** Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'elenco a discesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3910">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3911">**id** ID risorsa per la mappa pixlemap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3911">**id** Resource ID to the pixlemap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3912">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3912">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3913">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di pixelmap elenco a discesa riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3913">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3915">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3915">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3916">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID pixlemap non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3916">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid pixlemap ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3917">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3917">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3918">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3918">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3919">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3919">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST mylist;

/* create the drop list here */

/* Assign a pixelmap id, which will turn on the list button */
status = gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set(&mylist,
    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_DROP_LIST_BACKGROND);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_popup_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3926">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3926">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3927">Recuperare il puntatore all'elenco verticale popup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3927">Retrieve pointer to popup vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3928">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3928">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_popup_get(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST **return_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3929">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3929">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3930">Un widget elenco a discesa è costituito dal widget dell'elenco a discesa stesso e da un elenco verticale popup visualizzato all'apertura del widget elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3930">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3931">Questo servizio recupera un puntatore al componente elenco verticale dell'elenco a discesa, consentendo all'applicazione di richiamare i servizi API direttamente in questo elenco verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3931">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3932">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3932">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3933">**drop_list** Puntatore al blocco di controllo elenco a discesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3933">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3934">**return_list** Puntatore all'elenco verticale archiviato nell'elenco a discesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3934">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3935">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3935">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Elenco verticale popup recuperato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved popup vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3938">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3939">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3940">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3940">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST drop_list;
GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list;

/* Retrieve the popup list of “drop_list”. */
status = gx_drop_list_popup_get(&drop_list, &vertical_list)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the popup list was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3946">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3946">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position</span></span>
### <a name="position-children-for-the-generic-scroll-wheel"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3947">Posizionare gli elementi figlio per la rotellina di scorrimento generica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3947">Position children for the generic scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3948">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3948">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position(
    GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3949">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3949">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3950">Questa funzione posiziona gli elementi figlio per la rotellina di scorrimento generica in base all'altezza della riga della rotellina di scorrimento generica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3950">This function positions the children for the generic scroll wheel according to the generic scroll wheel row height.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3951">Questa funzione viene chiamata per impostazione predefinita quando viene visualizzata la rotellina di scorrimento generica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3951">This function is called by default when the generic scroll wheel is shown.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3952">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3952">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3953">**wheel** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3953">**wheel** Pointer to the generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3954">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3954">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3955">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correttamente posizionato gli elementi figlio per la rotellina di scorrimento generica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3955">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully positioned the children for the generic scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3956">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3956">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3957">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3957">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3958">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3958">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3959">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3959">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3960">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3960">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3961">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3961">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the generic scroll wheel. */
status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position (&wheel);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the generic scroll wheel are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3974">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3974">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3975">Creare una rotellina di scorrimento generica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3975">Create generic scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3976">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3977">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3978">Questo servizio crea un widget della rotellina di scorrimento generico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3978">This service creates a generic scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3979">Una rotellina di scorrimento generica è un tipo di widget della rotellina di scorrimento costituito da widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3979">A generic scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is consisted of child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3980">Sono disponibili anche altri tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3980">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3981">Per altre informazioni sulla gerarchia dei widget della rotellina di scorrimento, sui tipi di widget e sulla derivazione dei widget, vedere l'API gx_scroll_wheel_create().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3981">For more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation, see the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3982">GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL deriva da GX_SCROLL_WHEEL e supporta tutti gx_scroll_wheel servizi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3982">GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3983">Tutti i tipi di rotellina di scorrimento generano GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT eventi padre quando la rotellina di scorrimento viene scorre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3983">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3984">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3984">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3985">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3985">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3986">**name** Nome logico del widget della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3986">**name** Logical name of generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3987">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3987">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-3988">**total_rows** Totale righe della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-3988">**total_rows** Total rows of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4007">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4007">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Define visible rows.  */
#define VISIBLE_ROWS 5

/* Define row memory.  */
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT row_memory[VISIBLE_ROWS + 1];

/* Define callback function.  */
VOID row_create(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_WIDGET *widget, INT index)
{
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *row = (GX_PROMPT *)widget;
GX_BOOL result;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

    gx_widget_created_test(widget, &result);

    if(!result)
    {
        gx_numeric_prompt_create(row, "", wheel, 0, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);
    }

    gx_numeric_prompt_value_set(row, index);
}

/* Create "generic_wheel” with 20 rows.  */
status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create(&generic_wheel, “generic_wheel”, &parent, 20, row_create,
                                       GX_STYLE_ENABLED, WHEEL_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the generic scroll wheel "generic_wheel”" has been created. */

/* Create children for generic scroll wheel.  */
for(index = 0; index <= VISIBLE_ROWS; index++)
{
    row_create(generic_wheel, (GX_WIDGET *)&row_memory[index], index);
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4055">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4055">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4057">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4057">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4058">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4058">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4060">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4060">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic generic scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                                               GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:

            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

        default:

            /* Pass all other events to the default generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
            status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4084">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4084">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_generic_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4102">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4102">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_generic_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4105">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4106">Questo servizio assegna o modifica il numero totale di righe della rotellina di scorrimento generiche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4106">This service assigns or changes the total number of generic scroll wheel rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4107">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4107">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4108">**wheel** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4108">**wheel** Pointer to generic generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4109">**total_rows** Numero totale di righe wheel da presentare all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4109">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4110">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4110">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4111">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente la riga del totale della rotellina di scorrimento generica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4111">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set generic scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4112">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4112">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4115">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Numero di righe totali non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4115">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid number of total rows</span></span>

```C
display 20 total rows */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4131">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4131">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4132">Posizionare gli elementi figlio per l'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4132">Position children for the horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4133">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4133">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_children_position(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4134">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4134">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4135">Questa funzione posiziona gli elementi figlio per l'elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4135">This function positions the children for the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4136">Questa funzione viene chiamata automaticamente quando l'elenco riceve l'evento GX_EVENT_SHOW, ma deve essere chiamato direttamente se l'elenco viene modificato dopo che è stato reso visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4136">This function is called automatically when the list receives the GX_EVENT_SHOW event, but should be called directly if the list is modified after it has been made visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4137">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4137">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4138">**horizontal_list** Puntatore al blocco di controllo elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4138">**horizontal_list** Pointer to the horizontal list control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4139">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4139">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correttamente sono stati posizionati gli elementi figlio per l'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful positioned the children for the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4141">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4141">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4142">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4142">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4143">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4143">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4144">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4144">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4145">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4145">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the horizontal list */
status = gx_horizontal_list_children_position (&horizontal_list);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the horizontal list are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4154">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4154">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4155">Creare un elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4155">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4156">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4156">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4157">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4157">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4158">Questo servizio crea un elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4158">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4159">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4159">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4160">**horizontal_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4160">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4161">**name** Nome dell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4161">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4162">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4162">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4163">**total_columns** Numero totale di lune nell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4163">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4164">**callback** Si tratta di un puntatore a una funzione di callback fornita dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4164">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4165">La funzione di callback viene richiamata quando viene eseguito lo scorrimento dell'elenco orizzontale per creare gli elementi dell'elenco appena visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4165">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4166">In questo modo l'elenco orizzontale può visualizzare qualsiasi tipo di widget definito dall'utente come elementi dell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4166">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4167">**style** Stile del widget della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4167">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4168">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4168">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4169">**horizontal_list_id** ID definito dall'applicazione dell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4169">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4170">**size** Dimensioni dell'elenco ortodirezionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4170">**size** Dimensions of the horitzonal list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4171">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4171">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4172">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione dell'elenco orizzontale completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4172">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4173">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4173">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4174">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4174">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4175">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4175">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4176">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4176">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4177">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Numero di colonne non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4177">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of columns not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4178">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4178">Allowed From</span></span>
