## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4189">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4189">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4190">Elaborare l'evento dell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4190">Process horizontal list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4191">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4191">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4192">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4192">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4193">Questo servizio elabora un evento per l'elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4193">This service processes an event for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4194">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4195">**elenco** Blocco di controllo widget elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4195">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4196">**evento** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4196">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4197">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4198">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) L'evento elenco orizzontale è stato elaborato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4198">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed horizontal list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4199">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4199">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4200">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4200">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4201">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4201">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4202">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4202">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4203">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4203">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4238">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4238">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT *return_index);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
    &current_index_entry);
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4258">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4258">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4259">Assegnare la voce selezionata in un elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4259">Assign the selected entry in a horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4260">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4260">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(
    GX_HORIZONATAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4261">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4261">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4262">Questo servizio assegna la voce selezionata in un elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4262">This service assigns the selected entry in a horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4263">Se necessario, l'elenco orizzontale scorrerà per rendere visibile la voce selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4263">If required, the horizontal list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4264">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4265">**horizontal_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4265">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4266">**index** Posizione basata sull'indice della nuova voce di elenco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4266">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4267">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4267">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente la voce di elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4269">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Non è compreso nell'intervallo valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4269">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Index is not in invalid range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4270">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4270">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4272">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4272">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4273">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4273">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4274">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4274">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4275">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4275">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4284">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4284">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4285">Ottenere la voce selezionata dall'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4285">Get selected entry from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4286">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4286">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4287">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4287">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4288">Questo servizio restituisce la voce di elenco selezionata dell'elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4288">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4289">Si noti che se l'elenco orizzontale include più righe rispetto ai widget figlio e la voce selezionata è stata scorrendo dalla visualizzazione, questa API restituirà GX_NULL perché i widget figlio vengono usati nuovamente durante lo scorrimento del contenuto dell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4289">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4290">La gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get funzione restituirà in modo affidabile l'indice dell'elemento selezionato, anche se tale elemento è stato scorrendo dalla visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4290">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4291">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4291">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4292">**horizontal_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4292">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4293">**return_list_entry** Destinazione per il widget per la voce dell'elenco di restituzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4293">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4294">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4294">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4295">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) È stata ottenuta la voce dell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4295">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4296">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Il widget selezionato è stato scorrendo dalla visualizzazione in un elenco con più righe rispetto agli elementi figlio client.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4296">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4297">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4297">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4298">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4298">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4299">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4299">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4300">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4300">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4301">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4301">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_list_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */

    
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4310">gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4310">gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set(

```

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4314">Questo servizio assegna il numero totale di colonne che devono essere visualizzate dall'elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4314">This service assigns the total number of columns to be displayed by the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4318">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4318">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4322">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valore conteggio non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4322">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid count value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4323">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4323">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Tell my list to display 20 total columns. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set(&my_list, 20);

```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4334">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4334">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4335">Creare una barra di scorrimento orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4335">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4336">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4336">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4337">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4337">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4338">Questo servizio crea una barra di scorrimento orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4338">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4339">L'ID per una barra di scorrimento orizzontale è predefinito (perché una finestra deve sapere come intercettare gli eventi da essa) e le dimensioni sono automatiche (perché deve riempire la larghezza del client della finestra padre).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4339">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4340">Se si decide di consentire le barre di scorrimento dell'area client, sarà necessario aggiungere un'altra funzione di creazione con i parametri id e size.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4340">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4341">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4342">**barra di scorrimento** Blocco di controllo widget della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4342">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4343">**name** Nome della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4343">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4344">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4344">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4345">**aspetto** La struttura dell'aspetto definisce l'aspetto della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4345">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4346">Se questo valore è GX_NULL, la barra di scorrimento userà l'aspetto predefinito della barra di scorrimento definito da gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4346">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4347">Fare riferimento **all'appendice I** per la definizione della GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4347">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4348">**Stile** Stile del widget della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4348">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4349">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4349">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4350">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4351">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione corretta della barra di scorrimento orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4351">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4353">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4353">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4354">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4354">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4355">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4355">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4356">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4357">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4357">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4358">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4358">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4365">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4365">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4366">Pulsante Crea icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4366">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4367">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4367">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4368">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4368">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4369">Questo servizio crea il widget del pulsante icona specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4369">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4370">GX_ICON_BUTTON deriva da GX_BUTTON e supporta tutti i gx_button API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4370">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4373">**name** Nome logico del widget del pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4373">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4380">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4380">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pulsante icona Creazione completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4405">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4405">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4406">Disegnare un pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4406">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4407">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4408">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4409">Questo servizio disegna il pulsante icona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4409">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4410">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente da GUIX come parte di un'operazione di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma viene esposta anche all'applicazione che potrebbe voler fornire una funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il disegno del pulsante icona predefinito come base di disegno personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4410">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4411">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4411">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4412">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4412">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4413">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4414">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4414">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4415">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4415">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4416">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4416">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4417">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4417">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4434">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4434">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4435">Impostare la mappa pixel sul widget del pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4435">Set pixelmap to the icon button widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4436">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4437">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4438">Questo servizio assegna una nuova mappa pixel al widget del pulsante icona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4438">This service assigns a new pixelmap to the icon button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4439">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4439">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4440">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4440">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4441">**icon_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4441">**icon_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4442">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4442">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4443">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente la mappa pixel del pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4443">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set icon button pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4445">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4445">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4446">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4446">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4447">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4447">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4448">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4448">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(&my_icon_button,
    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ICON);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap of the icon button “my_icon_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4465">gx_icon_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4465">gx_icon_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4466">Disegnare lo sfondo dell'icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4466">Draw icon background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4467">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4467">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_background_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4468">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4469">Questo servizio disegna lo sfondo del widget icona specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4469">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4470">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente dalla funzione gx_icon_button_draw, ma viene esposto all'applicazione per facilitare la scrittura di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4470">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4471">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4471">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4472">**icona** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4472">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4473">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4473">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4474">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4474">**None**</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */

    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4483">gx_icon_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4483">gx_icon_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4484">Icona Crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4484">Create icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4485">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4485">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_create(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_id, 
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4486">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4487">Questo servizio crea il widget icona specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4487">This service creates the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4488">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4488">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4489">**icona** Puntatore al blocco di controllo icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4489">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4490">**name** Nome logico del widget icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4490">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4491">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4491">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4492">**pixelmap_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4492">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4493">**style** Stile dell'icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4493">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4494">**icon_id** ID definito dall'applicazione dell'icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4494">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4495">**x** Posizione della coordinata x iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4495">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4496">**y** Posizione della coordinata y iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4496">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4497">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione dell'icona completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4499">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4499">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4500">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4500">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4501">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4501">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4502">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4502">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4503">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4504">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4504">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4505">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4505">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_create(&my_icon, “my_icon”, &my_parent,
    MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_ID,
    5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon “my_icon” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4510">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4510">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4511">Icona Di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4511">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4512">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4513">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4514">Questo servizio disegna il widget icona specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4514">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4515">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente da GUIX come parte di un'operazione di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma viene esposto anche all'applicazione che potrebbe voler fornire una funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il disegno dell'icona predefinito come base di disegno personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4515">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4516">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4516">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4517">**icona** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4517">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4518">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4518">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4519">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4519">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4520">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4521">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4521">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4522">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4527">gx_icon_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4527">gx_icon_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4528">Elaborazione degli eventi del widget icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4528">Icon widget event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4529">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4529">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_event_process(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4530">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4531">Questo servizio gestisce gli eventi inviati a GX_ICON widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4531">This service handles events sent to a GX_ICON widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4532">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4532">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4533">**icona** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4533">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4534">**event_ptr** Puntatore a GX_EVENT struttura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4534">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4535">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4535">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4536">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Evento icona Elaborazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4536">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful processed icon event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4537">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4537">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4538">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4538">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4539">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4539">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4540">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4540">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4541">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4541">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
    /* Do default handling. */
    status = gx_icon_event_process(icon, event_ptr);

    /* add your own handling here */
    break;
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4547">Impostare la mappa pixel per l'icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4547">Set pixelmap for icon</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4549">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4550">Questo servizio imposta la mappa pixel per il widget icona specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4550">This service sets the pixelmap for the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4551">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4551">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4553">**normal_id** ID risorsa stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4553">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4554">**selected_id** ID risorsa stato selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4554">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4556">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di pixel delle icone riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4556">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4557">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4557">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4558">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4558">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4559">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4560">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4560">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4561">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4561">Example</span></span>

```C

    MY_SELECTED_ID);
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4566">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4566">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4567">Creare un'istanza del modulo lettore di immagini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4567">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4568">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4568">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4569">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4569">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4570">Questa funzione crea un lettore/decodificatore di immagini non elaborato di runtime.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4570">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4571">Attualmente sono supportati solo i tipi di immagine non elaborati jpeg e png.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4571">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4572">Questo servizio richiede GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT essere definito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4572">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4573">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4573">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4574">**image_reader** Blocco di controllo lettore di immagini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4574">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4575">**dati** Puntatore ai dati di input non elaborati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4575">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4576">**data_size** Dimensioni dei dati di input non elaborati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4576">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4577">**color_format** Formato del colore di output richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4577">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4578">**modalità** Flag di compressione, dithering e modalità alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4578">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4579">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4579">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione del lettore di immagini riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4581">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4581">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4582">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Dimensioni dei dati non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4582">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4583">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4583">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4584">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4584">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4585">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4585">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_palette_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4589">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4589">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4590">Definire la tavolozza del lettore di immagini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4590">Define image reader palette</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4591">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4591">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_palette_set(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_COLOR *pal,
    UINT palsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4592">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4592">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4593">Questo servizio imposta la tavolozza per il blocco di controllo lettore di immagini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4593">This service sets palette for image reader control block.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4594">Questo servizio richiede GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT essere definito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4594">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4595">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4595">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4597">**pal** Puntatore alla tavolozza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4597">**pal** Pointer to palette</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4598">**palsize** Dimensioni della tavolozza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4598">**palsize** The size of the palette</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4599">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4599">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4600">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di tavolozza del lettore di immagini riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4600">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader palette set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4601">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4601">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4602">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Dimensioni della tavolozza non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4602">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid palette size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4603">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4603">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_palette” as the palette of “my_image_reader”. */

    my_palette_size);
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4609">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4609">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4610">Avviare il processo di decompressione e conversione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4610">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4611">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4611">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_start(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4612">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4612">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4613">Questo servizio decodifica un'immagine non elaborata in un formato di colore specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4613">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4614">Attualmente sono supportati solo i tipi di immagine non elaborati jpeg e png.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4614">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4615">Questa operazione GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT deve essere definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4615">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4616">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4616">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4617">**image_reader** Blocco di controllo lettore di immagini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4617">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4618">**mappa pixel** Mappa pixel di output</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4618">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4619">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4619">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4620">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Decodifica dell'immagine riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4620">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4621">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** allocatore di memoria (0x30) non è definito o l'allocazione di memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4621">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4622">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Il tipo di immagine di input o il formato del colore di output non è supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4622">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4625">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4625">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4626">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4626">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4627">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4627">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;

/* Create my_image_reader here. */

/* Decoding a raw image according to the settings of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_start(&my_image_reader, output_map)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “output_map” have been loaded with the requested pixelmap. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4629">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4629">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4631">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4631">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4632">Disegnare un grafico a linee con asse x,y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4632">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4633">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4634">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4635">Questo servizio disegna l'asse x,y di un grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4635">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4636">I colori dell'asse e i parametri dello spessore di linea vengono recuperati dalla struttura delle informazioni del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4636">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4637">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente dalla funzione gx_line_chart_draw, ma viene esposto all'applicazione per facilitare la scrittura di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4637">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4638">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4638">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4639">**grafico** Blocco di controllo grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4639">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4640">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4641">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4641">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4642">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4642">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4643">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4643">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4644">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4644">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4645">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4645">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4646">gx_line_chart_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4646">gx_line_chart_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4647">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4647">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4648">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4648">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4649">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4649">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4650">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4650">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4651">gx_line_chart_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4651">gx_line_chart_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4652">Creare GX_LINE_CHART widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4652">Create GX_LINE_CHART widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4653">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_create(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_LINE_CHART_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT chart_id, GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4654">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4655">Questo servizio crea una finestra del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4655">This service creates a line chart window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4656">I parametri di disegno e i dati del grafico vengono passati tramite la GX_LINE_CHART_INFO grafico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4656">The chart drawing parameters and chart data are passed in via the GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4657">GX_LINE_CHART è basato GX_WINDOW e supporta tutte le API GX_WINDOW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4657">GX_LINE_CHART is based on GX_WINDOW, and supports all of the GX_WINDOW APIs.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4658">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4658">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4659">**grafico** Puntatore al GX_LINE_CHART di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4659">**chart** Pointer to the GX_LINE_CHART control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4660">**name** Nome del grafico a linee facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4660">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4661">**elemento padre** Widget padre o GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4661">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4662">**info** Struttura che definisce i parametri di disegno del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4662">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4663">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_LINE_CHART_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4663">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4664">**style** Flag di stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4664">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4665">**chart_id** Valore DELL'ID logico del grafico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4665">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4666">**size** Rettangolo di delimitazione della finestra del grafico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4666">**size** Chart window bounding rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4667">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4667">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4668">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione del grafico a linee completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4668">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line chart create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4669">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4669">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4670">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4670">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4671">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4671">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4672">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4672">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4673">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4673">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4674">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4674">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4675">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4675">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_data_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4682">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4682">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4683">Disegnare una linea di dati del grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4683">Draw line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4684">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4684">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_data_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4685">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4685">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4686">Questo servizio disegna la linea di dati del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4686">This service draws the line chart data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4687">I colori delle linee e i parametri dello spessore di linea vengono recuperati dalla struttura delle informazioni del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4687">The line colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4688">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente dalla funzione gx_line_chart_draw, ma viene esposto all'applicazione per facilitare la scrittura di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4688">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4689">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4689">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4690">**grafico** Blocco di controllo grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4690">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4691">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4691">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4692">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4692">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4693">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4693">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4694">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4694">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4695">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4695">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(chart);

    /* Draw the data line. */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4701">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4701">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4702">Disegnare il grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4702">Draw the line chart</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4703">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4703">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4704">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4705">Si tratta della funzione di disegno del grafico a linee predefinita, che disegna l'asse del grafico e la linea dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4705">This is the default line chart drawing function, which draws the chart axis and data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4706">Le applicazioni forniscono in genere una funzione di disegno personalizzata per sostituire il disegno predefinito per aggiungere elementi come segni di graduazione, scala o altre informazioni all'asse del grafico e alla linea di dati disegnata dal widget del grafico a linee di base.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4706">Applications usually provide a custom drawing function to replace the default drawing to add things such as tickmarks, scale, or other information to the chart axis and data line drawn by the base line chart widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4707">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4708">**grafico** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4708">**chart** Pointer to the line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4709">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4709">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4710">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4710">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4711">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4712">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4713">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default line chart draw. */
    gx_line_chart_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_update"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4719">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4719">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4720">Aggiornare la linea dei dati del grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4720">Update line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4721">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4721">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_update(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart, 
    INT *data,
    INT data_count)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4722">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4722">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4723">Questo servizio aggiorna la matrice di dati tracciata dalla finestra del grafico a linee e forza il ridisegno della finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4723">This service updates the data array plotted by the line chart window, and forces the window to redraw.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4724">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4725">**grafico** Blocco di controllo grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4725">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4726">**dati** Matrice di dati da tracciare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4726">**data** Data array to be plotted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4727">**data_count** Dimensioni della matrice di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4727">**data_count** Size of the data array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4728">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4728">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4729">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione del pulsante Di testo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4729">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4732">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4733">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4734">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4734">Example</span></span>

```C
INT chart_data[100];
GX_LINE_CHART chart;

/* Update the data array associated with “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_update(&chart, chart_data, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line chart data has been updated. */
```
