## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4740">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4740">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4741">Calcolare il valore di scala dell'asse y a virgola fissa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4741">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4742">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4742">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4743">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4743">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4744">Questo servizio calcola il valore di scala a virgola fissa usato per tracciare i valori dei dati sull'asse Y del grafico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4744">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4745">I chart_info parametri e il rettangolo di delimitazione del grafico vengono usati per calcolare questo valore di scala.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4745">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4746">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4746">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4747">**grafico** Blocco di controllo grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4747">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4748">**return_val** Indirizzo del valore per contenere il valore restituito a virgola fissa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4748">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4749">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4749">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Calcolo del valore di scala y riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4752">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4752">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4753">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4753">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4754">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4754">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
INT y_scale;

/* Caluclate y scale value of “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(&chart, &y_scale);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, y scale value of “chart” has been calculated. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4760">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4760">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4761">Creare un menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4761">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4762">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4762">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4763">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4763">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4764">Questo servizio crea un menu come specificato e associa il menu al widget padre fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4764">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4765">Accetta tutti i tipi di widget come voce di menu figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4765">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4766">Per inserire un widget come voce di menu figlio, **chiamare gx_menu_insert**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4766">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4767">GX_MENU deriva da GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT e supporta tutti i gx_pixelmap_prompt API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4767">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4768">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4769">**menu** Puntatore al blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4769">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4770">**name** Nome del menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4770">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4771">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4771">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4772">**text_id** ID risorsa del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4772">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4773">**fill_id** ID risorsa di riempimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4773">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4774">**style** Stile del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4774">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4775">**L'Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget, nonché stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4775">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4776">**menu_id** ID definito dall'applicazione del menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4776">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4777">**size** Dimensioni del menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4777">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4778">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4778">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4779">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione del menu completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4779">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4780">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4780">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4782">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4782">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4783">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4783">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4784">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4784">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4785">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4785">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4786">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4786">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MENU my_menu;

/* Create “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_create(&my_menu, “my_menu”, parent, MY_TEXT_ID,
    MY_FILL_ID, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_MENU_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the menu was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4798">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4798">gx_menu_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4799">Menu Disegna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4799">Draw menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4800">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4801">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4802">Questo servizio disegna il menu specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4802">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4803">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per widget di menu personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4803">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4804">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4804">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4805">**menu** Puntatore al blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4805">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4806">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4806">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4807">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4807">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4808">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4808">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4809">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4809">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4810">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4810">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu draw. */
    gx_menu_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4822">gx_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4822">gx_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4823">Evento del menu Elabora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4823">Process menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4824">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4824">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4825">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4825">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4826">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il menu specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4826">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4827">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione degli eventi di menu personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4827">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4828">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4828">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4829">**menu** Puntatore al blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4829">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4830">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4830">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4831">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4831">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4832">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo evento di menu riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4832">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4833">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4833">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4834">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4834">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4835">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4835">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4836">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4836">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4837">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4837">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4838">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4838">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_menu_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4846">gx_menu_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4846">gx_menu_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4847">Inserire un nuovo elemento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4847">Insert a new item</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4848">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4848">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_insert(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_WIDGET *insert);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4849">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4849">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4850">Questo servizio inserisce una nuova voce nel menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4850">This service inserts a new item to the menu.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4851">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4851">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4852">**menu** Puntatore al blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4852">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4853">**widget** Puntatore al widget da inserire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4853">**widget** Pointer to the widget to insert</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4854">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4854">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4855">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) È stata inserita correttamente una nuova voce nel menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4855">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted new item into menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4856">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4856">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4857">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4857">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4858">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4858">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4859">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4859">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4860">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4860">Example</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new item “my_widget” has been inserted to the menu “my_menu”. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4872">gx_menu_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4872">gx_menu_remove</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4873">Rimuovere un elemento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4873">Remove an item</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4874">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4874">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_remvoe(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4875">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4875">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4876">Questo servizio rimuove una voce dal menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4876">This service removes an item from the menu.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4877">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4877">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4878">**menu** Puntatore al blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4878">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4879">**widget** Puntatore al widget da rimuovere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4879">**widget** Pointer to widget to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4880">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4880">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4881">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Rimozione della voce di menu completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4881">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed menu item</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4882">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4882">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4883">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4883">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4884">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4884">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4885">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4885">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4886">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4886">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove item “my_widget” from menu “my_menu” */
status = gx_menu_remove(&my_menu, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the item “my_widget” has been removed from menu “my_menu”. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4898">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4898">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4899">Disegnare il testo del menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4899">Draw menu text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4900">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4900">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_text_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4901">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4901">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4902">Questo servizio disegna il testo di un menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4902">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4903">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per widget di menu personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4903">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4904">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4904">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4905">**menu** Puntatore al blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4905">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4906">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4906">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4907">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4907">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4908">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4908">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4909">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4909">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4910">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4910">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4922">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4922">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4923">Impostare l'offset di disegno del testo del menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4923">Set menu text draw offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4924">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4924">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_text_offset_set(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_VALUE x_offset,
    GX_VALUE y_offset);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4925">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4925">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4926">Questo servizio imposta l'offset di visualizzazione x, y per il testo del menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4926">This service sets x, y display offset for menu text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4927">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4927">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4928">**menu** Puntatore al blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4928">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4929">**x_offset** Coordinata X dell'offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4929">**x_offset** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4930">**y_offset** Coordinata Y dell'offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4930">**y_offset** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4932">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Offset di disegno testo del menu impostato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4932">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set menu text draw offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4933">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4933">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4934">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4934">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4935">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4936">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4936">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4937">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text draw offset of menu “my_menu” to (20, 10). */
status = gx_menu_text_offset_set(&my_menu, 20, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text draw offset of menu “my_menu” has been set to (20, 10). */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4949">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4949">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4950">Pulsante Crea testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4950">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4951">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4951">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4952">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4952">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4953">Questo servizio crea un widget pulsante di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4953">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4954">Un pulsante di testo su più righe visualizza il testo del pulsante su 1-n righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4954">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4955">Il numero massimo di righe è definito dalla costante GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, che per impostazione predefinita è 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4955">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4956">Le interruzioni di riga vengono impostate dalle coppie ritorno a capo e/o ritorno a capo e avanzamento riga all'interno della stringa di testo assegnata al pulsante di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4956">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4957">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON deriva da GX_TEXT_BUTTON e supporta tutti i gx_text_button API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4957">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4958">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4958">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4959">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4959">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4960">**name** Nome logico del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4960">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4961">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4961">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4962">**text_id** ID risorsa del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4962">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4963">**style** Stile del pulsante testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4963">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4964">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4964">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4965">**text_button_id** ID definito dall'applicazione del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4965">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4983">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4983">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4984">Pulsante Disegna testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4984">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4985">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4985">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4986">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4986">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4987">Questo servizio disegna il pulsante di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4987">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4988">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente da GUIX come parte di un'operazione di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma viene esposta anche all'applicazione che potrebbe voler fornire una funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il disegno predefinito del pulsante di testo su più righe come base di disegno personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4988">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4989">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4989">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4990">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4990">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4991">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4991">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4992">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4992">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4993">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4993">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4994">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4994">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-4995">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-4995">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5003">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5003">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5004">Gestione degli eventi predefinita per il pulsante di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5004">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5005">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5005">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5006">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5006">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5007">Questo servizio è la funzione di gestione degli eventi predefinita per il widget del pulsante di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5007">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5008">Questa funzione è resa accessibile alle applicazioni che vogliono fornire la gestione degli eventi personalizzata per un widget del pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5008">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5009">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5009">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5010">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5010">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5011">**event_ptr** Evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5011">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5012">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5012">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Gestito correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5014">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5014">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5015">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5015">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5016">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5016">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5017">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5017">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5018">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5018">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5026">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5026">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5027">Funzione di supporto del disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5027">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5028">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5029">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5030">Questa funzione di supporto disegna la parte di testo di un pulsante di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5030">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5031">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_multi_line_text_button_draw() e viene fornita come API separata per comodità per le applicazioni che definiscono una funzione personalizzata di disegno di pulsanti di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5031">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5032">Le applicazioni che vogliono personalizzare il disegno dello sfondo del pulsante possono fornire la funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il servizio multi_line_text_button_text_draw come parte del disegno personalizzato per disegnare il testo del pulsante sullo sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5032">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5033">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5033">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5034">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5034">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5035">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5035">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5036">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5036">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5037">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5037">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5038">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5038">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5039">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5039">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5048">Impostare l'ID risorsa di testo sul pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5048">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5049">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5049">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5050">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5050">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5051">Questo servizio imposta l'ID risorsa stringa specificato sul pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5051">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5052">La stringa può contenere caratteri di nuova riga che agiscono per visualizzare il testo su più righe all'interno dell'area del pulsante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5052">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5053">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5053">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5054">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5054">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5055">**string_id** ID risorsa della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5055">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5070">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5070">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5071">Assegnare testo al pulsante di testo (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5071">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5072">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5073">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5074">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5074">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5075">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata al pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5075">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5076">Se il widget text_button è stato creato con style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata e pertanto l'API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set deve essere richiamata una volta prima che venga richiesto questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5076">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5077">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ad esempio potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5077">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5078">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5079">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5079">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5080">**puntatore** di testo alla stringa con terminazione NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5080">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5081">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5081">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5082">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente il testo sul pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5082">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5084">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5084">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5085">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** allocatore di memoria 0x30 (0x30) non è definito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5085">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5086">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5086">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5087">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5087">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5100">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5100">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5101">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata al pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5101">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5102">Se il widget text_button è stato creato con stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata e pertanto l'API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set deve essere richiamata una volta prima che venga richiesto questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5102">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5103">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ad esempio potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5103">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5121">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5121">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5122">Eliminare un carattere prima della posizione del cursore di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5122">Delete a character before multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5123">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5123">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5124">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5124">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5125">Questo servizio elimina il carattere prima della posizione del cursore di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5125">This service deletes the character before multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5126">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento backspace key down, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5126">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5129">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5129">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5130">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Backspace di input di testo su più righe riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5130">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input backspace</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5131">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5131">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5132">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5132">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5134">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Carattere non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5134">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5135">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5135">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5169">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5169">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5170">Elimina tutti i caratteri dal buffer di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5170">Deletes all characters from the text input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5171">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5171">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5172">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5172">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5173">Questo servizio elimina tutti i caratteri dal buffer di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5173">This service deletes all characters from the text input buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5174">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5175">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5175">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5176">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5176">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Buffer di input di testo su più righe completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input buffer clear</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5180">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5181">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5181">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5182">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5182">Example</span></span>

```C
/* clear input buffer of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_clear(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has emptied its input buffer. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5214">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5214">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5215">Recupera le informazioni sul buffer del widget di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5215">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5216">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5216">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address,
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5217">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5217">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5218">Questo servizio recupera le informazioni sul buffer di un widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5218">This service retrieves buffer information of a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5219">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5219">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5220">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5220">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5221">**buffer_address** Indirizzo del buffer di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5221">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5222">**content_size** Numero di byte dei dati di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5222">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5223">**buffer_size** Dimensioni del buffer di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5223">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5224">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5224">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5225">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ottenere testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5225">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5227">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5227">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5228">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5228">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5229">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5229">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5230">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5230">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT context_size;
UINT buffer_size;

/* Retrieves buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
    &buffer_address, &string_size,
    &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5262">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5262">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5263">Inserire una stringa di caratteri nella posizione corrente del cursore di input di testo su più righe (deprecata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5263">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5264">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5264">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5265">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5265">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5266">Questa API è deprecata e sostituita da gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5266">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5267">Questo servizio inserisce una stringa di caratteri nel buffer della stringa di input di testo su più righe nella posizione corrente del cursore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5267">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5268">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di tasto in giù specifico, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5268">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5269">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5270">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5270">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5271">**insert_str** Stringa di caratteri in formato UTF-8 da inserire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5271">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5272">**insert_size** Numero di byte da inserire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5272">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5273">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5273">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correttamente inserita la stringa di caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Dimensioni stringa non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5279">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Tipo di carattere non valido o dimensioni del buffer non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5279">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5280">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5280">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5281">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5281">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5282">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5282">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5288">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5288">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5289">Questo servizio inserisce una stringa di caratteri nel buffer della stringa di input di testo su più righe nella posizione corrente del cursore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5289">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5290">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando vengono ricevuti specifici eventi key down, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5290">This service is called internally when specific key down events are received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5293">**string** Stringa di caratteri con codifica UTF-8 da inserire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5293">**string** UTF-8 encoded character string to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5294">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5294">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5295">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) È stata inserita correttamente la stringa di caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5295">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5296">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5296">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5297">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5297">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5298">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5298">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5299">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Dimensioni stringa non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5299">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5300">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Tipo di carattere non valido o dimensioni del buffer non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5300">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5301">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5301">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5302">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5302">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = insert_text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(insert_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully inserted the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5336">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5336">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5337">Creare input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5337">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5338">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5338">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5339">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5339">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5340">Questo servizio crea un widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5340">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5341">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT deriva da GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW e supporta tutti gx_multi_line_text_view servizi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5341">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5342">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5342">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5343">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5343">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5344">**name** Nome del widget di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5344">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5345">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5345">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5346">**input_buffer** Puntatore al buffer di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5346">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5347">**buffer_size** Dimensioni del buffer di input di testo in byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5347">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5348">**style** Stile del widget di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5348">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5349">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5349">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5350">**text_input_id** ID definito dall'applicazione dell'input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5350">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5351">**size** Dimensioni del widget di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5351">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5352">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5352">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5353">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione dell'input di testo su più righe completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5353">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5354">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5354">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5355">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5355">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5356">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5356">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5357">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5357">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5358">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5358">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5359">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5359">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5360">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5360">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5361">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5361">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5393">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5393">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5395">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_POINT cursor_pos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5396">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5397">Questo servizio recupera la posizione del cursore di input di testo mult-line.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5397">This service retrieves the mult-line text input cursor position.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5399">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5399">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5400">**cursor_pos** Posizione del cursore recuperata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5400">**cursor_pos** Retrieved cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5401">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5401">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5402">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) La posizione del cursore è stata recuperata correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5402">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved cursor position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5404">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5404">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the cursor position of “my_text_input”. */

    &cursor_pos);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor position has been retrieved. */
```
