## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5440">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5440">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5441">Eliminare il carattere nella posizione del cursore di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5441">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5442">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5442">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5443">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5443">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5444">Questo servizio elimina il carattere dopo la posizione del cursore di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5444">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5445">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento delete key down, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5445">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5446">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5446">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5447">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5447">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5448">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5448">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5449">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Eliminare correttamente un carattere dopo il cursore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5449">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5450">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5450">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5452">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5452">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5453">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Carattere non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5453">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5454">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5454">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5455">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5455">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5456">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5456">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5488">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5488">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5489">Spostare il cursore di input di testo su più righe alla riga successiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5489">Move the multi line text input cursor to the next line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5490">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5491">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5492">Questo servizio posiziona il cursore del widget di input di testo su più righe alla riga successiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5492">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5493">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento freccia GIÙ, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5493">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5494">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5494">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5495">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5495">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5496">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5496">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5497">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Il cursore di input di testo è stato spostato nella riga successiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5497">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to the next line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5498">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5498">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5500">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5500">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5501">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Carattere o altezza riga non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5501">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or line height</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5502">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5502">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5503">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5503">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5504">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5504">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the next line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to the next line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5536">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5536">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5537">Spostare il cursore di input di testo su più righe alla fine della riga corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5537">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5538">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5538">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5539">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5539">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5540">Questo servizio posiziona il cursore del widget di input di testo su più righe alla fine della riga di stringa corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5540">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5541">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di chiusura del tasto DIS, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5541">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5542">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5542">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5543">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5543">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5544">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5545">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostato correttamente il cursore di input di testo alla fine della riga corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5545">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to end of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5546">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5546">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5547">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5547">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5548">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5548">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5549">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5549">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5550">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5550">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5551">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5551">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the end of current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the end of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5583">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5583">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5584">Gestione degli eventi predefinita per l'input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5584">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5585">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5585">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5586">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5586">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5587">Questo servizio è la funzione di gestione degli eventi predefinita per il widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5587">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5588">Questa funzione è resa accessibile alle applicazioni che vogliono fornire la gestione personalizzata degli eventi per un widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5588">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5589">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5589">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5590">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5590">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5591">**event_ptr** Evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5591">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5592">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5592">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5593">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Gestito correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5593">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5594">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5594">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5595">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5595">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5597">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5597">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5598">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5598">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5599">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5599">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5631">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5631">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5632">Impostare il colore di sfondo dell'input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5632">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5633">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5634">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5635">Questo servizio assegna colori di riempimento per il widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5635">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5636">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5637">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5637">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5638">**normal_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento normale usato nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5638">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5639">**selected_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento selezionato usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5639">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5640">**disabled_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento disabilitato usato quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5640">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5641">**readonly_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento di sola lettura usato quando sono GX_STYLE_ENABLED e GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY sono attive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5641">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5642">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5642">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5643">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente i colori per l'input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5643">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5644">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5644">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5645">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5645">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5646">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5646">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5647">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5647">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5648">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5648">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5680">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5680">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5681">Spostare il cursore di input di testo all'inizio della riga corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5681">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5682">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5682">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5683">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5683">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5684">Questo servizio sposta la posizione del cursore di input di testo all'inizio della riga corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5684">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5685">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento home key down, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5685">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5686">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5686">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5687">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5687">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5688">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5688">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5689">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostato il cursore all'inizio della riga corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5689">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to start of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5693">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5693">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5694">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5694">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5695">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5695">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the start of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5727">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5727">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5728">Spostare il cursore di input di testo su più righe di un carattere a sinistra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5728">Move multi line text input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5729">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5729">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5730">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5730">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5731">Questo servizio sposta il cursore di input di testo su più righe di un carattere a sinistra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5731">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5732">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di tasto di scelta, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5732">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5733">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5733">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5735">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5735">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5736">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostato correttamente il cursore a sinistra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5736">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the left</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5737">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5737">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5738">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5738">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5739">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5739">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5740">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Carattere non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5740">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5741">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5741">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5743">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5743">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor one character to the left. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved one character to the left. */

```

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5778">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5778">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5779">Questo servizio sposta il cursore di input di testo su più righe di un carattere a destra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5779">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5780">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di tasto di scelta, ma può essere richiamato anche dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5780">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5785">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5785">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5786">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5786">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5824">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5824">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5825">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5825">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5826">Questo servizio aggiunge stili a un widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5826">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5827">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5827">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5829">**style** Stili da aggiungere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5829">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5830">**L'Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5830">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5871">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5871">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_remove(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5872">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5872">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5876">**style** Stili da rimuovere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5876">**style** Styles to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5877">**L'Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5877">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5881">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5881">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5916">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5916">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5917">Impostare stili di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5917">Set multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5918">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5918">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5919">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5919">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5920">Questo servizio imposta gli stili per un widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5920">This service sets styles for a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5921">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5921">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5922">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5922">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5923">**style** Stili da impostare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5923">**style** Styles to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5924">**L'Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5924">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5925">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5925">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5926">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di stili di input di testo su più righe riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5926">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5927">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5927">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5928">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5928">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5929">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5929">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5930">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5930">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5931">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5931">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS for text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input style has been set */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5963">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5963">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5964">Impostare il colore del testo di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5964">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5965">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5965">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5966">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5966">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5967">Questo servizio assegna i colori del testo per il widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5967">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5968">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5968">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5969">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5969">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5970">**normal_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo normale usato nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5970">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5971">**selected_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo selezionato usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5971">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5972">**disabled_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo disabilitato usato quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5972">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5973">**readonly_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo di sola lettura usato quando sono GX_STYLE_ENABLED e GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY sono attive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5973">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5974">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente i colori per l'input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5978">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5978">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5979">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5979">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-5980">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-5980">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6012">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6012">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6013">Selezionare il testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6013">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6014">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6014">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6015">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6015">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6016">Questo servizio seleziona il testo di input di testo su più righe con il contrassegno di inizio e l'indice del contrassegno di fine specificati ed evidenzia il testo selezionato con i colori di riempimento e di testo selezionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6016">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6017">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6017">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6018">**text_input** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6018">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6019">**start_index** Indice del primo carattere selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6019">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6020">**end_index** Indice dell'ultimo carattere selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6020">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6021">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selezione del testo di input di testo su più righe completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6026">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valore di indice non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6026">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6027">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6027">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6029">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6029">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6061">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6061">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6062">Assegnare testo all'input di testo (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6062">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6063">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6063">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6064">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6064">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6065">Questa API è deprecata e sostituita da gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6065">This API is deprecated and replace by gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6066">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata all'input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6066">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6067">Se le multi_line_text_input buffer di input del widget sono inferiori alla lunghezza della stringa, la stringa verrà troncata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6067">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6068">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6068">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6069">**text_input** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6069">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6070">**Puntatore** di testo alla stringa con terminazione NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6070">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6071">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6071">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6072">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente il testo sull'input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6072">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6074">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6074">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6075">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6075">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6076">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6076">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6077">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6077">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6078">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6078">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
    “myrstring”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6081">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6081">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6082">Assegnare testo all'input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6082">Assign text to the text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6083">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6083">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6084">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6084">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6085">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata all'input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6085">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6086">Se le multi_line_text_input buffer di input del widget sono inferiori alla lunghezza della stringa, la stringa verrà troncata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6086">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6087">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6087">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6088">**text_input** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6088">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6089">**Puntatore** di stringa GX_STRING da assegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6089">**string** pointer to GX_STRING to assign</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6090">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6090">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente il testo sull'input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6092">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6092">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6093">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6093">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6094">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6094">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6095">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6095">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6096">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6096">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6097">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6097">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
GX_STRING string;
string.gx_string_ptr = “myrstring”;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext(&my_text_input,
    &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6129">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6129">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6130">Spostare il cursore di input di testo su più righe alla riga precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6130">Move multi line text input cursor to the previous line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6131">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6131">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6132">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6133">Questo servizio sposta il cursore di input di testo su più righe alla riga di testo precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6133">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6134">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento verso l'alto verso il basso, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6134">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6135">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6136">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6136">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6137">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6137">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6138">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Il cursore è stato spostato correttamente nella riga precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6138">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the previous line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6141">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6141">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6142">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6142">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6143">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6143">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6144">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6144">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor to the previous line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the previous line. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6176">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6176">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6177">Creare una visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6177">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6178">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6178">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6179">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6179">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6180">Questo servizio crea un GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6180">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6181">Questo tipo di widget deriva da GX_WINDOW e pertanto tutti gx_window servizi API possono essere utilizzati anche con questo tipo di widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6181">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6182">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6182">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6183">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6183">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6184">**name** Nome del widget di visualizzazione testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6184">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6185">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6185">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6186">**text_id** ID risorsa della stringa di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6186">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6187">**style** Stile del widget di visualizzazione del testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6187">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6188">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6188">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6189">**text_view_id** ID definito dall'applicazione della visualizzazione testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6189">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6190">**size** Dimensioni del widget di visualizzazione del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6190">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6191">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione del widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6195">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6195">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6231">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6231">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6232">Disegnare un widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6232">Draw a multi line text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6233">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6234">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6235">Questo servizio disegna un widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6235">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6236">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente durante l'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma può essere chiamato anche da funzioni di disegno personalizzate della visualizzazione testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6236">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6239">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6239">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6243">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6243">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom multi line text view drawing function. */

{
    /* Call default multi line text view draw. */
    gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(view);

}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6275">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6275">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6276">Elaborare un evento di visualizzazione del testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6276">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6277">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6277">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6278">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6278">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6279">Questo servizio elabora un evento per un widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6279">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6280">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6280">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6281">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6281">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6282">**event** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6282">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6283">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6283">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6284">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process (Processo evento di visualizzazione testo multilinea riuscito)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6284">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6285">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6285">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6286">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6286">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6287">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6287">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6288">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6288">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6289">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6289">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6290">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6290">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6322">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6322">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6323">Impostare il tipo di carattere usato nella visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6323">Set font used in multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6324">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6324">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6325">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6325">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6326">Questo servizio imposta il tipo di carattere di un widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6326">This service sets the font of a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6327">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6328">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6328">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6329">**font_id** ID risorsa per il tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6329">**font_id** Resource ID for the font</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6330">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6330">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6331">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente il tipo di carattere per la visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6331">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set font for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6332">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6332">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6333">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6333">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6334">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6334">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6335">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6335">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6336">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6336">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set font ID FONT_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set(&my_text_view, FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text view “my_text_view” will use the specified font to display its text. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6368">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6368">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6369">Impostare lo spazio riga per la visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6369">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6370">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6370">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6371">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6371">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6372">Questo servizio imposta la spaziatura tra le righe di testo per il widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6372">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6373">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6374">**visualizzazione** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6374">**view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6375">**line_space** Valore da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6375">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6376">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6376">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6377">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente il valore dello spazio riga per la visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6377">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6378">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6378">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6379">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6379">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6380">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6380">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6381">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6381">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6413">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6413">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6414">Ottenere informazioni di scorrimento della visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6414">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6415">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6415">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6416">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6417">Questo servizio ottiene le informazioni di scorrimento della visualizzazione testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6417">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6418">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6418">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6419">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6419">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6420">**Stile** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL o GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6420">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6421">**Informazioni** Puntatore alla destinazione per le informazioni di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6421">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6422">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_SCROLL_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6422">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6423">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6423">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6424">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Le informazioni di scorrimento della visualizzazione testo sono state recuperate correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6424">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6425">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Il widget non è visibile o l'ID carattere della visualizzazione testo non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6425">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6426">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6426">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6427">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6428">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6428">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6429">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6429">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```
