## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6461">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6461">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6462">Impostare il colore del testo per la visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6462">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6463">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6464">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6465">Questo servizio assegna il colore del testo al widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6465">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6466">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6466">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6467">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6467">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6468">**normal_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo normale usato nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6468">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6469">**selected_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo selezionato usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6469">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6470">**disabled_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo disabilitato che ha GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6470">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6471">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6471">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6472">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente i colori per la visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6472">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6474">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6474">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6475">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6476">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6477">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6509">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6509">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6510">Impostare la stringa di testo di sistema nella visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6510">Set system text string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6511">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6511">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6512">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6512">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6513">Questo servizio imposta l'ID risorsa di una stringa sul widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6513">This service sets the resource ID of a string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6514">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6514">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6515">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6515">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6516">**text_id** ID risorsa per la stringa di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6516">**text_id** Resource ID for the text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6517">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente l'ID stringa per la visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6521">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6521">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6522">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6522">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6523">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6523">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6524">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6524">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string ID STRING_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(&my_text_view, STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text id of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6556">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6556">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6557">Impostare una stringa definita dall'utente nella visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6557">Set user-defined string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6558">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6558">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6559">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6559">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6560">Questo servizio assegna una stringa di testo al widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6560">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6561">Se il widget text_view è stato creato con il GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY di stile, crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata e pertanto l'API gx_system_memory_allocate_set deve essere richiamata una volta prima che venga richiesto questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6561">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6562">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa assegnata deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ad esempio potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6562">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6563">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6563">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6564">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6564">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6565">**text** Stringa di testo con terminazione NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6565">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6566">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6566">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6567">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente la stringa per la visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6567">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6568">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** allocatore di memoria (0x30) non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6568">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6571">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6571">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6572">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6572">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6573">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6573">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6605">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6605">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6606">Impostare lo spazio vuoto per la visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6606">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6607">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6607">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6608">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6608">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6609">Questo servizio imposta la spaziatura tra le strutture del widget e l'area client per un widget di visualizzazione del testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6609">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6610">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6611">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6611">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6612">**spazio vuoto** Larghezza del margine tra text_view widget e il testo visualizzato, in pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6612">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6613">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6613">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente gli spazi vuoti per la visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6617">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6617">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6618">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6618">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6619">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6619">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set whitespace of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the whitespace of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6651">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6651">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6652">Richiesta di creazione di una mappa pixel numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6652">Create numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6653">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id,
    ULONG style, USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6654">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6655">Questo servizio crea un widget di richiesta di mappa pixel numerica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6655">This service creates a numeric pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6656">Un numeric_pixelmap_prompt è semplicemente un pixelmap_prompt che mantiene il proprio buffer e fornisce un'API gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT), la dimensione del buffer è definita dalla costante GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, che per impostazione predefinita è 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6656">A numeric_pixelmap_prompt is just a pixelmap_prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6657">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT deriva da GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT e supporta tutti i gx_pixelmap_prompt API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6657">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6658">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6658">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6659">**prompt** Blocco di controllo della richiesta di mappa pixel numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6659">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6660">**name** Nome del prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6660">**name** Name of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6661">**elemento padre** Blocco di controllo widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6661">**parent** Parent widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6662">**text_id** ID della stringa di risorsa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6662">**text_id** Resource string id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6663">**fill_id** ID mappa pixel per l'area di riempimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6663">**fill_id** Pixelmap id for fill area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6664">**style** Stile della richiesta di mappa pixel numerica, **l'Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6664">**style** Style of numeric pixelmap prompt, **Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6665">**pixelmap_prompt_id** ID del prompt definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6665">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6666">**size** Dimensioni del prompt della mappa pixel numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6666">**size** Dimensions of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6667">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6667">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6668">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creare correttamente il prompt di pixlemap numerico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6668">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully create numeric pixlemap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6669">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6669">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6680">Eseguire l'override della funzione format del prompt della mappa pixel numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6680">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6682">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6682">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6683">Questo servizio esegue l'override della funzione di formato predefinita del widget di richiesta pixlemap numerico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6683">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6684">La funzione di formato predefinita converte il valore di richiesta della mappa pixel numerica in una stringa e lo archivia nel buffer privato del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6684">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6685">Questo servizio consente all'applicazione di definire la propria funzione di formato per formattare e archiviare il valore numerico della richiesta pixelmap nel buffer privato del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6685">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6686">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6686">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6687">**prompt** Blocco di controllo della richiesta di mappa pixel numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6687">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6688">**format_func** Funzione Format da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6688">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6689">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6689">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6690">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente la funzione numeric pixlemap prompt format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6690">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric pixlemap prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6692">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6692">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6693">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6693">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6694">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6694">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6719">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6719">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6720">Questo servizio crea un widget di richiesta numerico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6720">This service creates a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6721">Un prompt numeric_ è semplicemente un prompt che mantiene il proprio buffer e fornisce un'API gx_numeric_ prompt_value_set(INT), la dimensione del buffer è definita dalla costante GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, che per impostazione predefinita è 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6721">A numeric_ prompt is just a prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_ prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6722">GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT deriva da GX_PROMPT e supporta tutti i gx_prompt API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6722">GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT is derived from GX_PROMPT and supports all gx_prompt API services.</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6780">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6780">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6781">Creare una rotellina di scorrimento numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6781">Create numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6782">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6782">Prototype</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6783">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create( GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \*wheel, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \*name, GX_WIDGET \*parent, INT start_val, INT end_val, stile ULONG, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \*size);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6783">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create( GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \*wheel, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \*name, GX_WIDGET \*parent, INT start_val, INT end_val, ULONG style, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \*size);</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6784">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6784">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6785">Questo servizio crea un widget della rotellina di scorrimento numerico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6785">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6786">Una rotellina di scorrimento numerica è un tipo di widget della rotellina di scorrimento usato in modo specifico per la visualizzazione di un intervallo di numeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6786">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6787">Sono disponibili anche altri tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6787">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6788">Fare riferimento all'API gx_scroll_wheel_create() per altre informazioni sulla gerarchia dei widget della rotellina di scorrimento, sui tipi di widget e sulla derivazione dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6788">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6789">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL deriva da GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL e supporta tutti i gx_text_scroll_wheel e gx_scroll_wheel servizi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6789">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6790">Tutti i tipi di rotellina di scorrimento generano GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT eventi padre quando la rotellina di scorrimento viene scorre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6790">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6791">Una rotellina di scorrimento numerica avrà per impostazione predefinita abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 riga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6791">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6792">In altre parole, la rotellina di scorrimento visualizza ogni valore compreso tra start_val e end_val, incrementando o decrementando di 1 con ogni riga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6792">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6793">Si noti start_val può essere maggiore o minore di end_val, a seconda del modo in cui l'applicazione vuole che venga visualizzato l'intervallo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6793">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6794">Se l'applicazione vuole modificare l'incremento di riga, può eseguire questa operazione chiamando gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() dopo aver creato la rotellina di scorrimento numerica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6794">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6795">Ad esempio, un'applicazione che vuole creare una rotellina di scorrimento che visualizza i valori anni da 1980 a 2020, incrementando di 5, potrebbe eseguire questa operazione:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6795">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6797">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento numerico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6797">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6798">**name** Nome logico del widget del pulsante mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6798">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6799">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6799">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6800">**start_val** Valore numerico iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6800">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6801">**end_val** Valore numerico finale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6801">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6802">**style** Stile della casella di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6802">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6803">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6803">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6804">**wheel_id** ID della rotellina di scorrimento definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6804">**wheel_id** Application-defined ID of scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6805">**size** Dimensioni del widget della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6805">**size** Dimensions of scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6806">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6806">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6807">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione della rotellina di scorrimento numerica completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6807">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created numeric scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6808">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6808">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6809">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6809">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6810">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6810">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6811">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6811">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6813">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6813">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6814">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6814">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “year_wheel”. */
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&year_wheel,
    “year_selector””, &parent,
    1980, 2040,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER |
    GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT | GX_STYLE_WRAP |
    GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    YEAR_WHEEL_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel “year_wheel” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6832">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6832">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6833">Assegnare l'intervallo di valori della rotellina di scorrimento numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6833">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6834">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6834">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6835">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6835">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6836">Questo servizio modifica l'intervallo di valori consentiti e visualizzati da un widget della rotellina di scorrimento numerico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6836">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6837">Una rotellina di scorrimento numerica è un tipo di widget della rotellina di scorrimento usato in modo specifico per la visualizzazione di un intervallo di numeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6837">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6838">Sono disponibili anche altri tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6838">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6839">Fare riferimento all'API gx_scroll_wheel_create() per altre informazioni sulla gerarchia dei widget della rotellina di scorrimento, sui tipi di widget e sulla derivazione dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6839">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6840">Richiamando questa API, le righe totali della rotellina di scorrimento vengono reimpostate su abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, ovvero la rotellina di scorrimento verrà incrementata di 1 per ogni riga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6840">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6841">Per modificare questa impostazione, l'applicazione può chiamare gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() per modificare il numero totale di righe, modificando in modo efficace l'incremento del valore tra le righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6841">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6842">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6842">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6843">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento numerico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6843">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6844">**start_val** Valore numerico iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6844">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6845">**end_val** Valore numerico finale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6845">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6871">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6871">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6872">Pulsante Crea mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6872">Create pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6873">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6873">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6874">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6874">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6875">Questo servizio crea un widget pulsante mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6875">This service creates a pixelmap button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6876">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON deriva da GX_BUTTON e supporta tutti gx_button servizi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6876">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6877">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6877">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6878">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6878">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6879">**name** Nome logico del widget del pulsante mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6879">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6880">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6880">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6881">**normal_id** ID risorsa stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6881">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6882">**selected_id** ID risorsa stato selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6882">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6883">**disabled_id** ID risorsa stato disabilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6883">**disabled_id** Disabled state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6884">**style** Stile della casella di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6884">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6885">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6885">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6886">**pixelmap_button_id** ID definito dall'applicazione del pulsante pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6886">**pixelmap_button_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6887">**size** Dimensioni del pulsante mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6887">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6888">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6888">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6889">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pulsante Mappa pixel creata correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6889">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6890">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6890">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6891">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6891">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6892">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6892">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6893">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6893">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6896">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6896">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_create(&my_pixelmap_button,
    “my_pixelmap_button”, &my_parent,
    MY_NORMAL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_DESELECTED_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_PIXELMAP_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button “my_pixelmap_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6918">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6918">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6919">Pulsante Disegna mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6919">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6920">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6920">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6921">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6922">Questo servizio disegna un widget pulsante mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6922">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6923">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per widget di pulsanti mappa pixel personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6923">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6924">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6925">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6925">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6926">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6926">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6927">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6927">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6928">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6928">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6929">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6929">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6930">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6930">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6952">gx_pixelmap_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6952">gx_pixelmap_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6953">Elaborazione degli eventi del pulsante Mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6953">Pixelmap button event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6954">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6954">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6955">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6956">Questo servizio fornisce la gestione degli eventi predefinita per il tipo di widget del pulsante pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6956">This service provides default event handling for the pixelmap button widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6957">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6958">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6958">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6959">**event_ptr** Puntatore a GX_EVENT struttura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6959">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6960">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6960">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Disegno del pulsante mappa pixel riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap button draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6964">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6964">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6966">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6966">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(icon, event_ptr);
    
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6988">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6988">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6989">Assegnare mappe pixel al pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6989">Assign pixelmaps to button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6990">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6990">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6991">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6992">Questo servizio imposta le mappe pixel sul pulsante mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6992">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6993">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6993">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6994">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6994">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6995">**normal_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel da usare come stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6995">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6996">**selected_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel da usare quando si seleziona il pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6996">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6997">**disabled_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel da usare quando il pulsante è disabilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6997">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6998">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6998">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-6999">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Riuscito imposta la mappa pixel sul pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-6999">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7001">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7001">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7002">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7003">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7003">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7004">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7004">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_button,
    NORMAL_ID, SELECTED_ID,
    DISABLED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button is properly configured with the specified pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7026">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7026">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7027">Creare una richiesta di mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7027">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7028">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7029">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7030">Questo servizio crea un widget di richiesta pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7030">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7031">Un prompt della mappa pixel è diverso da un GX_PROMPT standard in quanto disegna lo sfondo del prompt usando le mappe pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7031">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7032">La funzione create accetta un ID mappa pixel, la mappa pixel di riempimento dello stato normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7032">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7033">Al prompt della mappa pixel possono essere assegnate fino a sei mappe pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7033">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7034">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7034">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7035">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della richiesta di mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7035">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7036">**name** Nome logico del widget di richiesta pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7036">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7037">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7037">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7038">**text_id** ID risorsa del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7038">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7039">**fill_id** ID risorsa di riempimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7039">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7040">**style** Stile della casella di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7040">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7041">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7041">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7042">**pixelmap_prompt_id** ID definito dall'applicazione del prompt della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7042">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7043">**size** Dimensioni del prompt della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7043">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7044">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7044">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione della mappa pixel riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7046">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7046">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7047">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7047">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7048">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7048">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7049">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7049">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7050">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7051">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7052">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7052">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7068">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7068">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7069">Richiesta di disegno di una mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7069">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7070">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7070">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7071">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7072">Questo servizio disegna un widget di richiesta pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7072">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7073">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per widget di richiesta mappa pixel personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7073">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7074">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7075">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della richiesta di mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7075">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7076">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7076">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7077">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7077">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7078">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7078">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7079">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7079">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7080">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7080">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap prompt draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7096">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7096">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7097">Assegnare mappe pixel alla richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7097">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7098">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7098">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7099">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7099">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7100">Questo servizio assegna gli ID della mappa pixel al prompt della mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7100">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7101">Gli ID pixelmap sinistro, di riempimento e destro vengono usati per consentire all'applicazione di usare un set di mappe pixel per richieste di varie larghezze, ma un'altezza comune da risparmiare sui requisiti di archiviazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7101">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7102">Se gli ID sinistro e destro non vengono usati, devono essere impostati su 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7102">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7103">Se il prompt deve disegnare se stesso in modo diverso quando ottiene lo stato attivo per l'input, a tale scopo vengono usati gli ID mappa pixel selezionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7103">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7104">Se gli ID selezionati non vengono usati o sono uguali agli ID normali, impostarli su 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7104">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7105">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7105">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7106">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della richiesta della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7106">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7107">**normal_left_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel da usare sul lato sinistro nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7107">**normal_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7108">**normal_fill_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel da usare come riempimento affiancato nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7108">**normal_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7109">**normal_right_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel da usare sul lato destro nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7109">**normal_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7110">**selected_left_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel da usare sul lato sinistro nello stato selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7110">**selected_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7111">**selected_fill_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel da usare come riempimento affiancato nello stato selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7111">**selected_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7112">**selected_right_id** ID risorsa della mappa pixel da usare sul lato destro nello stato selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7112">**selected_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the selected state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7113">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7113">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7114">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Riuscito imposta la mappa pixel sul prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7114">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7115">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7115">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7116">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7116">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7117">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7117">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Resource ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7118">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7118">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7119">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7119">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7120">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7120">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign pixelmap IDs to “my_prompt”. Only the normal state pixelmaps are used in this case */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set (&my_prompt,
    normal_left_id, normal_fill_id,
    normal_right_id, 0, 0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt is properly configured with pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7142">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7142">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7144">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,

    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7145">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7146">Questo servizio crea un widget del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7146">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7147">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7148">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7148">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7149">**name** Nome logico del widget del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7149">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7150">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7150">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7151">**info** Puntatore a una GX_SLIDER_INFO che contiene valori che definiscono il valore minimo del dispositivo di scorrimento, il valore massimo, il valore corrente e i limiti della lance.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7151">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7152">**Appendice I contiene** la definizione per GX_SLIDER_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7152">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7153">**pixelmap_info** Puntatore a una GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO che definisce le mappe pixel usate per disegnare lo sfondo e la lanceta del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7153">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7154">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7154">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7155">Lo sfondo del dispositivo di scorrimento può usare una o due mappe pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7155">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7156">Se disponibile, lo sfondo non cambia quando si sposta la lanceta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7156">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7157">Se vengono definiti due sfondi, lo sfondo prima della lanceta usa la prima mappa pixel di sfondo e lo sfondo dopo la lanceta usa la seconda mappa pixel di sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7157">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7158">**style** Stile del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7158">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7159">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7159">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7160">**pixelmap_slider_id** ID definito dall'applicazione del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7160">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7170">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7170">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```
