## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7190">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7190">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7191">Disegnare il dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7191">Draw pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7192">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7192">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7193">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7193">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7194">Questo servizio disegna un widget del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7194">This service draws a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7195">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget personalizzati del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7195">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap slider widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7196">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7197">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7197">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7198">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7198">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7199">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7199">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7200">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7200">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7201">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7201">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7202">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7202">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap slider drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap slider draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(pixelmap_slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7223">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7223">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7224">Elaborare l'evento del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7224">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7225">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7225">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7226">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7227">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il widget del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7227">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7228">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7228">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7229">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore alla mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7229">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7230">**Evento del** blocco del controllo dispositivo di scorrimento Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7230">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7231">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7231">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo evento dispositivo di scorrimento mappa pixel riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7233">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7233">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7236">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7236">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7237">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7237">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7238">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7238">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7259">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7259">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7260">Assegnare le mappe pixel al dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7260">Assign pixelmaps to slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7261">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7261">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixinfo);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7262">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7263">Questo servizio imposta le mappe pixel sul dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7263">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7264">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7265">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del dispositivo di scorrimento della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7265">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7266">**pixinfo** Puntatore a una GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO struttura che definisce le mappe pixel usate per disegnare lo sfondo e l'ago del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7266">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7267">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7267">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7268">Lo sfondo del dispositivo di scorrimento può usare una o due mappe pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7268">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7269">Se disponibile, lo sfondo non cambia quando si sposta l'ago.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7269">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7270">Se sono definiti due sfondi, lo sfondo prima dell'ago usa la prima mappa pixel di sfondo e lo sfondo dopo l'ago usa la seconda mappa pixel di sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7270">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7271">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7271">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7272">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Operazione riuscita imposta la mappa pixel sul dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7272">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7274">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7274">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7275">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7275">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7276">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7276">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7277">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7277">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7299">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7299">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7300">Disegnare lo sfondo dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7300">Draw progress bar background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7301">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7302">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7303">Questo servizio disegna lo sfondo dell'indicatore di stato specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7303">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7304">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente come parte di gx_progress_bar_draw(), ma viene esposta all'applicazione per supportare i casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione personalizzata di disegno dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7304">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7305">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7306">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7306">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7307">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7308">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7308">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7309">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7309">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7310">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7310">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7311">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7311">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7322">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7322">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7323">Creare un indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7323">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7324">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7324">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7325">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7325">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7326">Questo servizio crea un widget indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7326">This service creates a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7327">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7328">**progress_bar** Blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7328">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7329">**name** Nome logico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7329">**name** Logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7330">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7330">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7331">**progress_bar_info** Puntatore a una GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO struttura .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7331">**progress_bar_info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7332">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7332">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7333">**style** Stile dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7333">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7334">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7334">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7335">**progress_bar_id** ID definito dall'applicazione dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7335">**progress_bar_id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7336">**size** Dimensioni dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7336">**size** Dimensions of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7337">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7337">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7338">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione dell'indicatore di stato completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7338">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7339">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7339">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7340">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7340">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7341">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7341">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7342">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7342">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7346">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7346">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7357">gx_progress_bar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7357">gx_progress_bar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7358">Disegnare un indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7358">Draw a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7359">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7359">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7360">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7360">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7361">Questo servizio disegna un widget indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7361">This service draws a progress bar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7362">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per widget dell'indicatore di stato personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7362">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom progress bar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7363">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7363">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7364">**progress_bar** Blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7364">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7365">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7365">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7366">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7366">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7367">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7368">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7368">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7369">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7369">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7381">Avanzamento di un evento dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7381">Progress a progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7382">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7382">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7383">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7383">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7384">Questo servizio elabora un evento dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7384">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7385">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7385">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7386">**progress_bar** Blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7386">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7387">**event_ptr** Puntatore a GX_EVENT struttura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7387">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7388">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7388">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7389">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione richiesta riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7389">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7390">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7390">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7391">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7391">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7392">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7392">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7393">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7394">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7394">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7395">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7395">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7432">Impostare la struttura delle informazioni sull'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7432">Set progress bar information structure</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7433">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7433">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7434">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7434">Description</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7446">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7446">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7508">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7508">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7509">Impostare il colore del testo di un indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7509">Set the text color of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7510">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7510">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7511">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7511">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7512">Questo servizio imposta il colore del testo di un widget dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7512">This service sets the text color of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7513">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7513">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7514">**progress_bar** Blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7514">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7515">**normal_text_color** ID risorsa del colore del testo normale usato nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7515">**normal_text_color** Resource ID of normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7516">**selected_text_color** ID risorsa del colore del testo selezionato usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7516">**selected_text_color** Resource ID of selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7517">**disabled_text_color** ID risorsa del colore del testo disabilitato usato quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7517">**disabled_text_color** Resource ID of disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7518">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7518">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7519">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori del testo dell'indicatore di stato riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7519">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7520">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7520">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7521">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7521">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7522">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7522">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the progress bar “my_progress_bar”*/
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* if status is GX_SUCCESS, the progress bar text colors were successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7535">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7535">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7536">Disegnare il testo dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7536">Draw progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7537">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7537">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7538">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7539">Questo servizio disegna il testo dell'indicatore di stato specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7539">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7540">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente come parte del gx_progress_bar_draw(), ma viene esposta all'applicazione per supportare i casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di disegno personalizzata dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7540">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7541">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7542">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7542">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7543">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7544">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7544">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7545">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7546">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7546">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7547">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7558">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7558">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7559">Impostare il valore corrente di un indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7559">Set current value of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7560">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7560">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7561">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7561">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7562">Questo servizio assegna il valore corrente dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7562">This service assigns the progress bar current value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7563">Il widget dell'indicatore di stato viene automaticamente invalidato e ridisegnato quando viene modificato il valore dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7563">The progress bar widget will automatically invalidate and redraw itself when the progress bar value is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7564">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7564">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7565">**progress_bar** Blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7565">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7566">**value** Valore corrente dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7566">**value** Progress bar current value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7567">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7568">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Riuscito impostare il valore dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7568">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set the value of the progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7571">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7571">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7572">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7572">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7573">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7573">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_value_set(progress_bar, 50);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar value was successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7584">gx_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7584">gx_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7585">Richiesta di creazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7585">Create prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7586">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7586">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_create(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7587">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7588">Questo servizio crea un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7588">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7589">GX_PROMPT deriva da GX_WIDGET e supporta tutti gx_widget servizi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7589">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7590">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7590">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7591">**Puntatore** al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7591">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7592">**text_id** ID risorsa del testo della richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7592">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7593">**style** Stile del prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7593">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7594">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7594">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7595">**prompt_id** ID definito dall'applicazione del prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7595">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7596">**size** Dimensioni del prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7596">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7597">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7597">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7598">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione richiesta riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7598">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7601">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7601">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7602">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7602">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7603">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7604">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7604">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7605">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7605">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_create(&my_prompt, “my_promPt”, &my_parent,
                    MY_PROMPT_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PROPMT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the prompt “my_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7617">gx_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7617">gx_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7618">Prompt di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7618">Draw prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7619">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7619">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7620">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7620">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7621">Questo servizio disegna un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7621">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7622">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente da GUIX durante l'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma può essere chiamato anche da funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7622">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7623">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7623">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7624">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del widget di richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7624">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7625">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7625">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7626">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7626">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7627">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7627">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7628">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7628">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7629">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7629">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default prompt draw. */
    gx_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7641">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7641">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7642">Evento di richiesta di elaborazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7642">Process prompt event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7643">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7643">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7644">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7644">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7645">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il prompt specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7645">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7646">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione degli eventi di richiesta personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7646">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7647">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7647">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7648">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7648">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7649">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7649">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7650">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7650">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7651">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo dell'evento di richiesta riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7651">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7655">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7656">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7656">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7657">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7657">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7696">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7696">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7697">Impostare il colore del testo della richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7697">Set prompt text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7698">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7698">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_color_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7699">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7699">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7700">Questo servizio imposta il colore del testo di un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7700">This service sets the text color of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7701">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7701">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7702">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del widget di richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7702">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7703">**normal_color** ID risorsa di colore per il testo normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7703">**normal_color** Resource ID of color for normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7704">**L'appendice A** contiene ID risorsa a colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7704">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7705">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7705">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7706">**selected_color** ID risorsa del colore per il testo selezionato, usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7706">**selected_color** Resource ID of color for selected text, used when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7707">**L'Appendice A** contiene id risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7707">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7708">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7708">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7709">**disabled_color** ID risorsa del colore per il testo disabilitato, usato quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7709">**disabled_color** Resource ID of color for disabled text, used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7710">**L'Appendice A** contiene id risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7710">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7711">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7711">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7712">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7712">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7713">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori del testo della richiesta riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7713">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7714">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7714">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7715">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7715">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7716">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Dimensioni del widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7716">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Invalid widget size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7717">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7717">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7718">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7718">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7719">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7719">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text color of “my_prompt”. */

                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7734">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7735">Questa funzione di supporto disegna la parte di testo di un prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7735">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7736">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_prompt_draw() e viene fornita come API separata per praticità per le applicazioni che definiscono una funzione di disegno prompt personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7736">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7737">Le applicazioni che vogliono personalizzare il disegno in background del prompt possono fornire la funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il servizio gx_prompt_text_draw come parte del disegno personalizzato per disegnare il testo della richiesta sullo sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7737">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7738">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7738">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7739">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7739">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7740">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7740">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7741">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7741">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7742">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7743">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7743">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7744">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7744">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7758">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7758">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7759">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7759">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7760">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7760">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7761">Questo servizio ottiene il testo di un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7761">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7762">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7762">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7763">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del widget di richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7763">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7764">**return_text** Puntatore alla destinazione per il testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7764">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7765">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7765">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7766">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7766">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7767">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7767">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7768">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7768">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
GX_PROMPT my_prompt;
GX_CHAR *my_prompt_text;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */

```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7838">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7838">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7839">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7839">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7840">Questo servizio è stato deprecato a favore di gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7840">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7841">Questo servizio imposta il testo di un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7841">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7842">Se il widget di richiesta è stato creato con stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7842">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7843">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ad esempio potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7843">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7844">GX_PROMPT deriva da GX_WIDGET e pertanto tutti i gx_widget API possono essere usati con GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7844">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7845">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7845">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7846">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del widget di richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7846">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7847">**text** Puntatore al testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7847">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7848">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7848">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7849">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di testo di richiesta riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7849">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7851">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7851">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7852">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) La funzione di allocazione della memoria non è definita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7852">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7853">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7853">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7854">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7854">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7855">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7855">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7856">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7856">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “my_text”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, “my_text”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7868">gx_prompt_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7868">gx_prompt_text_set_ext</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7870">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7870">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set_ext(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7871">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7871">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7872">Questo servizio imposta il testo di un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7872">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7873">Se il widget di richiesta è stato creato con GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY stile, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7873">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7874">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ad esempio potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7874">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7875">GX_PROMPT deriva da GX_WIDGET e pertanto tutti i gx_widget API possono essere usati con GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7875">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7876">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7876">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7877">**prompt** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del widget di richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7877">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7878">**text** Puntatore al testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7878">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7879">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7879">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7880">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di testo della richiesta con esito positivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7880">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7881">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7881">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7882">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7882">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7883">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) La funzione di allocazione della memoria non è definita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7883">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7884">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7884">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7885">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7885">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7887">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7887">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string;
new_string.gx_string_ptr = “my_text”;
new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “new_string”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7899">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7899">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7900">Impostare l'angolo iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7900">Set starting angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7901">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7902">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7903">Questo servizio imposta l'angolo iniziale per l'indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7903">This service sets the starting angle for radial progress bar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7904">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7904">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7905">**indicatore di** stato Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7905">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7906">**angolo** Angolo iniziale dell'arco circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7906">**angle** Starting angle of the circular arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7907">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7907">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7908">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di ancoraggi dell'indicatore di stato radiale riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7908">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar anchor set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7909">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7909">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7910">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7910">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7911">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7911">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7912">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7912">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7913">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7913">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7914">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7914">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE start_angle = 90;

/* Set the start angle of “my_progress_bar” to 90 degree. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set(&my_progress_bar, start_angle);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7925">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7925">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7926">Disegnare lo sfondo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7926">Draw background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7927">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7927">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7928">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7928">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7929">Questo servizio disegna uno sfondo dell'indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7929">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7930">A questo servizio viene fatto riferimento internamente dalla funzione gx_radial_progress_bar_draw, ma viene esposto per l'uso da parte dell'applicazione nei casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione personalizzata di disegno dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7930">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

}
```
