## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7948">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7948">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7949">Creare un indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7949">Create radial progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7950">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7950">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_create(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info,
    ULONG style
    USHORT id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7951">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7952">Questo servizio crea un indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7952">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7953">Se l'GX_STYLE_ENABLED stile del widget viene applicato all'indicatore di stato, l'indicatore di stato accetterà pen_down, pen_drag e pen_up input per modificare il valore corrente dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7953">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7954">Lo stile del widget GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW può essere usato per abilitare il disegno del valore dell'indicatore di stato come testo all'interno dell'area dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7954">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7955">Se questo stile viene usato in combinazione con lo stile GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, il valore dell'indicatore di stato viene visualizzato come percentuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7955">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7956">In caso contrario, il valore dell'indicatore di stato viene visualizzato come valore angolare corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7956">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7957">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7958">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7958">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7959">**indicatore di** stato Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7959">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7960">**name** Nome dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7960">**name** Name of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7961">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7961">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7962">**info** Puntatore a una GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR struttura .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7962">**info** Pointer to a GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7963">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7963">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7964">**style** Stile dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7964">**style** Style of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7965">**id ID** dell'indicatore di stato definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7965">**id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7966">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione dell'indicatore di stato radiale completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7968">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7968">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7969">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7969">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7970">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7970">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7971">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7971">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7972">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7972">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7973">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7973">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7974">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7974">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7987">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7987">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7988">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7988">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7989">Questo servizio disegna un indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7989">This service draws a radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7990">Questo servizio viene usato internamente a cui fa riferimento la funzione gx_radial_progress_bar_create, ma viene esposto per l'uso da parte dell'applicazione nei casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di disegno dell'indicatore di stato radiale personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7990">This service is used internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7996">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7996">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-7997">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-7997">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(radial_progress);

}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8023">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8024">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8024">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8025">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8036">gx_radial_progress_bar_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8036">gx_radial_progress_bar_font_set</span></span>

```C
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8039">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8039">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8047">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8047">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8048">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8048">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8049">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8049">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

```C
/* Set font for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8063">gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8063">gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8064">Impostare le informazioni sull'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8064">Set radial progress bar information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8065">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8065">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8066">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8066">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8067">Questo servizio reimposta i parametri di informazioni assegnati all'indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8067">This service resets the information parameters assigned to the radial progress bar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8068">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8068">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8069">indicatore di stato **Puntatore** al blocco di controllo dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8069">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8070">**info** Puntatore alla struttura delle informazioni sull'indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8070">**info** Pointer to radial progress bar information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8071">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8071">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8072">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8072">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8073">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar info set (Set di informazioni sull'indicatore di stato radiale riuscito)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8073">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8074">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8074">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8075">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8075">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8076">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8076">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8077">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8077">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8078">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8078">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8079">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8079">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8090">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8090">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8125">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8125">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8126">Disegnare il testo dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8126">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8127">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8128">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8129">Questo servizio disegna il testo dell'indicatore di stato radiale specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8129">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8130">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente come parte di gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), ma viene esposta all'applicazione per supportare i casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione personalizzata di disegno dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8130">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8131">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8131">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8132">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8132">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8133">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8134">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8134">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8135">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8135">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8136">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8136">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8137">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8137">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8148">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8148">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8149">Impostare il valore dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8149">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8150">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8150">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8151">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8151">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8152">Questo servizio imposta il valore dell'indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8152">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8153">Il valore assegnato è limitato all'intervallo [-360, 360], definendo l'intervallo possibile di valori angolari per la posizione corrente dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8153">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8154">L'applicazione deve ridimensionare il valore reale indicato per assegnare un valore angolare al widget dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8154">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8155">L'indicatore di stato viene disegnato in modo che il valore corrente indichi il delta angolare tra la posizione di ancoraggio e il punto finale dell'arco superiore. I valori negativi determinano il disegnato dell'arco in senso orario a partire dalla posizione di ancoraggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8155">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8156">Il valore corrente positivo fa sì che l'arco sia disegnato in senso antiorario a partire dalla posizione di ancoraggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8156">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8157">Ad esempio, per disegnare un arco a partire dalla parte superiore dell'arco (posizione 12 ore) e terminando a destra (posizione delle tre ore), assegnare un valore di ancoraggio di 90 gradi e un valore corrente di -90 gradi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8157">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8158">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8158">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8159">**indicatore di** stato Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8159">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8160">**value** Nuovo valore dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8160">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8161">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8161">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8162">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Valore dell'indicatore di stato radiale riuscito impostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8162">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8163">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8163">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8164">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatori non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8164">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8165">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8165">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8166">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8166">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8167">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8167">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8168">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8168">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8179">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8179">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8180">Pulsante di opzione Crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8180">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8181">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8181">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8182">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8182">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8183">Questo servizio crea un widget di pulsante di opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8183">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8184">GX_RADIO_BUTTON deriva da GX_TEXT_BUTTON e pertanto tutti i servizi gx_text_button sono supportati anche da questo tipo di widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8184">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8185">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8185">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8186">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8186">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8187">**name** Nome logico del widget del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8187">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8188">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8188">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8189">**text_id** ID risorsa del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8189">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8190">**style** Stile del pulsante di opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8190">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8191">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8191">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8192">**radio_button_id** ID del pulsante di opzione definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8192">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8193">**size** Dimensioni del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8193">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8194">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8194">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione del pulsante di opzione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8197">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8197">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8198">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8198">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8199">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8199">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8219">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8219">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8220">Pulsante di opzione Disegna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8220">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8221">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8222">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8223">Questo servizio disegna un widget di pulsante di opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8223">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8224">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente dall'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma può essere chiamato anche da funzioni di disegno sottoposte a override.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8224">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8225">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8225">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8226">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8226">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8227">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8228">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8228">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8229">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8230">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8230">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8231">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8231">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8246">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8246">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8247">Impostare le mappe pixel per il pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8247">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8248">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8248">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8249">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8249">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8250">Questo servizio assegna le mappe pixel che devono essere visualizzate dal pulsante di opzione specificato per ogni stato del pulsante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8250">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8251">Gli ID risorsa possono essere duplicati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8251">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8252">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8252">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8253">**off_id** Mappa pixel usata per lo stato disattivato del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8253">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8254">**on_id** Mappa pixel usata per il pulsante di opzione sullo stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8254">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8255">**off_disabled_id** Mappa pixel usata per lo stato disabilitato e disattivato del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8255">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8256">**on_disabled_id** Mappa pixel usata per il pulsante di opzione disabilitato e nello stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8256">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8257">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di pixelmap dei pulsanti di opzione riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8261">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8261">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8262">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8262">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8263">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8263">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8264">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8264">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8279">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8279">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8280">Impostare l'elenco di ancoraggi del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8280">Set radial slider anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8281">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8281">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE *anchor_angles, 
    USHORT anchor_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8282">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8282">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8283">Questo servizio imposta gli angoli di ancoraggio per il dispositivo di scorrimento radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8283">This service sets anchor angles for radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8284">Se l'elenco degli angoli di ancoraggio è impostato, l'angolo del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale sarà uno degli angoli di ancoraggio definiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8284">If anchor angle list is set, the radial slider angle will be one of defined anchor angles.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8285">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8285">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8286">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Blocco di controllo dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8286">**slider** Radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8287">**anchor_angles** Elenco di angoli da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8287">**anchor_angles** Angle list to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8288">**anchor_count** Conteggio degli angoli di ancoraggio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8288">**anchor_count** Count of the anchor angles</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8289">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8289">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8290">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare gli angoli di ancoraggio con esito positivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8290">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful anchor angles set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8292">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8292">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8293">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Elenco di ancoraggio non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8293">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8294">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8294">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8295">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8295">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8296">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8296">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8307">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8307">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8308">Impostare l'angolo del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8308">Set radial slider angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8309">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8309">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8310">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8310">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8311">Questo servizio imposta il nuovo valore dell'angolo per il dispositivo di scorrimento radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8311">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8312">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8312">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8313">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8313">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8314">**new_angle** Nuovo valore angolare da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8314">**new_angle** New angle value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8315">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8315">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8316">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostazione dell'angolo del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8316">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider angle set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8317">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8317">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8318">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8318">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8319">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8319">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8320">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8320">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8321">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8321">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8322">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8322">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_radial_slider” angle to 0 degree(3 o’clock position). */
status = gx_radial_slider_angle_set(&my_radial_slider, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_radial_slider” has been set to 0 degree. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8333">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8333">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8334">Creare informazioni sull'animazione del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8334">Create radial slider animation info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8335">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8335">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8336">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8336">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8337">Questo servizio imposta i passaggi di animazione, il tempo di ritardo e gli stili di animazione per l'animazione radiale della lanceta del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8337">This service sets animation steps, delay time and animation styles for radial slider needle animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8338">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8338">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8339">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8339">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8340">**passaggi** Passaggi totali per un'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8340">**steps** Total steps for one animation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8341">**ritardo** Tempo di ritardo per ogni passaggio dell'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8341">**delay** Delay time for each animation step</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8342">**animation_style** Il tipo di funzione di easing include:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8342">**animation_style** Easing function type, includes:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8343">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8343">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8344">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8344">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8345">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8345">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8346">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8346">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8347">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8347">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8348">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8348">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8349">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8349">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8350">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8350">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8351">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8351">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8352">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8352">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8353">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8353">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8354">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8354">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8355">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8355">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8356">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8356">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8357">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8357">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8358">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8358">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8359">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8359">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8360">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8360">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8361">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8361">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8362">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8362">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8363">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8363">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8364">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8364">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8365">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8365">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8366">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8366">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8367">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8367">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8368">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8368">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8369">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8369">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8370">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8370">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8371">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8371">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8372">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8372">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8373">**animation_update_callback** Funzione di callback definita dall'utente che verrà chiamata dopo ogni passaggio dell'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8373">**animation_update_callback** User-defined callback function that will be called after each animation step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8374">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8374">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8375">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di animazioni con dispositivo di scorrimento radiale riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8375">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider animation set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8376">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8376">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8377">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8377">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8378">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8378">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8379">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8379">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8380">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8380">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8381">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8381">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8392">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8392">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8393">Impostare il nuovo valore del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale con l'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8393">Set new radial slider value with animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8394">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8394">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_start(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE target_angle);
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8418">gx_radial_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8418">gx_radial_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8419">Creare un dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8419">Create radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8420">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8420">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_create(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT slider_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8421">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8421">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8422">Questo servizio crea un widget di dispositivo di scorrimento radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8422">This service creates a radial slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8423">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8423">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8424">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8424">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8425">**name** Nome logico del widget del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8425">**name** Logical name of radial slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8426">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8426">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8427">**info** Definizione dell'aspetto del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale, **Appendice I** che contiene la definizione GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8427">**info** Radial slider appearance definition, **Appendix I** contains definition to GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8428">**style** Stile del pulsante di opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8428">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8429">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8429">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8430">**radio_button_id** ID definito dall'applicazione del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8430">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radial slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8431">**size** Dimensioni del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8431">**size** Dimensions of radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8432">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8432">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8434">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8434">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8435">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8435">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8436">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8436">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8437">**GX_INVALID_** DIMENSIONI (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8437">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8438">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8438">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8439">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8439">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8440">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8440">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8441">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8441">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8492">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8492">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```


### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8533">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8533">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8536">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8536">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8538">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8538">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8539">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8539">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8540">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8540">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8541">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8542">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8542">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8543">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8543">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8582">Creare una visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8582">Create a rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8583">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8583">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_rich_text_view_create(
    GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS *fonts,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8584">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8584">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8585">Questo servizio crea una visualizzazione RTF come specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8585">This service creates a rich text view as specified.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8586">**I tag di formattazione vengono usati per visualizzare tipi speciali per il testo:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8586">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8587">**\<b>\</b>** Impostare il tipo di carattere del testo con l'ID carattere in grassetto specificato dall'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8587">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8588">**\<i>\</i>** Impostare il tipo di carattere del testo con l'ID carattere corsivo specificato dall'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8588">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8589">**\<u>\</u>** Abilitare la sottolineatura del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8589">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8590">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Impostare il tipo di carattere del testo con l'ID del tipo di carattere specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8590">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8591">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Impostare il tipo di carattere del testo con l'ID colore specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8591">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8592">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Impostare l'ID colore specificato per l'evidenziazione del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8592">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8593">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Impostare l'allineamento del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8593">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8594">**Esempi di formattazione dell'utilizzo dei tag:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8594">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8595">\<b>Testo in grassetto<\b></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8595">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8596">\<i>Si tratta del testo in corsivo<\i></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8596">\<i>This is italic text<\i></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8597">\<u>Si tratta di testo con sottolineatura<\u></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8597">\<u>This is text with underline<\u></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8598">\<f 0>Questo ID carattere di testo è impostato su 0<\f></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8598">\<f 0>This text font id is set to 0<\f></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8599">\<c 1>Questo ID colore del testo è impostato su 1<\c></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8599">\<c 1>This text color id is set to 1<\c></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8600">\<hc 2>Questo ID colore di evidenziazione del testo è impostato su 2<\hc></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8600">\<hc 2>This text highlight color id is set to 2<\hc></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8601">\<align left> Questo testo viene allineato a sinistra<\allineare></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8601">\<align left> This text is left aligned<\align></span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8602">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8602">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8603">**text_view** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di visualizzazione TESTO RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8603">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8604">**name** Nome della visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8604">**name** Name of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8605">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8605">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8606">**text_id** ID risorsa della stringa di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8606">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8607">**tipi di carattere** Puntatore alle informazioni sul tipo di carattere della visualizzazione RTF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8607">**fonts** Pointer to the rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8608">**Apendix I contiene** la definizione per GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8608">**Apendix I** contains definition to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8609">**style** Stile del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8609">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8610">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8610">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8611">**ID** ID definito dall'applicazione della visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8611">**id** Application-defined ID of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8612">**size** Dimensioni della visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8612">**size** Size of the rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8613">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8613">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione corretta della visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8617">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8617">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8618">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8618">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8619">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8620">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8620">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8621">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8621">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8627">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8627">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8628">Disegnare una visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8628">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8629">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8629">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8630">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8630">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8631">Questo servizio disegna il widget di visualizzazione rtf specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8631">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8632">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente da GUIX come parte di un'operazione di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma viene esposto anche all'applicazione che potrebbe voler fornire una funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il disegno della visualizzazione RTF predefinito come base di disegno personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8632">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8633">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8633">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8634">**text_view** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget di visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8634">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8635">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8635">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8636">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8636">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8637">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8638">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8638">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8639">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8639">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```
