## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8644">gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8644">gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8645">Impostare i tipi di carattere della visualizzazione TESTO RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8645">Set rich text view fonts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8648">Questo servizio imposta i tipi di carattere di un widget di visualizzazione testo RTF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8648">This service sets the fonts of a rich text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8649">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8649">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8650">**text_view** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione TESTO RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8650">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8651">**tipi di carattere** Puntatore alle informazioni sul tipo di carattere della visualizzazione RTF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8651">**fonts** Pointer to rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8652">**Apendix I contiene** le definizioni da GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8652">**Apendix I** contains definitions to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8653">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8653">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8654">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di caratteri di visualizzazione RTF riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8654">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view fonts set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8655">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8655">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8656">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8656">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8657">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8657">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8658">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8658">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8659">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8659">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8660">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8660">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;

/* Replace the font ids as needed. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Set the font of “my_rich_view”. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(&my_rich_view, &fonts);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for rich text view “my_rich_view” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8665">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8665">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8666">Disegnare testo in visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8666">Draw rich text view text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8667">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8667">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8668">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8668">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8669">Questa funzione di supporto disegna la parte di testo di una visualizzazione RTF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8669">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8670">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_rich_text_view_draw() e viene fornita come API separata per praticità per le applicazioni che definiscono una funzione di disegno di visualizzazione di testo RTF personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8670">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8671">Le applicazioni che vogliono personalizzare il disegno in background della visualizzazione RTF possono fornire la funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il servizio gx_rich_text_view_text_draw come parte del disegno personalizzato per disegnare il testo della visualizzazione RTF sullo sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8671">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8672">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8672">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8673">**text_view** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8673">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8674">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8674">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8675">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8675">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8676">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8676">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8677">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8677">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8678">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8678">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8683">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8683">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8684">Inizializzare uno stack di schermate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8684">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8685">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8685">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8686">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8686">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8687">Questo servizio inizializza uno stack di schermate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8687">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8688">L'applicazione deve definire il blocco di memoria e le dimensioni del buffer usati per implementare la funzionalità dello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8688">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8689">*Questa API è obsoleta e viene sostituita con gx_system_screen_stack_create(). Questa versione viene fornita solo per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti della libreria.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8689">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8690">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8690">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8691">**controllo** Blocco di controllo dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8691">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8692">**memory_buffer** Puntatore a un buffer di memoria usato come stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8692">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8693">**buffer_size** Dimensioni della memoria in byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8693">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8694">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8694">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8695">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione dello stack di schermate completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8695">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8696">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8696">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8697">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Dimensioni del buffer non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8697">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8698">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8699">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8699">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8700">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8700">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8701">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8701">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8705">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8705">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8706">Rimuovere la voce più in alto dallo stack di schermate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8706">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8707">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8707">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8708">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8708">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8709">Questo servizio rimuove la voce più in alto dallo stack dello schermo e collega la schermata selezionata al padre precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8709">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8710">Questa API scollega anche tutti gli elementi figlio esistenti dall'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8710">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8711">*Questa API è obsoleta e viene sostituita con gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Questa versione viene fornita solo per la compatibilità con le versioni precedenti della libreria.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8711">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8712">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8712">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8713">**controllo** Blocco di controllo dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8713">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8714">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8715">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Popup dello stack dello schermo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8715">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8716">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8716">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8717">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8717">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8718">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8719">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8719">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8720">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8720">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_pop(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8724">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8724">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8725">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8725">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8726">Eseguire il push della schermata e dei relativi elementi padre da impilare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8726">Push screen and its parents to stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8727">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8727">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_push(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8728">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8729">Questo servizio scollega lo schermo dal relativo elemento padre e inserisce il puntatore sullo schermo e il puntatore padre nello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8729">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8730">Il nuovo puntatore sullo schermo viene quindi collegato all'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8730">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8731">*Questa API è obsoleta e viene sostituita con gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Questa versione viene fornita solo per la compatibilità con le versioni precedenti della libreria.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8731">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8732">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8732">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8733">**controllo** Blocco di controllo dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8733">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8734">**schermata** Puntatore a schermo da eseguire il push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8734">**screen** Screen pointer to push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8735">**new_screen** Puntatore della nuova schermata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8735">**new_screen** Pointer of the new screen</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8736">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8737">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Push dello stack dello schermo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8737">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8738">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8738">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8739">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8739">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8740">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8740">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8741">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8741">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8742">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8742">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Push “screen” and its parent to screen stack, Dettach “screen” from its parent, and attach “new screen” to the parent. */
status = gx_screen_stack_push(&my_stack_control,
                                screen, new_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “screen” and its parent have been pushed to screen stack, “screen” has been detached from its parent, “new_screen” has been attached to the parent. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8744">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8744">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8745">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8745">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8748">Rimuove tutte le voci dallo stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8748">Removes all entries from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8749">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8749">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_reset(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8750">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8750">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8751">Questo servizio rimuove tutte le voci dallo stack di schermate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8751">This service removes all entries from the screen stack.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8752">*Questa API è obsoleta e viene sostituita con gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Questa versione viene fornita solo per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti della libreria.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8752">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8753">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8753">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8755">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8755">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8756">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione casella di scorrimento riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8756">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8757">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8757">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8758">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8758">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8759">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8759">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8760">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8760">Example</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8765">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8765">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8766">Creare il cursore di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8766">Create scroll thumb</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8767">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8767">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_create(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_SCROLLBAR *parent, ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8768">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8769">Questo servizio crea una rotellina a scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8769">This service creates a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8770">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente quando viene creato un GX_SCROLLBAR, ma viene reso pubblico per consentire implementazioni personalizzate della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8770">This service is normally called internally when a GX_SCROLLBAR is created, but is made public in order to allow custom scrollbar implementations.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8774">**style** Stile del widget della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8774">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8775">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8775">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8776">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8776">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8780">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8780">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8781">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8781">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8782">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8782">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_THUMB my_scroll_thumb;
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8789">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8789">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8791">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8791">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8792">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8792">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8793">Questo servizio disegna una rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8793">This service draws a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8794">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente dall'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma può essere chiamato anche da funzioni di disegno sottoposte a override.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8794">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8795">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8795">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8797">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8797">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8798">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8798">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8799">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8799">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8801">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8801">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scroll thumb drawing function. */

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8805">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8805">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8806">Elaborare l'evento del cursore di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8806">Process scroll thumb event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8807">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8807">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8808">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8809">Questo servizio gestisce gli eventi inviati a una rotellina del cursore della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8809">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8810">Questo servizio viene in genere usato internamente da GUIX, ma viene reso pubblico per facilitare l'implementazione di comportamenti personalizzati della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8810">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8811">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8812">**scroll_thumb** Blocco di controllo del widget scroll thumb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8812">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8813">**event** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8813">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8814">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8814">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process (Processo dell'evento scroll thumb riuscito)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8819">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8820">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8821">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8821">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8825">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8825">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8826">Creare un widget della rotellina di scorrimento di base</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8826">Create a base scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8827">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8827">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_create( 
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8828">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8828">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8829">Questo servizio crea un widget della rotellina di scorrimento di base.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8829">This service creates a base scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8830">Una rotellina di scorrimento di base è il widget di base per tutti i  tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento, inclusi i widget **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** **e gx_text_scroll_wheel,** che è la base per i widget gx_numeric_scroll_wheel e **gx_string_ scroll_wheel** di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8830">A base scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** and **gx_text_scroll_wheel** which is the base for **gx_numeric_scroll_wheel** and **gx_string_ scroll_wheel** widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8831">Il widget della rotellina di scorrimento di base fornisce la gestione degli eventi, l'animazione di scorrimento e il calcolo delle righe selezionate per tutti i tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8831">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8832">Le applicazioni in genere non creano un'istanza di un widget della rotellina di scorrimento generico, poiché questo tipo di widget non fornisce alcuna funzione di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8832">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8833">Tuttavia, viene fornito l'accesso a questa API per assistere le applicazioni che devono creare un tipo di widget della rotellina di scorrimento personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8833">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8834">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL è basato su GX_WINDOW e pertanto tutte le API GX_WINDOW possono essere usate con GX_SCROLL_WHEEL e widget derivati da GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8834">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8835">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8835">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8836">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8836">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8837">**name** Nome del widget assegnato dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8837">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8838">**padre** Widget padre o GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8838">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8839">**total_rows** Totale righe disponibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8839">**total_rows** Total available rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8840">**style** Flag di stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8840">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8841">**ID ID** widget assegnato dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8841">**id** Application assigned widget ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8842">**size** Rettangolo che definisce le dimensioni iniziali del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8842">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8843">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8843">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8844">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione della rotellina di scorrimento completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8844">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8845">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8845">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8846">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8846">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8847">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8847">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8848">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8848">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8849">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8849">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8850">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8850">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8851">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8851">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8852">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8852">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8872">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8872">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8873">Funzione di elaborazione degli eventi per il widget della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8873">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8874">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8874">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8875">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8875">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8876">Questo servizio fornisce la gestione degli eventi di input di base per tutti i tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8876">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8877">Questa funzione viene esposta al software dell'applicazione per facilitare le applicazioni che devono creare un tipo di widget della rotellina di scorrimento personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8877">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8878">Le applicazioni forniscono spesso la propria funzione di elaborazione degli eventi, ma richiamano l'elaborazione generica degli eventi per i widget ruota per gli eventi che non devono personalizzare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8878">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8879">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8879">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8880">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8880">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8881">**evento** GX_EVENT puntatore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8881">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8882">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8882">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8883">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo di evento della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8883">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8884">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8884">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8885">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8885">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8886">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8886">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8887">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8887">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8888">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8888">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8889">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8889">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8909">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8909">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8910">Assegnare valori alfa sfumatura per la sfumatura di sovrimpressione facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8910">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8911">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8911">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8912">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8912">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8913">Questo servizio definisce i valori alfa iniziale e finale per una sovrimpressione sfumatura facoltativa del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8913">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8914">Tutti i widget della rotellina di scorrimento supportano un effetto "dissolvenza" delle righe della rotellina di scorrimento come righe vicino al bordo superiore e inferiore del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8914">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8915">Questo effetto di dissolvenza viene ottenuto disegnando una mappa pixel sfumatura sulle righe della rotellina di scorrimento, che fanno sembrare che le righe si sfumatono mentre le righe vengono disegnate nella parte superiore e inferiore del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8915">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8916">Questo servizio API consente all'applicazione di modificare l'intensità dell'effetto dissolvente o disabilitare completamente questo effetto impostando i valori alfa di inizio e fine su 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8916">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8917">La mappa pixel sfumatura viene creata in fase di esecuzione quando la rotellina di scorrimento diventa inizialmente visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8917">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8918">A tale scopo, è necessario che sia stato definito un servizio di allocazione di memoria di runtime _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8918">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8919">Se non è stata definita alcuna funzione allocatore di memoria, l'immagine sfumato non verrà creata e non sarà disponibile alcun effetto di dissolvenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8919">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8920">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8920">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8921">**wheel** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8921">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8922">**start_alpha** Valore alfa iniziale della sfumatura di sovrimpressione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8922">**start_alpha** The overlay gradient starting alpha value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8923">**end_alpha** Valore alfa finale della sfumatura sovrapposta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8923">**end_alpha** The overlay gradient ending alpha value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8924">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8924">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8925">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente il valore alfa della sfumatura della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8925">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the scroll wheel gradient alpha</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8927">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8927">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8928">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8928">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8929">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8929">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8930">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8930">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8931">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8931">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(&wheel, 240, 0);
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel gradient alpha values were
Successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8951">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8951">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8952">Assegnare l'altezza della riga per ogni riga della rotellina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8952">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8953">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8953">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8954">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8954">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8955">Questo servizio assegna l'altezza della riga per ogni riga della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8955">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8956">Si noti che se la rotellina di scorrimento ha uno stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, l'altezza della riga passa attraverso una trasformazione che riduce in modo efficace l'altezza della riga quando la riga si avvicina al bordo superiore o inferiore della rotellina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8956">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8957">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8958">**wheel** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8958">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8959">**row_height** Valore dell'altezza della riga, in pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8959">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8960">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8960">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente l'altezza della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8965">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8966">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8966">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8967">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8967">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8987">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8987">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8988">Assegnare l'immagine di sfondo per la riga selezionata della rotellina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8988">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8989">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8989">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8990">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8990">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8991">Questo servizio assegna un ID pixelmap facoltativo che viene disegnato dietro la riga selezionata della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8991">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8992">Può essere usato per evidenziare la riga selezionata in modo che l'utente possa distinguere facilmente quale riga della rotellina di scorrimento è selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8992">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8993">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8993">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8994">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8994">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8995">**image_id** ID mappa pixel da usare come immagine di sfondo della riga selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8995">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8996">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8997">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente lo sfondo della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8997">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-8999">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-8999">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9000">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9000">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9001">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9002">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9002">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9003">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9003">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9023">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9023">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9024">Recuperare la riga della rotellina attualmente selezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9024">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9025">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9025">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9026">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9027">Questo servizio esegue una query sulla rotellina di scorrimento per recuperare la riga attualmente selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9027">This service will query the scroll wheel to retrieve the currently selected row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9028">Il chiamante deve passare la posizione per restituire l'indice di riga selezionato come secondo parametro per questa funzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9028">The caller must pass the location to return the selected row index as the second parameter to this function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9029">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9029">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9030">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9030">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9031">**riga** Posizione in cui verrà restituito il valore di riga selezionato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9031">**row** Location in which selected row value will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9032">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9032">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9033">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperato correttamente la riga della rotellina selezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9033">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9034">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9034">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9035">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9035">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9036">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9036">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9037">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9037">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9038">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9038">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9039">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9039">Example</span></span>

```C
INT row;
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(&wheel, &row);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the selected row has been returned in
the row variable. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9059">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9059">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9060">Assegnare la riga selezionata della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9060">Assign selected scroll wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9061">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9061">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9062">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9062">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9063">Questo servizio assegna la riga della rotellina di scorrimento attualmente selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9063">This service assigns the currently selected scroll wheel row.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9064">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9064">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9065">**wheel** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9065">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9066">**riga** Riga della rotellina di scorrimento da selezionare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9066">**row** Row of the scroll wheel to be selected.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9067">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9067">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9068">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente la riga della rotellina selezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9068">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9069">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9069">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9070">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9070">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9071">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9071">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9072">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9072">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9073">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9073">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9074">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9074">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(&wheel, 20);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been set to select
row 20 */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9094">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9094">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9095">Assegnare la velocità di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9095">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9096">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9097">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9098">Questo servizio assegna la velocità di scorrimento per il widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9098">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9099">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9099">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9100">**wheel** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9100">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9101">**start_speed_rate** Frequenza di scorrimento della velocità di avvio alla velocità di scorrimento rapido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9101">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9102">**end_speed_rate** Velocità di scorrimento della velocità finale alla velocità di scorrimento rapido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9102">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9103">**max_steps** Numero massimo di passaggi per lo scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9103">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9104">**ritardo** Tempo di ritardo di ogni passaggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9104">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9105">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9105">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9106">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente la velocità della ruota</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9106">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9108">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9108">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9109">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9109">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9110">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9110">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9111">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9111">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9112">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9112">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9113">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9113">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(&wheel, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(2),
                                GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2, 10, 2);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel speed has been
successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9133">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9133">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9134">Assegnare le righe della rotellina di scorrimento totali disponibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9134">Assign the total scroll wheel rows available</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9135">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9135">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9136">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9136">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9137">Questo servizio assegna il numero di righe disponibili nella rotellina di scorrimento indicata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9137">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9138">Il widget della rotellina di scorrimento riceve in genere il contenuto della riga dall'applicazione sotto forma di una matrice di stringhe o di dati stringa forniti dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9138">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9139">Questa API informa la rotellina del numero totale di righe che devono essere presentate all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9139">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9140">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9140">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9141">**wheel** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9141">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9142">**total_rows** Numero totale di righe wheel da presentare all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9142">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9143">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9143">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9144">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente la riga del totale della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9144">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9145">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9145">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9170">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9170">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9171">Disegnare la barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9171">Draw scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9172">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9172">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9173">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9173">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9174">Questo servizio disegna una barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9174">This service draws a scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9175">Per i widget della barra di scorrimento verticale e orizzontale viene usata una funzione di disegno comune.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9175">A common drawing function is used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9176">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente dall'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma può essere chiamato anche da funzioni di disegno sottoposte a override.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9176">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9177">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9177">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9178">**barra di scorrimento** Widget della barra di scorrimento da disegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9178">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9179">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9180">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9180">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9181">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9181">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9182">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9182">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9183">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9183">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scrollbar drawing function. */

VOID my_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar)
{
    /* Call default scrollbar draw. */
    gx_scrollbar_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```
