## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9190">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9190">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9191">Evento della barra di scorrimento del processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9191">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9192">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9192">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9193">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9193">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9194">Questo servizio elabora un evento della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9194">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9195">Una funzione di gestione degli eventi comune usata per i widget della barra di scorrimento verticale e orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9195">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9196">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9197">**barra di scorrimento** Blocco di controllo widget della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9197">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9198">**event** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9198">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9199">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9199">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9200">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Operazione riuscita della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9200">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9201">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9201">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9202">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9202">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9203">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9203">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9204">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9205">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9205">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9206">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9206">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_limit_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9213">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9213">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9215">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9215">Prototype</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9217">Questo servizio controlla il limite della barra di scorrimento e impedisce alla rotellina della barra di scorrimento di superare i limiti predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9217">This service checks the limit of the scrollbar and prevents the scrollbar thumbwheel from traveling beyond the predefined limits.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9220">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9220">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9222">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9222">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9223">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9223">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9224">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9224">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9225">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9225">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9226">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9226">Initialization and threads</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9248">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Informazioni di scorrimento non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9248">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9249">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9249">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9250">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9250">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9251">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9251">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9258">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9258">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9259">Assegnare il valore della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9259">Assign scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9260">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9260">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_value_set(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9261">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9261">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9262">Questo servizio assegna il valore corrente della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9262">This service assigns the current scrollbar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9263">Un GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL o GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL verrà generato un evento nella finestra padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9263">A GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL event will be generated to the parent window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9264">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9265">**barra di scorrimento** Blocco di controllo widget della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9265">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9266">**value** Nuovo valore della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9266">**value** New scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9267">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9267">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Operazione riuscita della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9269">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9269">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9270">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9270">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9271">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9271">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9272">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9272">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9273">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9273">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9274">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9274">Threads</span></span>

```C
/* Assign new value for scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

status = gx_scrollbar_value_set(&my_scrollbar, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current position of scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been set. */

```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9282">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9282">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_backspace(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9286">Questo servizio elimina il carattere prima della posizione del cursore di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9286">This service deletes the character before text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9287">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento backspace key down, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9287">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9295">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9295">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9319">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9319">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9321">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9329">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9329">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9330">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9330">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9355">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9355">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9356">Recupera le informazioni sul buffer del widget di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9356">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9357">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9357">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address, 
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9358">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9358">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9359">Questo servizio recupera le informazioni sul buffer del widget di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9359">This service retrieves buffer information of the text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9360">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9360">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9361">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9361">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9362">**buffer_address** Indirizzo del buffer di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9362">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9363">**content_size** Numero di byte dei dati di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9363">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9364">**buffer_size** Dimensioni del buffer di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9364">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9365">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9365">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9366">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Le informazioni sul buffer sono state recuperate correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9366">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved buffer information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9368">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9368">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9369">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9369">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9370">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9370">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9371">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9371">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9372">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9372">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT buffer_size;
UINT content_size;

/* Retrieve buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
                    &buffer_address, &string_size, &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9469">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9469">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9470">Creare un widget di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9470">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9471">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9471">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9472">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9472">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9473">Questo servizio crea un widget di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9473">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9474">Il chiamante deve fornire spazio di archiviazione per la stringa di input e indicare la lunghezza massima della stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9474">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9475">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT deriva da GX_PROMPT e pertanto tutti gx_prompt servizi possono essere usati con GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9475">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9476">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9477">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9477">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9478">**name** Nome logico del widget facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9478">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9479">**padre** Widget padre facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9479">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9480">**input_buffer** Archiviazione per la stringa di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9480">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9481">**buffer_size** Dimensioni dell'area di archiviazione delle stringhe di input, in byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9481">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9482">**style** Flag di stile di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9482">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9483">**text_input_id** ID facoltativo del widget di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9483">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9484">**size** Rettangolo che definisce le dimensioni iniziali del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9484">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9485">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9485">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9486">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione dell'input di testo a riga singola completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9486">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9487">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9487">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9488">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9488">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9489">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9489">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9490">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9490">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9492">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9492">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9493">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9493">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9494">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9494">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9516">gx_single_line_text_input_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9516">gx_single_line_text_input_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9517">Disegnare un widget di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9517">Draw a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9518">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9519">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9520">Questo servizio disegna un widget di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9520">This service draws a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9521">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente durante l'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma può essere chiamato anche da funzioni di disegno di input di testo personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9521">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text input drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9522">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9522">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9523">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9523">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9524">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9524">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9525">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9525">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9526">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9526">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9527">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9527">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9528">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9528">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
    /* Call default single line text input draw. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw(input);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9550">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9550">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9551">Recuperare la posizione iniziale di disegno del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9551">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9552">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9553">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9554">Questo servizio recupera la posizione iniziale di disegno del testo di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9554">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9555">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9556">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9556">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9557">**xpos** Recuperata la posizione iniziale di disegno nella coordinata x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9557">**xpos** Retrieved draw start position in x coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9558">**ypos** Recuperata la posizione iniziale di disegno nella coordinata y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9558">**ypos** Retrieved draw start position in y coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9559">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9559">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9560">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostare correttamente il cursore di input di testo alla fine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9560">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9561">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9561">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9562">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9562">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9563">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9563">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9564">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9564">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9565">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9565">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9587">Spostare il cursore di input di testo alla fine della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9587">Move the text input cursor to the string end</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9588">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9588">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_end(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9589">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9590">Questo servizio posiziona il cursore del widget di input di testo alla fine della stringa di input.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9590">This service positions the text input widget cursor at the end of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9591">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di chiusura del tasto DIS, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9591">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9592">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9592">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9593">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9593">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9594">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9594">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9595">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostare correttamente il cursore di input di testo alla fine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9595">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9596">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9596">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9597">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9597">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9598">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9598">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9599">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9599">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9600">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9600">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9601">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9601">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to end. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to end. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9623">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9623">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9624">Funzione di elaborazione degli eventi del widget di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9624">Text input widget event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9625">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9625">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9626">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9626">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9627">Questo servizio elabora un evento di input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9627">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9628">Questa funzione fa riferimento internamente alla funzione gx_single_line_text_input_create, ma viene esposta per l'uso da parte dell'applicazione nei casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di elaborazione dell'evento di input di testo a riga singola personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9628">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9639">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9639">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9661">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9661">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9662">Impostare il colore di sfondo dell'input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9662">Set single line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9663">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9664">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9665">Questo servizio imposta il colore di riempimento dell'input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9665">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9666">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9666">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9667">**text_input** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9667">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9668">**normal_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del widget nello stato normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9668">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9669">**L'appendice A** contiene ID risorsa a colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9669">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9670">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa a colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9670">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9671">**selected_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del widget quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9671">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9672">**L'appendice A** contiene ID risorsa a colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9672">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9673">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa a colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9673">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9674">**disabled_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del widget quando lo stile GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9674">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9675">**L'appendice A** contiene ID risorsa a colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9675">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9676">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa a colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9676">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9677">**readonly_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del widget quando sono impostati GX_STYLE_ENABLED e GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY di stile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9677">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9678">**L'appendice A** contiene ID risorsa a colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9678">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9679">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa a colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9679">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9687">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9687">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9709">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9709">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9712">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9712">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9713">Questo servizio sposta la posizione del cursore di input di testo all'inizio della stringa di input.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9713">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9714">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento home key down, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9714">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9720">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9720">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9746">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9746">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9747">Spostare il cursore di input di un carattere a sinistra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9747">Move input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9748">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9748">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9749">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9749">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9750">Questo servizio sposta il cursore di input di testo di un carattere a sinistra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9750">This service moves the text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9751">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di tasto di scelta, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9751">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9752">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9752">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9753">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9753">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9754">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9754">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9755">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Il cursore è stato spostato correttamente a sinistra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9755">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the left</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9756">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9756">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9757">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9757">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9758">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9758">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor one character to the left. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input cursor has been moved one character to the left. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9783">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9783">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9784">Spostare il cursore in posizione pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9784">Move cursor to pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9785">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9785">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    INT pixel_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9786">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9786">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9787">Questo servizio posiziona il cursore di input di testo in base alla posizione in pixel richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9787">This service positions the text input cursor based on the requested pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9788">L'indice del cursore di input di testo verrà calcolato in base al valore x della posizione in pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9788">The text input cursor index will be calculated based on the x value of the pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9789">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento pen down, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9789">This service is called internally when a pen down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9790">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9790">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9791">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9791">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9792">**pixel_position** Valore X della posizione in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9792">**pixel_position** X value of pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9793">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9793">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente il cursore sulla posizione richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the cursor to requested position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9797">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9797">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9798">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9799">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9799">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9800">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9800">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set cursor to requested position. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(&my_text_input,
                                                100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget cursor has been positioned */
```

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9825">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9825">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9826">Questo servizio sposta il cursore di input di testo di un carattere a destra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9826">This service moves the text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9827">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di tasto di scelta, ma può essere richiamato anche dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9827">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9830">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9830">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9832">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9832">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9833">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9833">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9834">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9834">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


```C
    ULONG style);
```

```C
    ULONG style);
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9931">gx_single_line_text_input_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9931">gx_single_line_text_input_style_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9932">Impostare gli stili di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9932">Set text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9933">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9933">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9934">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9935">Questo servizio imposta gli stili specificati sul widget di input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9935">This service sets the specified style(s) to the single line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9936">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9936">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9937">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9937">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9938">**Flag di** stile da assegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9938">**style** style flags to assign</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9939">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9939">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9940">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente lo stile di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9940">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text input style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9941">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9941">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9942">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9942">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9943">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9943">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9944">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9944">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9945">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9945">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9946">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9946">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style for “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_style_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input style has been successfully set to the specified styles. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9966">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9966">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9967">Impostare il colore del testo di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9967">Set single line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9968">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9968">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9969">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9969">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9970">Questo servizio imposta il colore del testo dell'input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9970">This service sets the text color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9971">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9971">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9972">**text_input** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9972">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9973">**normal_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo nello stato normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9973">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9974">**L'Appendice A** contiene id risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9974">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9975">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9975">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9976">**selected_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9976">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9977">**L'Appendice A** contiene id risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9977">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9978">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9978">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9979">**disabled_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo quando lo stile GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9979">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9980">**L'Appendice A** contiene id risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9980">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9981">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9981">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9982">**readonly_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo quando sono impostati sia lo stile GX_STYLE_ENABLED che GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9982">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9983">**L'Appendice A** contiene id risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9983">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9984">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9984">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9985">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9985">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9986">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori testo di input di testo a riga singola riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9986">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9987">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9987">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9988">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9988">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9989">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9989">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9990">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9990">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9991">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9991">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-9992">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-9992">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color “my_text_input” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10014">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10014">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10015">Selezionare il testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10015">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10016">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10016">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10017">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10017">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10018">Questo servizio seleziona il testo con il contrassegno di inizio e l'indice del contrassegno di fine specificati ed evidenzia il testo selezionato con i colori di riempimento e di testo selezionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10018">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10019">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10019">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10020">**text_input** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10020">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10021">**start_index** Indice del primo carattere selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10021">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10022">**end_index** Indice dell'ultimo carattere selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10022">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10023">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10023">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10024">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selezione del testo di input di testo a riga singola riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10024">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10028">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valore di indice non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10028">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
                                                0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10054">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10054">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10055">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10055">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10056">Questo servizio è stato deprecato a favore di gx_single_line_text_input_text_set_ext()</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10056">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_single_line_text_input_text_set_ext()</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10057">Questo servizio imposta il testo dell'input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10057">This service sets the text of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10058">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10058">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10059">**text_input** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10059">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10060">**text** Stringa di testo con terminazione NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10060">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10061">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Set di colori testo di input di testo a riga singola riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10064">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10064">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10066">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10066">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10069">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10069">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR new_text = “Set Single Line Text Input Text”;

/* Set text for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
                                        new_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_input” was set. */
```

```C
GX_STRING new_string;
```

## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10109">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10109">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10110">Crea dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10110">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10111">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10111">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10112">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10112">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10113">Questo servizio crea un widget dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10113">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10114">GX_SLIDER deriva da GX_WIDGET e pertanto tutti i gx_widget API possono essere usati con GX_SLIDER widget di tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10114">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10115">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10115">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10116">**slider:** blocco di controllo del widget Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10116">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10117">**name:** nome del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10117">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10118">**parent:** puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10118">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10119">**tick_count:** Numero di segni di graduazione del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10119">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10120">**slider_info:** puntatore alle informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento, ovvero una struttura usata per superare i limiti del valore del dispositivo di scorrimento, le dimensioni e la posizione della lanceta del dispositivo di scorrimento e altri parametri del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10120">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10121">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_SLIDER_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10121">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10122">**style:** stile del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10122">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10123">**L'Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10123">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10124">**slider_id:** ID del dispositivo di scorrimento definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10124">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10125">**size:** dimensioni del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10125">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10126">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10127">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Creazione del dispositivo di scorrimento riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10127">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10128">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10128">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10129">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10129">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10130">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10130">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10131">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10131">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10132">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10132">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10133">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10133">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10134">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10134">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10135">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10135">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10150">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10150">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10151">Dispositivo di scorrimento di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10151">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10152">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10152">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10153">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10153">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10154">Questo servizio disegna un dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10154">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10155">Questo servizio viene usato internamente dalla funzione gx_slider_create, ma viene esposto anche per l'uso da parte dell'applicazione in tali istanze quando viene definita una funzione di disegno del dispositivo di scorrimento personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10155">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10156">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10156">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10157">**slider:** blocco di controllo widget dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10157">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10158">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10158">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10159">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10159">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10160">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10160">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10161">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10161">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10162">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10162">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Call default slider draw. */
    gx_slider_draw(slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```
