## <a name="gx_studio_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10704">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10704">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10705">Creare un widget definito nel file delle specifiche generate da Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10705">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10706">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10706">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *gx_studio_widget_create(
    GX_BYTE *control,
    GX_CONST GX_STUDIO_WIDGET *definition, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10707">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10707">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10708">Questo servizio crea un widget e gli elementi figlio del widget usando una specifica del widget definita nel file di specifiche generato da GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10708">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10709">Questa funzione evita la ricerca "per nome" della funzione simile `gx_studio_named_widget_create()` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10709">This function avoids the “by name” lookup of the similar function `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10710">La GX_STUDIO_WIDGET struttura è definita nel file di intestazione delle specifiche dell'applicazione generato da GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10710">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure is defined in the application specifications header file generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10711">Per i widget allocati in modo statico, il blocco di controllo widget è definito nel file specifications.c generato e dato il nome del widget definito in GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10711">For statically allocated widgets, the widget control block is defined in the generated specifications.c file, and given the widget name defined within GUIX Studio.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10712">Per i widget allocati dinamicamente, l'applicazione deve passare GX_NULL come indirizzo del blocco di controllo del widget e la funzione tenterà di allocare dinamicamente il blocco di controllo widget usando la funzione , definita anche da e fornita `gx_system_memory_allocate()` dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10712">For dynamically allocated widgets, the application should pass GX_NULL as the widget control block address and the function will attempt to dynamically allocate the widget control block using the `gx_system_memory_allocate()` function, which is also defined by and provided by the application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10713">Per fare riferimento direttamente alla definizione del widget GUIX Studio all'interno del file delle specifiche generate, è necessario seguire la convenzione di denominazione utilizzata dal generatore di codice di GUI Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10713">For an application to directly reference the GUIX Studio widget definition within the generated specifications file, it is necessary to follow the naming convention utilized by the GUI Studio code generator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10714">La GX_STUDIO_WIDGET generata all'interno del file specifications.c viene sempre denominata in base a questa convenzione: <widget_name>_define, in cui il campo <widget_name> può essere ripetuto più volte se il widget è figlio di un widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10714">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure generated within the specifications.c file is always named according to this convention: <widget_name>_define, where the <widget_name> field may be repeated multiple times if the widget is child of a child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10715">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10715">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10716">**controllo** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget o GX_NULL se allocato dinamicamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10716">**control** Pointer to widget control block, or GX_NULL if dynamically allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10717">**definizione** Struttura delle definizioni dei widget generati da Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10717">**definition** Studio generated widget definition structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10718">**puntatore** padre all'elemento padre del widget, se presente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10718">**parent** pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10719">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10719">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10720">Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget creato o GX_NULL se la creazione non è riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10720">Pointer to the created widget control block, or GX_NULL if the creation was not successful.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10721">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10721">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10722">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10722">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10723">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10723">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget “playlist_screen”, which is statically allocated. */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(&playlist_screen,
    &playlist_screen_define,
    root_window);

/* If widget != GX_NULL the widget was created. */

/* create the widget “songs_screen”, which is dynamically allocated */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(GX_NULL,
    &songs_screen_define, root_window);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10724">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10724">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10725">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10725">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_named_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10726">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10726">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10727">Creare un widget definito nel file delle specifiche generate da Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10727">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10728">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10728">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_named_widget_create(
    char *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **new_widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10729">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10729">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10730">Questo servizio crea un widget e gli elementi figlio del widget usando una specifica del widget definita all'interno del file di specifiche generato da GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10730">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10731">Questa funzione API viene usata per creare schermate di primo livello usando il nome della schermata specificato nell'applicazione GUIX Studio come identificatore di definizione del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10731">This API function is used to create top-level screens using the screen name specified within the GUIX Studio application as the widget definition identifier.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10732">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10732">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10733">**name:** nome della schermata come definito all'interno dell'applicazione GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10733">**name**: Screen name as defined within GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10734">**parent:** puntatore all'elemento padre del widget, se presente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10734">**parent**: pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10735">**new_widget:** posizione in cui restituire il puntatore del widget creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10735">**new_widget**: location to return created widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10736">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10737">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10737">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10738">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x11) Non è stato possibile trovare il widget denominato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10738">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Named widget could not be found</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10739">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10739">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10740">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10740">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10741">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10741">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”,
   which is a child of the top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_named_widget_create(“main_menu”,
    &root_window, &menu_screen);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the screen was created
   and linked to the root window. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10743">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10743">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_display_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10744">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10744">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10745">Configurare la visualizzazione definita nel progetto GUIX Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10745">Configure display defined in GUIX Studio project</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10746">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10746">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_display_configure(
    USHORT display,
    UINT (*driver)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    USHORT language, 
    USHORT theme,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10747">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10747">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10748">Questo servizio inizializza un GX_DISPLAY in modo che sia pronto per l'uso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10748">This service initializes a GX_DISPLAY so that it is ready for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10749">Questa funzione consolida le funzioni per inizializzare GX_DISPLAY blocco di controllo, creare un canvas per adattarlo alla visualizzazione e creare una finestra radice per l'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10749">This function consolidates the functions to initialize a GX_DISPLAY control block, create a canvas to fit the display, and create a root window for the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10750">Questa funzione installa anche la lingua e il tema della risorsa richiesti dopo l'inizializzazione della visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10750">This function also installs the language and resource theme requested after the display has been initialized.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10751">Questa funzione consolida il lavoro di programmazione più comunemente necessario per preparare una visualizzazione per l'uso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10751">This function consolidates the programming effort most commonly required to prepare a display for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10752">La funzione richiama le funzioni gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create e gx_window_root_create, tutte o alcune delle quali sarebbero altrimenti richieste dal programma dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10752">The function invokes the gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, and gx_window_root_create functions, all or some of which would otherwise be required by the application program.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10753">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10753">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10754">**display**: indice nella tabella di visualizzazione, che corrisponde alle definizioni di visualizzazione nel file di progetto di Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10754">**display**: Index into the display table, which corresponds to the display definitions in the Studio project file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10755">**driver:** puntatore alla funzione di inizializzazione del driver di visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10755">**driver**: pointer to display driver initialization function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10756">Questa funzione viene richiamata per inizializzare i puntatori a funzione indiretti GX_DISPLAY blocco di controllo, nonché per eseguire qualsiasi configurazione hardware necessaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10756">This function is invoked to initialize the indirect function pointers of the GX_DISPLAY control block, as well as perform any required hardware setup.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10757">**language:** indice della tabella della lingua iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10757">**language**: initial language table index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10758">**language:** indice iniziale del tema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10758">**language**: initial theme index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10759">**root:** puntatore alla variabile in cui restituire l'indirizzo della finestra radice o GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10759">**root**: pointer to variable in which to return root window address, or GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10760">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10761">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10761">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10762">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x11) Impossibile inizializzare la visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10762">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Display could not be initialized</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10763">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10763">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10764">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10764">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10765">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10765">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”, which is a child of the
   top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_display_configure(MAIN_DISPLAY,
    my_driver_setup, LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, DEFAULT_THEME, GX_NULL);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the display was initialized, a canvas was
created for the display, a root window was created for the canvas, and
the requested language and theme have been installed.
*/
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10766">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10766">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10776">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10776">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10777">Impostare la lingua attiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10777">Set active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10778">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10778">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_active_language_set(GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10779">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10779">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10780">Questo servizio imposta la lingua corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10780">This service set the current language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10781">L'indice della lingua deve essere minore del numero di colonne nella tabella delle stringhe dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10781">The language index must be less than the number of columns in the application string table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10782">Questa funzione è stata deprecata a favore di gx_display_active_language_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10782">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_active_language_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10783">Tutte le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10783">All new applications should use gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10784">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10784">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10785">**language:** indice della lingua, definito nel file di intestazione delle risorse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10785">**language**: Language index, defined in resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10786">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10786">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10787">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language (Impostazione della lingua attiva completata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10787">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10788">\*\*GX_CALLER_ERROR:\*\*\*\* (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10788">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\* (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10789">\*\*GX_PTR_ERROR:\*\*\*\* (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10789">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10790">\*\*GX_INVALID_VALUE:\*\*\*\* (0x22) Indice di lingua non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10790">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\* (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10791">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10791">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10792">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10792">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10793">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10793">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set active language and mark widget canvas as dirty. */
status = gx_system_active_language_set(ID_LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10794">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10794">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10795">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10795">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10796">gx_display_active_langauge_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10796">gx_display_active_langauge_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_animation_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10798">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10798">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10799">Ottenere il blocco di controllo dell'animazione dal pool di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10799">Obtain animation control block from system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10800">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_get(GX_ANIMATION **animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10801">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10802">Questo servizio può essere usato per ottenere un blocco di controllo di animazione da un pool di tali blocchi di controllo gestiti dal gx_system componente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10802">This service can be used to obtain an animation control block from a pool of such control blocks maintained by the gx_system component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10803">Il pool di blocchi di controllo dell'animazione e i servizi API correlati vengono forniti solo se la costante GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE è definita con un valore 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10803">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10804">L'impostazione predefinita per questo valore è 6, ovvero il pool di blocchi di controllo dell'animazione di sistema contiene dimensioni GX_ANIMATION blocco di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10804">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10805">Un blocco di controllo di animazione allocato tramite questa API viene restituito automaticamente al pool gratuito se l'animazione viene eseguita fino al completamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10805">An animation control block allocated using this API is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10806">Se l'animazione viene arrestata usando gx_animation_stop o non viene avviata a causa di un errore restituito, il blocco di controllo dell'animazione deve essere restituito al pool gratuito dall'applicazione usando gx_system_animation_free.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10806">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10807">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10808">**animation:** indirizzo del puntatore per ricevere GX_ANIMATION puntatore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10808">**animation**: Address of pointer to receive GX_ANIMATION pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10809">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10810">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ottenuto correttamente il blocco di controllo dell'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10810">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully obtained animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10812">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore di animazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10812">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10813">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) Pool di animazioni di sistema esaurito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10813">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) System animation pool exhausted</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10814">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10815">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10815">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10816">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10816">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10817">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10817">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10818">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10818">gx_animation_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10819">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10819">gx_animation_start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10820">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10820">gx_animation_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10821">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10821">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_animation_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10822">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10822">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10823">Restituire un blocco di controllo di animazione al pool di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10823">Return an animation control block to the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10824">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10824">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_free(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10825">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10825">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10826">Questo servizio può essere usato per restituire un blocco di controllo dell'animazione al pool di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10826">This service can be used to return an animation control block to the system pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10827">Il pool di blocchi di controllo dell'animazione e i servizi API correlati vengono forniti solo se la costante GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE è definita con un valore 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10827">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10828">L'impostazione predefinita per questo valore è 6, ovvero il pool di blocchi di controllo dell'animazione di sistema contiene dimensioni GX_ANIMATION blocco di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10828">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10829">Un blocco di controllo dell'animazione allocato gx_system_animation_get() viene restituito automaticamente al pool libero se l'animazione viene eseguita fino al completamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10829">An animation control block allocated using gx_system_animation_get() is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10830">Il tentativo di restituire un blocco di controllo dell'animazione al pool libero che è già stato restituito al pool libero non ha alcun effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10830">Attempting to return an animation control block to the free pool that has already been returned to the free pool has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10831">Se l'animazione viene arrestata usando gx_animation_stop o non viene avviata a causa di un errore restituito, il blocco di controllo dell'animazione ottenuto tramite gx_system_animation_get() deve essere restituito al pool libero dall'applicazione usando gx_system_animation_free().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10831">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block that has been obtained using gx_system_animation_get() should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10832">Un'animazione deve essere in stato IDLE prima di poter essere restituita al pool libero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10832">An animation must be in IDLE state before it can be returned to the free pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10833">Un'animazione si trova nello stato IDLE quando non è stata avviata, quando viene arrestata o quando viene eseguita fino al completamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10833">An animation is in the IDLE state when it has not been started, when it is stopped, or when it runs to completion.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10834">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10834">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10835">**animation:** puntatore al blocco GX_ANIMATION controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10835">**animation**: Pointer to the GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10836">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10837">**GX_SUCCESS:** blocco di animazione 0x00 (0x00) rilasciato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10837">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10839">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore di animazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10839">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10840">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) L'animazione non è IDLE o non è stata allocata dal pool di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10840">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) The animation is not IDLE, or it has not been allocated from the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10841">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10841">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10842">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10842">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10843">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10843">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    status = gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);

    if (status != GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* animation did not start, return it to the free pool */
        gx_system_animation_free(animation);
    }
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10844">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10844">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10845">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10845">gx_animation_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10846">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10846">gx_animation_start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10847">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10847">gx_animation_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10848">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10848">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10849">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10849">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10850">Disabilitare il supporto dinamico del testo bidirezionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10850">Disable dynamic bi-directional text support</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10851">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_disable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10852">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10853">Questo servizio disabilita il supporto dinamico del testo bidirezionale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10853">This service disables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10854">Questo servizio richiede GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT essere definito durante la compilazione della libreria GUIX ed è necessario solo se è necessario riordinare in fase di esecuzione i dati di stringa BiDi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10854">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10855">La maggior parte delle applicazioni usa GUIX Studio per produrre stringhe di testo BiDi riordinate correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10855">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reorderd BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10856">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10856">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10857">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10857">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10858">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10858">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10859">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Il supporto del testo bidi è stato disabilitato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10859">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10860">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10860">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10861">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10861">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10862">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10862">Example</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */

/* Diable bidi text support. */
status = gx_system_bidi_text_disable();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was disabled. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10865">gx_system_bidi_text_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10865">gx_system_bidi_text_enable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10866">Abilitare il supporto dinamico del testo bidi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10866">Enable dynamic bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10867">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10867">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_enable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10868">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10868">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10869">Questo servizio abilita il supporto dinamico del testo bidirezionale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10869">This service enables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10870">Questo servizio richiede GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT essere definito durante la compilazione della libreria GUIX ed è necessario solo se è necessario riordinare in fase di esecuzione i dati di stringa BiDi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10870">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10871">La maggior parte delle applicazioni usa GUIX Studio per produrre stringhe di testo BiDi riordinate correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10871">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reordered BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10872">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10872">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10873">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10873">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10874">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10874">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10875">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Supporto del testo bidi abilitato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10875">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully enabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10876">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10876">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10877">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10877">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10878">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10878">Example</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */

/* Enable bidi text support. */
status = gx_system_bidi_text_enable();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was enabled. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_canvas_refresh"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10881">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10881">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10882">Aggiornare tutte le aree di disegno dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10882">Refresh all dirty canvases</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10883">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10883">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_canvas_refresh(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10884">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10884">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10885">Questo servizio forza un ridisegno immediato di tutti i widget e le aree di disegno dirty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10885">This service forces an immediate redrawing of all dirty widgets and canvases.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10886">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato internamente dal componente di sistema GUIX, ma può essere chiamato dall'applicazione per forzare un'operazione immediata di ridisegno del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10886">This service is normally invoked internally by the GUIX system component, but can be called by the application to force an immediate system redrawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10887">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10887">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10888">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10888">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10889">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10889">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10890">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Blocco di animazione rilasciato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10890">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10891">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) Nessun canvas creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10891">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) No canvas created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10892">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10892">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10893">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10893">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10894">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10894">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10895">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10895">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Force immediate redraw operation. */
status = gx_system_canvas_refresh();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, canvas has been redraw. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10920">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10920">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10921">Contrassegnare l'area dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10921">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10922">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10922">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10923">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10924">Questo servizio contrassegna l'area di questo widget come dirty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10924">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10925">In questo modo, il widget viene accodato per il ridisegno al termine dell'elaborazione degli eventi di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10925">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10926">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10926">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10927">**widget:** puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10927">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10928">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10928">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10929">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Widget contrassegnato correttamente come dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10929">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10930">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10930">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10931">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10931">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10932">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10932">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10933">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10933">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10934">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10934">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10935">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10935">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10960">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10960">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10961">Contrassegnare l'area parziale come dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10961">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10962">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10962">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10963">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10963">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10964">Questo servizio contrassegna l'area parziale di questo widget come dirty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10964">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10965">In questo modo il widget viene accodato per il ridisegno tramite l'operazione di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX al termine dell'elaborazione degli eventi di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10965">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10966">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10966">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10967">**widget:** puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10967">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10968">**dirty_area:** area dirty del widget per contrassegnare dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10968">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10969">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10969">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10970">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Segno di area dirty parziale riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10970">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10971">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10971">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10972">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10972">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10973">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10973">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10974">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Dimensioni non valide dell'area dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10974">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10975">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10975">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10976">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10976">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-10977">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-10977">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11002">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11002">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11003">Ottenere il contesto di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11003">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11004">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11004">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11005">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11005">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11006">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore al contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11006">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11007">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11007">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11008">**current_context:** puntatore alla destinazione per il puntatore del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11008">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11009">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11009">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11010">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Get del contesto corrente riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11010">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11011">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11011">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11012">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11012">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11013">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11013">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11014">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11014">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11039">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11039">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11040">Invia evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11040">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11041">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11041">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11042">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11042">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11043">Questo servizio cerca nella coda di eventi GUIX un evento dello stesso tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11043">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11044">Se esiste un evento dello stesso tipo, il payload dell'evento viene aggiornato in modo che corrisponda al nuovo evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11044">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11045">Se non viene trovato alcun evento corrispondente, gx_system_event_send viene chiamata la funzione per aggiungere il nuovo evento alla fine della coda di eventi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11045">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11046">Questa funzione viene comunemente usata dai driver di input tocco rapido per impedire il riempimento della coda di eventi con più PEN_DRAG eventi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11046">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11047">Questa funzione può anche essere chiamata dall'applicazione per impedire l'aggiunta di più eventi dello stesso tipo alla coda di eventi GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11047">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11048">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11048">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11049">**event:** puntatore all'evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11049">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11050">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11050">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11051">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Invio di eventi riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11051">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11052">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11052">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11053">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11053">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11054">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11054">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11055">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11055">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11056">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11056">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11081">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11081">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11082">Invia evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11082">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11083">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11083">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11084">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11084">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11085">Questo servizio invia l'evento specificato nella coda di eventi di sistema GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11085">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11086">Il nuovo evento viene inserito alla fine della coda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11086">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11087">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11087">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11088">**event:** puntatore all'evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11088">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11089">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11089">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11090">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Invio di eventi riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11090">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11091">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11091">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11092">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11092">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11093">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11093">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11094">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11094">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11095">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11095">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11120">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11120">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11121">Stato attivo per le attestazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11121">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11122">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11122">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11123">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11123">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11124">Questo servizio rivendica lo stato attivo per il widget specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11124">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11125">Se in precedenza il widget non aveva lo stato attivo, riceverà un GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11125">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11126">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11126">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11127">**widget:** puntatore al blocco di controllo widget per richiedere lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11127">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block to claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11128">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11128">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11129">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Attestazione di stato attivo riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11129">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful focus claim</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11130">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11130">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11131">**GX_NO_CHANGE:** il widget (0x08) è già proprietario dello stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11131">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget already owns focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11132">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11132">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11134">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11134">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11135">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11135">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11136">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11136">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Claim focus for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_claim_focus(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been claimed for
   “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11161">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11161">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11162">Inizializzare GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11162">Initialize GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11163">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11163">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11164">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11165">Questo servizio inizializza GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11165">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11166">Questo servizio deve essere richiamato prima di qualsiasi altro servizio API GUIX e deve essere richiamato una sola volta all'avvio del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11166">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11167">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11167">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11168">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11168">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11169">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11169">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11170">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Inizializzazione del sistema riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11170">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system initialize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11171">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR:**(0xFE) Dimensioni del blocco GX_EVENT controllo non valide o coda eventi/mutex/creazione thread non riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11171">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11173">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11173">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11174">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11174">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11175">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11175">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initialize GUIX. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11200">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11200">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11201">Recuperare la tabella del linguaggio attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11201">Retrieve active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11202">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11202">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_get( 
    GX_CHAR ****language_table,
    GX_UBYTE *languages_count, 
    UINT *string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11203">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11203">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11204">Questo servizio recupera la tabella della lingua attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11204">This service retrieves the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11205">Questa funzione è deprecata a favore di gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11205">This function is deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11206">Tutte le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11206">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11207">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11208">**language_table:** indirizzo del puntatore per restituire la tabella del linguaggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11208">**language_table**: Address of pointer to return language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11209">**languages_count:** indirizzo della variabile per restituire le colonne della tabella.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11209">**languages_count**: Address of variable to return table columns.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11210">**string_count**: indirizzo del puntatore per restituire le righe della tabella.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11210">**string_count**: Address of pointer to return table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11211">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11211">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11212">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Tabella del linguaggio attivo recuperata correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11212">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved active language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11213">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11213">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11214">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11214">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11215">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11215">Allowed From</span></span>

