## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11243">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11243">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11244">Assegnare funzioni per l'allocazione di memoria, la deallocazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11244">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11245">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11246">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11247">Questo servizio assegna la funzione di callback fornita dall'applicazione per l'allocazione e la deallocazione di memoria dinamica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11247">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11248">Se l'applicazione non richiede alcun servizio GUIX che usa l'allocazione dinamica della memoria, non è necessario chiamare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11248">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11249">Se usato, questo servizio deve essere chiamato dopo gx_system_initialize() che cancella i puntatori al servizio GUIX e prima di qualsiasi servizio GUIX che richiede l'uso dell'allocazione dinamica della memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11249">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11250">I servizi GUIX che richiedono un'allocazione di memoria di runtime e un servizio di deallocazione includono:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11250">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11251">Caricamento di risorse binarie dall'archiviazione esterna nell'ambiente di runtime GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11251">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11252">Decodificatore di immagini jpeg di runtime software.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11252">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11253">Decodificatore di immagini png di runtime software.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11253">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11254">Uso di widget di testo con GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11254">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11255">Funzioni di utilità di ridimensionamento e rotazione pixemap di runtime.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11255">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11256">Allocazione del blocco della schermata di runtime e del controllo widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11256">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11257">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11257">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11258">**allocator**: funzione allocatore di memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11258">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11259">**release:** funzione senza memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11259">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11260">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11260">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11261">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Funzione di allocazione memoria assegnata correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11261">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11262">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11262">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11263">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11263">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11264">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11264">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11265">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11265">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11266">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11266">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11267">Nell'esempio seguente viene utilizzato un pool di byte ThreadX per implementare un'allocazione dinamica di memoria threadsafe e un servizio di deallocazione della memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11267">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11292">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11292">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11293">Impostare la configurazione della penna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11293">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11294">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11294">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11295">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11295">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11296">Questo servizio imposta la configurazione della penna per controllare i parametri di velocità e distanza della penna usati per attivare la generazione di GX_EVENT_FLICK di eventi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11296">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11297">Il gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist di GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa ed è necessario usare GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11297">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11298">Ad esempio, se si vuole impostare la distanza di trascinamento minima su 0,5 pixel per tick, è necessario impostare la gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist su `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11298">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11299">In GUIX versioni 5.4.0 e precedenti, il membro gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist di GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION era di tipo (INT << 8) anziché GX_FIXED_VAL tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11299">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11300">Se il progetto con la libreria GUIX versione 5.4.0 usa questa API, è necessario modificare il parametro min_drag_dist o #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY durante la compilazione della libreria GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11300">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11301">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11301">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11302">**pen_configuration** Puntatore alla struttura di configurazione della penna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11302">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11303">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION struttura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11303">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11304">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11304">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11305">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Configurazione della penna completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11305">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11306">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11306">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11307">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11307">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11308">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11308">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11309">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11309">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11310">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11310">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11311">Creare e inizializzare lo stack dello schermo del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11311">Create and initialize the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11312">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11312">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_create(
    GX_WIDGET **memory, 
    INT size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11313">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11314">Questo servizio definisce un pool di memoria da usare per lo stack dello schermo del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11314">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11315">Lo stack dello schermo del sistema è una funzionalità facoltativa che può essere usata dall'applicazione per gestire l'aspetto del flusso dello schermo dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11315">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11316">Se l'applicazione intende utilizzare i servizi dello stack dello schermo, è necessario chiamare la funzione gx_system_screen_stack_create per configurare l'area di memoria dello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11316">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11317">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11317">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11318">**memory:** puntatore al blocco di memoria riservato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11318">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11319">**size**: dimensione, in byte, del blocco di memoria riservata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11319">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11320">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11320">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11321">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Creazione completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11321">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11323">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11323">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11324">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11324">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11325">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11325">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11326">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11326">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11328">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11328">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11330">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11330">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11331">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11331">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11332">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11332">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11333">Visualizzare i puntatori dello stack dello schermo in primo piano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11333">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11334">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11334">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_get(
    GX_WIDGET **popped_parent,
    GX_WIDGET **popped_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11335">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11335">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11336">Questa funzione popola i puntatori dello stack dello schermo in primo piano e restituisce tali puntatori al chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11336">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11337">Questa funzione è diversa gx_system_screen_stack_pop() perché la schermata estratta non viene ricollegare automaticamente all'elemento padre precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11337">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11338">I puntatori vengono invece es estratto dallo stack e restituiti al chiamante, consentendo al chiamante di collegare o rimuovere la schermata restituita in base alle esigenze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11338">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11339">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11339">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11340">**popped_parent:** posizione in cui archiviare il puntatore del widget padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11340">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11341">**popped_screen:** posizione in cui archiviare il puntatore dello schermo estratto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11341">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11342">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11342">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11343">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Recupero corretto dei puntatori dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11343">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11344">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11344">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11345">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11345">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11346">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x10) Stack di schermate non valido o vuoto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11346">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11347">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11347">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11348">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11348">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11349">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11349">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11354">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11354">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11355">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11355">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11356">Pop la voce più in alto dallo stack dello schermo del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11356">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11357">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11357">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11358">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11358">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11359">Questa funzione pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget( Questa funzione pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11359">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11360">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11360">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11361">**nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11361">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11362">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11362">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11363">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recupero riuscito dei puntatori dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11363">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11365">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11365">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11366">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Stack di schermate non valido o vuoto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11366">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11367">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11368">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11368">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11369">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11369">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11375">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11375">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11376">Eseguire il push di un widget e del puntatore padre nello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11376">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11377">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11377">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11378">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11378">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11379">Questo servizio inserisce un puntatore al widget indicato, che in genere è una schermata di primo livello, nello stack di schermate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11379">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11380">Se il widget ha un elemento padre, viene scollegato dall'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11380">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11381">Viene anche inserito il puntatore del widget padre nello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11381">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11382">Il widget padre può essere NULL, vale a dire che una schermata non visibile o collegata a un elemento padre può essere inserita nello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11382">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11383">Se viene eseguito il push di un widget senza elemento padre nello stack dello schermo, è necessario usare l'API screen_stack_get() per recuperare il puntatore dello schermo inserito, invece di usare l'API screen_stack_pop(), che tenta di ricollegare il widget estratto all'elemento padre precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11383">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11384">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11384">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11385">**screen:** puntatore al widget di cui eseguire il push nello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11385">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11386">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11386">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11387">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Ottenere correttamente l'aspetto della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11387">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11388">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11388">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11389">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11389">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11390">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11390">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11391">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11391">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11392">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11392">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11393">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11393">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11394">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11394">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11398">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11398">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11399">Reimpostare lo stack dello schermo del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11399">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11400">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11401">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11402">Questa funzione rimuove tutte le voci dallo stack dello schermo del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11402">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11403">Se le schermate esscese dallo stack hanno allocato in modo dinamico blocchi di controllo allocati da GUIX Studio, la memoria per tali blocchi di controllo viene liberata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11403">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11404">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11404">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11405">**nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11405">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11406">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11406">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11407">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ottenere correttamente l'aspetto della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11407">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11410">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11411">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11411">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11412">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11412">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_reset();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack has been cleared
of entries. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11418">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11418">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11419">Ottenere l'aspetto dello scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11419">Get scroll appearance</span></span>

```C

    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *return_appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11421">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11421">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11422">Questo servizio ottiene l'aspetto della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11422">This service gets the scrollbar appearance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11423">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11423">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11424">**style**: stile della barra di `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` scorrimento: o `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11424">**style**: Scrollbar style: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11425">**return_appearance:** puntatore alla destinazione per l'aspetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11425">**return_appearance**: Pointer to destination for appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11426">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11426">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11427">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11427">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11428">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ottenere correttamente l'aspetto della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11428">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11429">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11429">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11430">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11430">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11431">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11431">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11433">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11433">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_get(style, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_appearance” now contains the scroll
appearance. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11458">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11458">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11459">Impostare l'aspetto dello scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11459">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11460">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11461">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11462">Questo servizio imposta l'aspetto di scorrimento predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11462">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11463">Quando viene creato uno scorrimento, questa struttura dell'aspetto viene usata a meno che l'applicazione non fornisce una versione personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11463">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11464">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11465">**style**: stile di `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` scorrimento o `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11465">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11466">**appearance:** puntatore alla struttura dell'aspetto inizializzato con vari attributi di aspetto della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11466">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11467">Fare riferimento **all'appendice I** per la definizione della GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11467">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11468">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11468">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11469">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Impostare correttamente l'aspetto dello scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11469">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11470">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11470">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11471">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11471">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11472">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11472">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11473">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11473">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11474">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11474">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11498">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11498">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11499">Avviare GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11499">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11500">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11500">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11501">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11501">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11502">Questo servizio avvia l'elaborazione GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11502">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11503">In circostanze normali questa funzione non restituisce mai , ma inizia invece a elaborare la coda di eventi GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11503">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11504">Quando la coda di eventi GUIX è vuota, questo servizio sospende il thread chiamante fino all'arrivo di nuovi eventi nella coda di eventi GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11504">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11505">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11505">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11506">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11506">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11507">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11507">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11508">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Avvio del sistema riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11508">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11510">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11510">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11511">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11511">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11512">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11512">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11537">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11537">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11538">Ottenere una stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11538">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11539">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11539">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11540">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11540">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11541">Questo servizio ottiene la stringa per l'ID risorsa specificato, usando la prima visualizzazione definita e la lingua attualmente attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11541">This service gets the string for the specified resource ID, using the first defined display and the currently active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11542">Questa funzione è stata deprecata a favore di gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11542">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11543">Tutte le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11543">All new applications should use gx_display_string_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11544">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11545">**string_id:** ID risorsa stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11545">**string_id**: String resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11546">**return_string:** Puntatore al puntatore di destinazione della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11546">**return_string**: Pointer to string destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11547">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11547">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11548">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Successful string get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11548">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11549">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11549">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11550">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07): puntatore** non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11550">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11551">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID:**(0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11551">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11552">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11552">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11553">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11553">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11554">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11554">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string associated with MY_STRING_ID. */

status = gx_system_string_get(MY_STRING_RESOURCE_ID, &my_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string is contained in “my_string”.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11559">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11559">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11560">Recupera la tabella di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11560">Retrieves the string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11561">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11561">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11562">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11563">Questo servizio recupera la tabella di stringhe per la lingua richiesta dalla prima visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11563">This service retrieves the string table for the requested language from the first display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11564">Questa funzione è stata deprecata a favore di gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11564">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11565">Tutte le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11565">All new applications should use gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11566">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11566">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11569">**get_size:** puntatore all'archiviazione per il numero di stringhe nella tabella di stringhe oppure NULL se il chiamante non deve ottenere il numero di stringhe nella tabella di stringhe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11569">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

```C

    GX_FONT *font, GX_CHAR *string,
    INT string_length,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11584">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11584">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11585">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11585">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11586">Questo servizio calcola la larghezza di visualizzazione della stringa fornita in pixel usando il tipo di carattere specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11586">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11587">Se il string_length parametro è >= 0, nel calcolo viene incluso solo il numero di richieste di caratteri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11587">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11588">Se il string_length parametro è -1, nel calcolo viene usata l'intera stringa fino al carattere di terminazione NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11588">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11589">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11589">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11590">**font:** puntatore al tipo di carattere della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11590">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11591">**string:** puntatore alla stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11591">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11592">**string_length**: Lunghezza della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11592">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11593">**return_width:** destinazione per la larghezza della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11593">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11594">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11594">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11595">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Successful string width get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11595">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11596">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11596">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11597">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11597">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11598">**GX_INVALID_FONT:**(0x16) Carattere non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11598">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11599">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11599">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_timer_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11640">gx_system_timer_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11640">gx_system_timer_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11641">Timer di avvio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11641">Start timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11642">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11642">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_start(
    GX_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id,
    UINT initial_ticks,
    UINT reschedule_ticks);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11643">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11643">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11644">Questo servizio avvia un timer per il widget specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11644">This service starts a timer for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11645">La costante GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS definito il numero massimo di timer attivi supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11645">The constant GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS defined the maximum active timers supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11646">L'impostazione predefinita per questo valore è 32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11646">The default setting for this value is 32.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11647">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11647">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11648">**owner:** puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11648">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11649">**timer_id**: ID del timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11649">**timer_id**: ID of timer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11650">**initial_ticks:** tick di scadenza iniziali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11650">**initial_ticks**: initial expiration ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11651">**reschedule_ticks:** Tick di scadenza periodici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11651">**reschedule_ticks**: Periodic expiration ticks</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11652">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11652">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11653">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Avvio timer riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11653">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11654">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS:**(0x04) Nessun altro timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11654">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) No more timers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11655">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11655">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11656">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11656">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11657">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11657">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Valori timer non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Timer value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11659">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11659">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11660">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11660">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11661">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11661">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start a periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_start(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11679">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11679">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11680">Arresta timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11680">Stop timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11681">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11681">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11682">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11682">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11683">Questo servizio arresta il timer con il timer_id specificato associato al widget chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11683">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11684">Per arrestare tutti i timer collegati a un particolare widget, l'applicazione può passare timer_id valore 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11684">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11685">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11685">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11686">**owner:** puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11686">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11687">**timer_id:** ID del timer o 0 per tutti i timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11687">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11688">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11688">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11689">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Arresto timer riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11689">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11690">**GX_NOT_FOUND:** ID timer (0x09) non trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11690">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11691">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11691">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11692">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11692">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11693">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11693">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11694">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11694">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11695">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11695">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11696">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11696">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_stop(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
stopped. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11768">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11768">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11769">Trovare un widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11769">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11770">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11770">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11771">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11771">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11772">Questo servizio cerca l'ID widget specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11772">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11773">A gx_widget_find(), questa funzione cerca gli elementi figlio di tutte le finestre radice definite nel sistema, ovvero si tratta di una ricerca esaustiva di tutti i widget visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11773">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11774">Se si conosce l'elemento padre del widget che si sta cercando, usare gx_widget_find() .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11774">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11775">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11775">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11776">**widget_id:** ID widget da cercare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11776">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11777">**search_level**: definisce il livello di annidamento ricorsivo in cui vengono cercati i widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11777">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11778">Se questo valore è 0, vengono cercati solo gli elementi figlio immediati di ogni finestra radice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11778">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11779">Se questo valore è GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, la funzione annida in tutti gli elementi figlio che cercano l'ID del widget richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11779">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11780">Per qualsiasi altro valore > 0, il livello di ricerca definisce la profondità della ricerca dell'ID widget richiesto da parte di questa funzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11780">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11781">**return_search_result:** Puntatore alla destinazione per il widget trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11781">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11782">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11782">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11783">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Ricerca widget riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11783">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11784">**GX_NOT_FOUND:**(0x09) ID widget non trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11784">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11785">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11785">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11786">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11786">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11787">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11787">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11788">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11788">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11813">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11813">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11814">Pulsante Crea testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11814">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11815">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11815">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11816">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11816">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11817">Questo servizio crea un widget pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11817">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11818">GX_TEXT_BUTTON deriva da GX_BUTTON e supporta tutti i gx_button API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11818">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11819">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11819">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11820">**text_button:** puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11820">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11821">**name:** nome logico del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11821">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11822">**parent:** puntatore al widget padre del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11822">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11823">**text_id:** ID risorsa del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11823">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11824">**style**: stile del pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11824">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11825">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11825">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11826">**text_button_id:** ID del pulsante di testo definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11826">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11827">**size:** dimensioni del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11827">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11828">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11828">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11829">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Creazione del pulsante Di testo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11829">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11831">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11832">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11832">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11833">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11833">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11834">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11834">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11835">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11835">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11836">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11836">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11837">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11837">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11855">gx_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11855">gx_text_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11856">Pulsante Disegna testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11856">Draw text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11857">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11857">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11858">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11859">Questo servizio disegna il pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11859">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11860">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente durante l'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma può essere chiamato anche da funzioni personalizzate di disegno di pulsanti di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11860">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11861">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11861">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11862">**button:** puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11862">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11863">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11863">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11864">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11864">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11865">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11865">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11866">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11866">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11867">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11867">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom text button draw function. */

VOID my_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button)
{
    /* Call default text button draw. */
    gx_text_button_draw(text_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```
