## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11885">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11885">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11886">Evento del pulsante Elabora testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11886">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11887">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11887">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11888">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11889">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il pulsante di testo specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11889">This service processes an event for the specified text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11890">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione degli eventi del pulsante di testo personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11890">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text button event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11891">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11892">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11892">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11893">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11893">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11894">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11894">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11895">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Operazione riuscita del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11895">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11896">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11896">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11897">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11897">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11898">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11898">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11899">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11899">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11900">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11900">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11901">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11901">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11919">gx_text_button_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11919">gx_text_button_font_set</span></span>

```C

    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11929">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11929">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11931">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11931">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11954">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11954">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11955">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11956">Questo servizio imposta il colore del pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11956">This service sets the color of the text button.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11958">**text_button:** puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11958">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11968">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11968">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11992">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11992">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11993">Supportare la funzione per disegnare il testo del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11993">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11994">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11994">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11995">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11995">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11996">Questa funzione di supporto disegna la parte di testo di un pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11996">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11997">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_text_button_draw e viene fornita come API separata per praticità per le applicazioni che definiscono una funzione di disegno di pulsanti personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11997">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11998">Le applicazioni che vogliono personalizzare il disegno in background del pulsante possono fornire la funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il servizio gx_text_button_text_draw come parte del disegno personalizzato per disegnare il testo del pulsante sullo sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11998">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-11999">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-11999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12000">**text_button:** puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12000">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12001">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12001">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12002">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12002">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12003">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12004">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12004">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12005">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12022">gx_text_button_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12022">gx_text_button_text_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12023">Ottenere testo dal pulsante di testo (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12023">Get text from the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12024">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_get(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12025">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12026">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12026">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12027">Questo servizio recupera la stringa specificata dal pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12027">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12028">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12028">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12029">**text_button:** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12029">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12030">**return_text**: Puntatore alla stringa recuperata dal pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12030">**return_text**: Pointer to the string retrieved from the text button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12031">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12031">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12032">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ottenere il testo dal pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12032">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get the text from the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12033">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12033">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12034">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12034">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12035">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12035">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12036">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12036">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12037">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12037">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12038">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12038">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *string;

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_get(&my_text_button, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12082">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Impostare correttamente l'ID risorsa stringa sul pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12082">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12105">gx_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12105">gx_text_button_text_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12106">Assegnare testo al pulsante di testo (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12106">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12107">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12107">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12108">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12108">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12109">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12109">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12110">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata al pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12110">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12111">Se il text_button widget è stato creato con stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12111">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12112">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ad esempio potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12112">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12113">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12113">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12114">**text_button:** puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12114">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12115">**text**: puntatore alla stringa con terminazione NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12115">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12116">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12116">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12117">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Impostare correttamente il testo sul pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12117">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12118">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12118">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12119">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12119">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12120">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12120">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12121">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:** allocatore di memoria (0x30) non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12121">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12122">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12122">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12123">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12124">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
*/

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12130">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12130">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12131">Assegnare testo al pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12131">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12132">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12133">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12134">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata al pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12134">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12135">Se il widget text_button è stato creato con GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY stile, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12135">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12136">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ad esempio potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12136">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12137">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12137">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12138">**text_button:** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12138">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12139">**string**: puntatore alla variabile GX_STRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12139">**string**: pointer to the GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12140">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12140">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12141">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Impostare correttamente il testo sul pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12141">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12143">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12143">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12144">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12144">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12145">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:** allocatore di memoria (0x30) non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12145">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12146">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12146">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12147">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12148">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12149">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12149">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string; new_string.gx_string_ptr = “Monday”;

new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Assign the string “new_string” to the text button
“my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12166">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12166">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12167">Impostare l'intervallo di lampeggiamento del cursore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12167">Set cursor blink interval</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12220">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12220">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12221">Assegnare la funzione di callback della rotellina di scorrimento di tipo testo (deprecata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12221">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12222">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12222">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12223">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12223">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12224">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12224">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12225">Questo servizio assegna la funzione di callback che verrà richiamata da una rotellina di scorrimento del tipo di testo per determinare la stringa di testo da visualizzare in ogni riga della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12225">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12226">Per GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, vengono fornite funzioni di callback predefinite e l'applicazione non deve apportare modifiche per usare queste implementazioni predefinite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12226">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12227">Questa API viene fornita per consentire all'applicazione di personalizzare la formattazione o altri parametri della stringa visualizzata in ogni riga del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12227">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12228">La funzione di callback riceverà come input un puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento e al numero di riga visualizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12228">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12229">La funzione deve restituire un puntatore a una stringa di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12229">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12230">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12231">**rotellina** Indirizzo del blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12231">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12232">**callback** Puntatore alla funzione di callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12232">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12233">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12233">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12234">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Callback impostato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12234">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12235">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12235">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12236">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12236">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12237">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12237">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12238">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12238">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12239">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12239">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12259">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12259">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12260">Questo servizio assegna la funzione di callback che verrà richiamata da una rotellina di scorrimento del tipo di testo per determinare la stringa di testo da visualizzare in ogni riga della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12260">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12261">Per GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, vengono fornite funzioni di callback predefinite e l'applicazione non deve apportare modifiche per usare queste implementazioni predefinite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12261">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12262">Questa API viene fornita per consentire all'applicazione di personalizzare la formattazione o altri parametri della stringa visualizzata in ogni riga del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12262">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12263">La funzione di callback riceverà come input un puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento e al numero di riga visualizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12263">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12264">La funzione deve restituire un puntatore a una stringa di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12264">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12265">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12266">**rotellina** Indirizzo del blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12266">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12267">**callback** Puntatore alla funzione di callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12267">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12268">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12269">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Callback impostato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12271">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12271">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12272">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12272">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12273">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12273">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12274">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12274">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12291">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12291">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12292">Creare una rotellina di scorrimento del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12292">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12293">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12294">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12295">Questo servizio crea una rotellina di scorrimento del testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12295">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12296">La rotellina di scorrimento del testo è un widget di base per i widget GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL tipo di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12296">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12297">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_string_scroll_wheel_create e gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create e viene fornita come API separata per praticità per le applicazioni che definiscono un widget della rotellina di scorrimento personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12297">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12298">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12298">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12299">**wheel:** indirizzo del blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12299">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12300">**name:** nome del widget definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12300">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12301">**parent:** padre della rotellina o GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12301">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12302">**total_rows:** Totale righe da presentare all'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12302">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12303">**style:** flag di stile desiderati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12303">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12304">**ID:** flag di stile della rotellina definiti dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12304">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12305">**size:** dimensioni iniziali della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12305">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12306">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12306">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12307">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Creazione corretta della rotellina di scorrimento del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12307">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12308">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12308">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12309">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12309">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12310">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12310">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12312">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12312">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12313">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12313">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12314">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12314">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12336">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12336">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12337">Questa è la funzione di disegno predefinita per tutti i tipi di rotellina in base GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12337">This is the default drawing function for all wheel types based on GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12338">Questa funzione può essere sottoposta a override dalle applicazioni che richiedono la personalizzazione dell'aspetto del disegno della rotellina di scorrimento del testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12338">This function can be overridden by applications that require customization of the text scroll wheel drawing appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12339">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL sono entrambi basati su o derivati da GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12339">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL are both based on or derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12343">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12343">**None**</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12364">Elaborare l'evento della rotellina di scorrimento del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12364">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12365">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12366">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12367">Questo servizio elabora un evento per la rotellina di scorrimento del testo specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12367">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12368">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione personalizzata degli eventi della rotellina di scorrimento del testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12368">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12369">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12370">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12370">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12371">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12371">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12372">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12372">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12373">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo di evento della rotellina di scorrimento del testo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12373">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12377">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12377">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12378">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12378">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12379">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12379">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the colors used to draw the wheel text have been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12461">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12461">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12462">Creare una visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12462">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12463">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12464">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12465">Questo servizio crea una visualizzazione albero come specificato e associa la visualizzazione albero al widget padre fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12465">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12466">Accetta tutti i tipi di widget come voce di menu figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12466">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12467">È consigliabile usare un GX_MENU tipo widget come voce di menu figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12467">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12468">GX_TREE_VIEW deriva da GX_WINDOW e supporta tutti i gx_window API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12468">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12469">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12470">**tree:** puntatore al blocco di controllo della visualizzazione struttura ad albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12470">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12471">**name**: nome della visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12471">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12472">**parent:** puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12472">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12473">**style**: stile del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12473">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12474">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12474">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12475">**menu_id:** ID definito dall'applicazione della visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12475">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12476">**size**: dimensioni della visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12476">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12477">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Creazione della visualizzazione albero riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12480">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12482">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12482">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12483">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12483">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12484">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12485">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12485">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12486">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12486">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12501">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12501">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12502">Disegnare la visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12502">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12503">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12503">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12504">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12504">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12505">Questo servizio disegna la visualizzazione albero specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12505">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12506">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per widget di visualizzazione albero personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12506">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12507">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12507">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12508">**albero** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della visualizzazione struttura ad albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12508">**tree** Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12509">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12509">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12510">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12510">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12511">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12511">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12512">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12512">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12513">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12513">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12528">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12528">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12529">Evento di visualizzazione albero del processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12529">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12530">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12531">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12532">Questo servizio elabora un evento per la visualizzazione albero specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12532">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12533">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione personalizzata degli eventi della visualizzazione albero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12533">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12534">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12534">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12535">**tree:** puntatore al blocco di controllo della visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12535">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12536">**event_ptr:** puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12536">**event_ptr**: Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12537">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12537">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12538">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Evento di visualizzazione albero processo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12538">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12540">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12540">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12541">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12541">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12542">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12542">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12543">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12543">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12544">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12544">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12737">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12737">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12738">Convertire memort canvas in bitmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12738">Convert canvas memort to bitmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12739">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12739">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *rect,
    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12740">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12740">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12741">Questo servizio converte la memoria canvas in file bitmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12741">This service converts canvas memory to bitmap file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12742">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12742">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12743">**canvas:** puntatore a blocco del controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12743">**canvas**: Canvas control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12744">**rect:** rettangolo da convertire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12744">**rect**: Rectangle to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12745">**write_data:** Puntatore alla funzione di callback in cui scrivere i dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12745">**write_data**: Callback function pointer to write data to</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12746">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12746">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12747">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Conversione di un valore intero in stringa completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12747">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12748">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore al buffer restituito non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12748">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12749">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Dimensioni del buffer restituito non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12749">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12750">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12750">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12751">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12751">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12752">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12752">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12768">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12768">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12769">Calcolare il punto su un cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12769">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12770">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12770">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12771">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12771">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12772">Questo servizio calcola il punto su un cerchio in base al centro, al raggio e all'angolo del cerchio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12772">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12773">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12774">**xCenter:** coordinata x del centro del cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12774">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12775">**yCenter:** coordinata y del centro del cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12775">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12776">**radius:** raggio del cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12776">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12777">**angle:** angolo in base al quale calcolare il punto perimetrale del cerchio, in gradi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12777">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12778">**point**: indirizzo della GX_POINT in cui archiviare la coordinata x,y calcolata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12778">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12779">**end_alpha:** valore alfa finale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12779">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12780">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12780">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12781">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradiente creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12781">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12782">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Indirizzo del punto mittente non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12782">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12783">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Parametro radius non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12783">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12784">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12784">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12785">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12785">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12786">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12786">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12804">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12804">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12805">Creare una mappa dei pixel sfumato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12805">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12806">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12806">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12807">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12808">Questo servizio crea una mappa pixel sfumato in fase di esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12808">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12809">Un'immagine sfumato può essere usata per eseguire effetti di dissolvenza e altre interessanti modifiche visive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12809">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12810">La larghezza e l'altezza della sfumatura richiesta non possono essere inferiori a 2x2 pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12810">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12811">GUIX gestisce internamente un elenco di sfumature create e questa funzione cerca innanzitutto l'elenco delle sfumature per trovare una mappa pixel con sfumatura corrispondente prima di creare una nuova mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12811">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12812">In altre parole, la stessa mappa pixel sfumatura è necessaria più volte, viene effettivamente creata una sola mappa pixel e ogni sfumatura che richiede questa mappa pixel condivide la mappa pixel creata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12812">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12813">Questa API richiede che la funzione gx_system_memory_allocator definita per consentire l'allocazione della memoria di runtime.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12813">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12814">I flag di tipo sfumatura includono GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA e GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12814">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12815">Sono GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA attualmente supportate solo le sfumature di tipo . Questo flag di tipo deve essere impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12815">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12816">Il flag GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR è facoltativo e, se impostato, indica alla logica di creazione della sfumatura di creare una sfumatura che cambia da start_alpha a end_alpha e torna a start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12816">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12817">In caso contrario, viene creata una sfumatura lineare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12817">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12818">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12818">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12819">**gradient:** puntatore alla struttura del blocco di controllo sfumatura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12819">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12820">**width:** larghezza della mappa pixel richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12820">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12821">**height:** altezza della mappa pixel richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12821">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12822">**type**: Tipo di sfumatura richiesto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12822">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12823">**start_alpha**: Valore alfa iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12823">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12824">**end_alpha:** valore alfa finale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12824">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12825">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12825">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12826">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradiente creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12826">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12827">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Sfumatura non è di almeno 2 x 2 pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12827">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12828">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED:**(0x28) Gradient non è di tipo GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12828">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12829">**GX_FAILURE:** allocatore di memoria (0x10) non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12829">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12831">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore sfumatura non valido<</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Valore di larghezza e altezza non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12833">**GX_INVALID_TYPE:**(0x1B) Tipo di sfumatura non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12833">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12834">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12834">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12835">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12835">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12836">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12836">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12854">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12854">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12855">Eliminare una sfumatura creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12855">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12856">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12856">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12857">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12858">Questo servizio elimina una sfumatura creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12858">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12859">Se la mappa pixel associata a questa sfumatura non è in uso da altre sfumature, verranno eliminati anche i dati della mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12859">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12860">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12861">**gradient:** puntatore al blocco di controllo sfumatura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12861">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12862">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12862">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12863">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradiente eliminato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12863">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12864">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12864">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12865">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore sfumatura non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12865">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12866">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12866">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12867">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12867">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12868">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12868">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

/* Delete previously created gradient. */
status = gx_utility_gradient_delete(&gradient);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS, the gradient has been deleted. */
```
