## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12886">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12886">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12887">Convertire long integer in ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12887">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12888">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12888">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12889">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12889">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12890">Questo servizio converte un long integer in una stringa ASCII.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12890">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12891">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12892">**value**: valore intero lungo da convertire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12892">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12893">**return_buffer:** Buffer di destinazione per la stringa ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12893">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12894">**return_buffer_size**: Dimensioni del buffer di destinazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12894">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12895">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12895">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12896">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Conversione di un valore intero in stringa completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12896">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12897">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore al buffer restituito non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12897">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12898">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Dimensioni del buffer restituito non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12898">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12899">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12899">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12900">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12900">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12901">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12901">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12917">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12917">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12918">Coseno dell'arco di calcolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12918">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12919">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12919">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12920">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12920">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12921">Questo servizio calcola il valore dell'angolo dell'arco coseno x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12921">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12922">Il valore di input è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12922">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12923">Ad esempio, se si vuole calcolare l'arco coseno di 0,5, eseguire l'input come GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12923">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12924">In GUIX versione 5.4.0 o versione minore, il tipo di valore di input di questa funzione è INT e il valore è limitato all'intervallo [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12924">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12925">L'applicazione deve ridimensionare il valore dall'intervallo [-1, 1] all'intervallo [-256, 256] prima di richiamare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12925">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12926">Se il progetto con versione GUIX uguale o precedente alla 5.4.0 fa riferimento a questa API e si vuole aggiornare il progetto con la libreria guix più recente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12926">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12927">Sono disponibili due opzioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12927">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12928">Correggere il valore di input di questa chiamata API per usare GX_FIXED_VAL valore del tipo di dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12928">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12929">Definire GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12929">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12930">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12930">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12931">**x**: valore di cui viene calcolato l'arcoseno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12931">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12932">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12932">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12933">**angle:** valore dell'angolo dell'arcoseno x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12933">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12934">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12934">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12935">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12935">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12936">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12936">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12954">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12954">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12955">Seno dell'arco di calcolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12955">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12956">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12956">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12957">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12957">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12958">Questo servizio calcola il valore dell'angolo del seno dell'arco x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12958">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12959">Il valore di input è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12959">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12960">Ad esempio, se si vuole calcolare il sin arco di 0,5, eseguire l'input come GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12960">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12961">In GUIX versione 5.4.0 o versione minore, il tipo di valore di input di questa funzione è INT e il valore è limitato all'intervallo [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12961">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12962">L'applicazione deve ridimensionare il valore dall'intervallo [-1, 1] all'intervallo [-256, 256] prima di richiamare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12962">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12963">Se il progetto con versione GUIX è uguale o minore di 5.4.0 e si vuole aggiornare il progetto con la libreria guix più recente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12963">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12964">Sono disponibili due opzioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12964">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12965">Correggere il valore di input di questa chiamata API per usare GX_FIXED_VAL valore del tipo di dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12965">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12966">Definire GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12966">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12967">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12967">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12968">**x**: valore di cui viene calcolato il seno dell'arco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12968">**x**: Value whose arc sine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12969">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12969">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12970">**angle:** valore angolare del seno dell'arco x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12970">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12971">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12971">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12972">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12972">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12973">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12973">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12991">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12991">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12992">Coseno di calcolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12992">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12993">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12993">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12994">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12994">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12995">Questo servizio calcola il coseno dell'angolo fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12995">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12996">Il valore di input è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa. Chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12996">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12997">Ad esempio, se si vuole calcolare il coseno di 90 gradi, eseguire l'input GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12997">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12998">Il valore restituito è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa. Chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT per eseguire la conversione da GX_FIXED_VAL a INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12998">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-12999">Nella versione GUIX 5.4.0 o versione precedente il valore di input e il tipo di valore restituito di questo servizio sono INT, il valore di input e il valore restituito vengono ingranditi di 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-12999">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13000">Di conseguenza, l'applicazione deve ridimensionare il valore dell'angolo di 256 prima di richiamare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13000">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13001">Se il progetto con la versione GUIX è uguale o inferiore alla 5.4.0 e si vuole aggiornare il progetto con la libreria guix più recente, sono disponibili due opzioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13001">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13002">Correggere il valore di input e la gestione al valore restituito di questa chiamata API per usare GX_FIXED_VAL valore del tipo di data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13002">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13003">Definire GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13003">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13004">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13004">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13005">**angle:** angolo di calcolo del coseno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13005">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13006">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13006">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13007">**coseno:** coseno dell'angolo fornito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13007">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13008">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13008">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13009">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13009">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13010">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13010">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13028">gx_utility_math_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13028">gx_utility_math_sin</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13032">Questo servizio calcola il seno dell'angolo fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13032">This service computes the sine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13033">Il valore di input è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa. Chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13033">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13034">Ad esempio, se si vuole calcolare il seno di 90 gradi, eseguire l'input GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13034">For example, if you want to calculate the sine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13035">Il valore restituito è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa. Chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT per eseguire la conversione da GX_FIXED_VAL a INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13035">The return value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13036">Nella versione 5.4.0 o versione precedente GUIX il valore di input e il tipo di valore restituito sono INT, il valore di input e il valore restituito vengono ingranditi di 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13036">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13037">L'applicazione deve quindi ridimensionare il valore dell'angolo di 256 prima di richiamare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13037">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13038">Se il progetto con versione GUIX è uguale o inferiore alla 5.4.0 e si vuole aggiornare il progetto con la libreria guix più recente, sono disponibili due opzioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13038">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13039">Correggere il valore di input e la consegna al valore restituito di questa chiamata API per usare GX_FIXED_VAL valore del tipo di dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13039">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13092">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13092">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13093">Riordinare il testo BiDi nell'ordine di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13093">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13094">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13094">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13095">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13095">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13096">Questo servizio riordina il testo BiDi nell'ordine di visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13096">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13097">Se vengono specificati il tipo di carattere di disegno del testo e la larghezza di visualizzazione, l'interruzione di riga verrà applicata per prima, il processo di riordinamento verrà applicato in base a ogni riga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13097">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13098">Se il testo fornito contiene più paragrafi, il servizio suddividerà il testo in paragrafi, il risultato dell'interruzione di riga e del riordinamento di ogni paragrafo verrà collegato come elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13098">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13099">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13099">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13100">**input_info:** puntatore alle informazioni per l'interruzione di riga e il riordinamento del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13100">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13101">**resolved_info_head**: Puntatore all'elenco collegato che contiene i risultati di interruzione di riga e riordinamento di ogni paragrafo del testo fornito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13101">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13102">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13102">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13103">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Riordino del testo dell'offerta riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13103">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13104">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatori di input non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13104">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13105">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:** allocatore di memoria (0x30) non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13105">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13106">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13106">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13107">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13107">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13108">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13108">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13109">Disegnare testo bidi a riga singola nell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13109">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13110">Disegnare testo di offerte su più righe nell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13110">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13111">Disegnare testo a più paragrafi nell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13111">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13119">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13120">**resolved_info_head:** puntatore all'elenco di informazioni di testo BiDi risolto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13120">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the resolved BiDi text information list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13121">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13122">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Eliminazione del testo risolta correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13122">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful resolved text delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13123">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatori di input non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13123">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13124">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:** allocatore di memoria (0x30) non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13124">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13125">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13125">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13126">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13126">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13127">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13127">Example</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13130">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13130">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13131">Ridimensionare la mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13131">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13132">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13133">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13134">Questo servizio ridimensiona una mappa pixel e restituisce un puntatore a una nuova mappa pixel, che è il risultato del ridimensionamento della mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13134">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13135">Questo servizio richiede l'uso preventivo gx_system_memory_allocator_set, per consentire l'allocazione della memoria per contenere i dati della mappa pixel ridimensionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13135">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13136">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13137">**src:** puntatore alla mappa pixel da ridimensionare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13137">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13138">**destination:** buffer di destinazione per la mappa pixel risultante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13138">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13139">**width:** larghezza della mappa pixel risultante, in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13139">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13140">**height:** hieght della mappa pixel risultante, in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13140">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13141">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13141">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13142">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Ridimensionamento della mappa pixel riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13143">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore alla mappa pixel di origine o destinazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13143">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13144">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Valore di larghezza o altezza non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13144">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13145">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED:**(0x28) La mappa pixel di origine è in formato compresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13145">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13146">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Allocatore di memoria non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13146">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13147">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13148">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13148">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13149">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13149">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXLEMAP *des_pixelmap;

/* Resize “src_pixelmap” with specifiy width and height. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(src_pixelmap,
    &des_pixelmap, 100, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of resize. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13166">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13166">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13167">Ruotare una mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13167">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13168">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13169">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13170">Questo servizio ruota una mappa pixel e restituisce un puntatore a una nuova mappa pixel, che è il risultato della rotazione della mappa pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13170">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13171">Per ruotare una mappa pixel direttamente nell'area di disegno, usare gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13171">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13172">Questo servizio richiede l'uso preventivo gx_system_memory_allocator_set, per consentire l'allocazione della memoria per contenere i dati della mappa pixel ruotata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13172">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13173">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13173">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13174">**src:** mappa pixel da ruotare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13174">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13175">**angle:** angolo di rotazione in gradi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13175">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13176">**destination:** buffer di destinazione per la mappa pixel risultante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13176">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13177">**rot_cx:** recuperata la coordinata x del centro di rotazione rispetto alla mappa pixel di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13177">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13178">Deve essere avviata con la coordinata x del centro di rotazione rispetto alla mappa pixel di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13178">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13179">Se rot_cx è GX_NULL, il valore non verrà recuperato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13179">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13180">**rot_cy:** recuperata la coordinata y del centro di rotazione rispetto alla mappa pixel di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13180">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13181">Deve essere avviato con la coordinata y del centro di rotazione rispetto alla mappa pixel di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13181">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13182">Se rot_cy è GX_NULL, il valore non verrà recuperato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13182">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13183">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13184">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Rotazione riuscita della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13184">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13185">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore di origine o mappa pixel di destinazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13185">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13186">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Il valore di Angle è 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13186">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13187">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT:**(0x28) La mappa pixel di origine è in formato compresso, che non è supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13187">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13188">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Allocatore di memoria non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13188">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13189">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13189">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13190">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13190">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13191">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13191">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13210">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx,
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13211">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13212">Questo servizio ruota una mappa pixel di 90 gradi, 180 gradi o 270 gradi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13212">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13213">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13213">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13214">**src:** mappa pixel da ruotare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13214">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13215">**angle:** angolo di rotazione in gradi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13215">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13216">**destination:** buffer di destinazione per la mappa pixel risultante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13216">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13217">**rot_cx:** recuperata la coordinata x del centro di rotazione rispetto alla mappa pixel di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13217">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13218">Deve essere avviata con la coordinata x del centro di rotazione rispetto alla mappa pixel di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13218">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13219">Se rot_cx è GX_NULL, il valore non verrà recuperato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13219">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13220">**rot_cy:** recuperata la coordinata y del centro di rotazione rispetto alla mappa pixel di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13220">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13221">Deve essere avviato con la coordinata y del centro di rotazione rispetto alla mappa pixel di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13221">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13222">Se rot_cy è GX_NULL, il valore non verrà recuperato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13222">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13223">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13223">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13224">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Rotazione riuscita della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13224">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13225">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore di origine o mappa pixel di destinazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13225">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13226">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Il valore angolo è 0 o non è un angolo semplice come 90, 180, 270</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13226">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13227">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT:**(0x28) La mappa pixel di origine è in formato compresso, che non è supportata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13227">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13228">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:** allocatore di memoria (0x30) non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13228">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13229">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13230">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13230">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13231">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13231">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13247">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13247">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13248">Rettangolo centrale all'interno di un altro rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13248">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13249">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13249">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13250">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13250">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13251">Questo servizio centra il rettangolo all'interno di un altro rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13251">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13252">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13252">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13253">**rectangle:** rettangolo da centrare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13253">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13254">**within_rectangle: Rettangolo** da centrare all'interno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13254">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13255">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13255">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13256">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Correttamente centrato il rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13256">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13257">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore rettangolo di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13257">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13258">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Dimensioni del rettangolo non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13258">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13259">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13259">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13261">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13261">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13278">Trovare il centro del rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13278">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13279">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13280">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13281">Questo servizio trova il centro del rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13281">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13282">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13282">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13283">**rectangle**: Rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13283">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13284">**return_center:** Puntatore al punto centrale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13284">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13285">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13285">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13286">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Trovato il centro del rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13286">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Dimensioni del rettangolo non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13289">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13289">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13290">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13290">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13291">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13291">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13310">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13310">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13311">Questo servizio combina il primo e il secondo rettangolo nel primo rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13311">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13312">Il primo rettangolo viene espanso per includere il secondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13312">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13313">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13313">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13314">**first_rectangle:** primo rettangolo e rettangolo combinato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13314">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13315">**second_rectangle**: secondo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13315">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13316">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13317">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Combinato correttamente due rettangoli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13317">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13318">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13318">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13319">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13319">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13320">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13320">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13321">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13321">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13338">Confrontare due rettangoli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13338">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13339">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13339">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13340">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13340">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13341">Questo servizio confronta il primo e il secondo rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13341">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13342">Se sono uguali, viene restituito GX_TRUE valore .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13342">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13343">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13343">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13344">**first_rectangle:** Primo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13344">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13345">**second_rectangle:** Secondo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13345">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13346">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13347">**result:** GX_TRUE se i rettangoli sono uguali, in caso GX_FALSE viene restituito .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13347">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13348">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13348">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13349">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13349">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13350">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13350">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13366">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13366">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13367">Definire un rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13367">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13368">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13368">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13369">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13370">Questo servizio definisce un rettangolo come specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13370">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13371">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13371">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13372">**rectangle:** blocco di controllo Rectangle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13372">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13373">**left:** coordinata più a sinistra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13373">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13374">**top:** coordinata più in alto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13374">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13375">**right:** coordinata più a destra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13375">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13376">**bottom:** coordinata più in basso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13376">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13377">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13377">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13378">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Definito correttamente un rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13378">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13379">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore rettangolo non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13379">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Define “my_rect”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13398">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13398">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13399">Rilevare la sovrapposizione dei rettangoli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13399">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13400">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13401">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13402">Questo servizio rileva qualsiasi sovrapposizione dei rettangoli forniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13402">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13403">Se viene trovata una sovrapposizione, il servizio restituisce GX_TRUE e il rettangolo sovrapposto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13403">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13404">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13404">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13405">**first_rectangle:** Primo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13405">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13406">**second_rectangle:** Secondo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13406">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13407">**return_overlap_area:** Area rettangolare sovrapposta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13407">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13408">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13408">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13409">**result:** GX_TRUE se i rettangoli si sovrappongono; in caso contrario, GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13409">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13410">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13411">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13411">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13412">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13412">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13429">Rilevare se il punto si trova nel rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13429">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13430">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13431">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13432">Questo servizio rileva se il punto specificato si trova nel rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13432">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13433">Se il punto si trova nel rettangolo, il servizio restituisce GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13433">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13434">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13435">**rectangle**: Rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13435">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13436">**point**: Point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13436">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13437">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13438">**result**: GX_TRUE se point risiede nel rettangolo, in caso contrario GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13438">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13439">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13439">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13440">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13440">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13441">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13441">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13457">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13457">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13458">Rettangolo di crescita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13458">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13459">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13459">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13460">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13461">Questo servizio aumenta le dimensioni del rettangolo come specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13461">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13462">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13463">**rectangle:** puntatore al rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13463">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13464">**adjust:** quantità per regolare il rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13464">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13465">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13466">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Ridimensionato correttamente il rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13466">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13467">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore rettangolo di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13467">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13468">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13468">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13469">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13469">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13470">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13470">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13486">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13486">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13487">Rettangolo di spostamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13487">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13488">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13488">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13489">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13490">Questo servizio sposta il rettangolo in base ai valori specificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13490">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13491">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13491">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13492">**rectangle:** rettangolo da spostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13492">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13493">**x_shif**: Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13493">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13494">**y_shift:** Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13494">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13495">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13495">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13496">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Spostato correttamente il rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13496">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully shifted the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Puntatore rettangolo di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13498">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13498">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13499">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13499">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13500">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13500">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Shift “my_rectangle”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_shift(&my_rectangle, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” has been shifted. */
```
