## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13516">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13516">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13517">Eseguire il rendering della stringa in una mappa pixel di tipo alfamap a 8bpp (deprecata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13517">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13518">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13519">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13520">Questo servizio è stato deprecato a favore di gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13520">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13521">Questo servizio esegue il rendering di una stringa di testo in una mappa alfa, che è una forma speciale di pixelmap di 8bpp contenente solo valori alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13521">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13522">Questo servizio viene in genere usato insieme a gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw per disegnare testo ruotato nell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13522">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13523">Questo servizio calcola le dimensioni della memoria necessarie per la mappa alfa risultante e richiama la funzione gx_system_memory_allocator() definita dall'applicazione per allocare dinamicamente memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13523">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13524">L'applicazione deve chiamare gx_system_memory_allocator_set() a un certo punto, in genere durante l'avvio del programma, prima di usare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13524">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13525">Se una stringa di testo deve essere ruotata e disegnata nell'area di disegno una sola volta, il gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() viene fornito come alternativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13525">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13526">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() chiamerà gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate() e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() per eseguire il rendering del testo ruotato in un'unica operazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13526">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13527">Tuttavia, se lo stesso testo verrà disegnato più volte ruotato in diversi angoli, è più efficiente creare la mappa alfa una volta usando l'API gx_utility_string_to_alphmap, quindi ruotare la mappa alfa risultante più volte in base alle esigenze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13527">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13528">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13528">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13529">**text**: stringa di testo di cui eseguire il rendering in alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13529">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13530">**font:** tipo di carattere da utilizzare per il rendering del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13530">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13531">**return_map:** puntatore al GX_PIXELMAP da restituire al chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13531">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13532">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13532">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13533">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Il rendering di una stringa di testo in una mappa alfa è stato completato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13533">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13534">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntatore di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13534">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13535">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) L'allocazione di memoria/funzione gratuita non è definita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13535">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13536">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13536">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13537">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13537">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13538">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13538">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13539">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13539">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13548">Questo servizio calcola le dimensioni della memoria necessarie per la mappa alfa risultante e richiama la funzione gx_system_memory_allocator() definita dall'applicazione per allocare in modo dinamico la memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13548">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13549">L'applicazione deve chiamare gx_system_memory_allocator_set() a un certo punto, in genere durante l'avvio del programma, prima di usare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13549">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13564">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13564">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13604">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13604">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13605">Creare un elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13605">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13606">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13606">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13607">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13608">Questo servizio crea un elenco verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13608">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13609">GX_VERTICAL_LIST deriva da GX_WINDOW e supporta tutti i gx_window API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13609">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13610">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13611">**vertical_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13611">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13612">**name** Nome dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13612">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13613">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13613">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13614">**total_rows** Numero totale di righe nell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13614">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13615">**callback** Funzione che verrà chiamata dall'elenco verticale quando si scorre l'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13615">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13616">Il chiamante deve inizialmente creare un numero GX_WIDGET elementi figlio basati su per riempire le righe dell'elenco visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13616">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13617">Durante lo scorrimento dell'elenco, questa funzione viene chiamata per creare nuovamente gli elementi figlio dell'elenco corrispondenti all'indice dell'elenco fornito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13617">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13618">**style** Stile del widget della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13618">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13619">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13619">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13620">**vertical_list_id** ID definito dall'applicazione dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13620">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13621">**size** Dimensioni dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13621">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13622">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13622">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13623">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) L'elenco verticale è stato creato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13623">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13625">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13625">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13626">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13626">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13627">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13627">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13628">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Numero di righe non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13628">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of rows not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13629">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13629">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13630">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13630">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13631">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13631">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13632">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13632">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical list “my_list” with 20 rows. */
status = gx_vertical_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
                    20, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID,
                    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical list “my_list” has been created. */
```

```C
    INT index);
```

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13669">Questo servizio imposta l'indice iniziale per l'elenco verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13669">This service sets the starting index for the vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13692">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13692">Prototype</span></span>

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13713">gx_vertical_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13713">gx_vertical_list_selected_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-selected-entry-in-a-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13714">Assegnare la voce selezionata in un elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13714">Assign the selected entry in a vertical list</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_set(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13716">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13716">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13717">Questo servizio assegna la voce selezionata in un elenco verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13717">This service assigns the selected entry in a vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13718">Se necessario, l'elenco verticale scorrerà per rendere visibile la voce selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13718">If necessary, the vertical list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13719">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13719">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13720">**vertical_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13720">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13721">**index** Posizione basata sull'indice della nuova voce di elenco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13721">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13722">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13722">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13723">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente la voce dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13723">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13724">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Indice di input non trovato nell'elenco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13724">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Input index not found in list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13725">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13725">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13726">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13726">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13727">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget elenco verticale o voce di elenco non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13727">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Vertical list or list entry widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13728">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13728">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13729">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13729">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13730">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13730">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13739">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13739">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13740">Ottenere il widget selezionato dall'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13740">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13741">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13741">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13742">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13742">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13743">Questo servizio restituisce il widget selezionato dell'elenco verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13743">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13744">Si noti che se l'elenco contiene più righe rispetto ai widget figlio e il widget figlio selezionato è stato scorrendo dalla visualizzazione, questa funzione restituirà GX_NULL come puntatore GX_WIDGET, poiché il widget è stato riutilizzato per visualizzare una nuova voce di elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13744">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13745">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13745">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13746">**vertical_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13746">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13747">**return_list_entry** Destinazione per il widget per la voce dell'elenco di restituzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13747">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13748">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13748">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13749">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ottenere correttamente la voce di elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13749">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13750">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Il widget selezionato è stato scorrendo dalla visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13750">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13752">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13752">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13753">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13753">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13754">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13754">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13755">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13755">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

```C
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance,
    ULONG style);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13792">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13792">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13793">Questo servizio crea una barra di scorrimento verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13793">This service creates a vertical scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13794">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13794">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13796">**name** Nome della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13796">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13797">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13797">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13798">**aspetto** Aspetto del widget della barra di scorrimento verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13798">**appearance** Appearance of vertical scrollbar widget.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13799">**style** Stile della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13799">**style** Style of the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13800">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13800">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13802">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13802">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13804">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13804">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13805">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13805">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13806">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13806">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_vertical_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
                          “my_vertical_scrollbar”,
                          &my_parent, &scrollbar_appearance,
                          GX_STYLE_ENABLED);

```

## <a name="gx_widget_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13816">gx_widget_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13816">gx_widget_allocate</span></span>
### <a name="allocate-a-widget-control-block"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13817">Allocare un blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13817">Allocate a widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13818">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13818">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_allocate(
    GX_WIDGET **control_block,
    ULONG memsize);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13819">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13820">Questo servizio alloca dinamicamente un blocco di controllo widget chiamando la funzione di allocazione di memoria definita dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13820">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13821">Questo servizio viene usato principalmente dalle funzioni generate da GUIX Studio per allocare dinamicamente il blocco di controllo quando la proprietà "Allocazione dinamica" è selezionata nella visualizzazione delle proprietà di GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13821">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13822">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13822">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13823">**control_block** Puntatore al puntatore del blocco di controllo restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13823">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13824">**memsize** Controllare le dimensioni del blocco, in byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13824">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13825">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13825">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13826">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Riuscito allocazione widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13826">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13827">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** allocatore di memoria (0x30) non è definito o l'allocazione di memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13827">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13828">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13828">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13829">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Dimensioni della memoria non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13829">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Memory size not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13830">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13830">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13831">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13831">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13832">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13832">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button;

/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_allocate(&button, sizeof(GX_TEXT_BUTTON));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the button widget control block is allocated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13870">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13870">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13871">Collegare un widget al relativo elemento padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13871">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13872">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13872">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13873">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13873">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13874">Questo servizio collega il widget all'elemento padre specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13874">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13875">Se il widget è già collegato a un altro elemento padre, viene prima scollegato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13875">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13876">Se il widget è già collegato allo stesso elemento padre, la funzione non esegue alcuna operazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13876">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13877">Il widget diventa l'elemento figlio principale del relativo elemento padre in termini di ordinamento z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13877">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13878">Se i widget di pari livello si sovrappongono, questo widget viene disegnato sopra gli elementi di pari livello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13878">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13879">Per inserire il nuovo widget nella parte posteriore dell'ordine z, usare gx_widget_back_attach o gx_widget_back_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13879">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13880">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13880">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13881">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13881">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13882">**widget** Puntatore al widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13882">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13883">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13883">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Collegamento widget riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13887">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Padre o widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13887">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13888">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13888">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13889">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13889">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13890">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13890">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13891">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13891">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13928">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13928">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13929">Disegnare uno sfondo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13929">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13930">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13931">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13932">Questo servizio esegue un riempimento a tinta unita dello sfondo di un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13932">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13933">Questo servizio viene chiamato automaticamente dalla funzione gx_widget_draw, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione come parte di una funzione di disegno di widget personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13933">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13934">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13935">**widget** Puntatore al widget da disegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13935">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13936">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13937">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13938">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13939">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13939">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13940">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13978">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13978">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13979">Collegare un widget al relativo elemento padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13979">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13980">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13980">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13981">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13981">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13982">Questo servizio collega il widget all'elemento padre specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13982">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13983">Se il widget è già collegato a un altro elemento padre, viene prima scollegato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13983">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13984">Se il widget è già collegato allo stesso elemento padre, la funzione non esegue alcuna operazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13984">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13985">Il widget diventa l'elemento figlio più indietro del padre in termini di ordinamento z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13985">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13986">Se i widget di pari livello si sovrappongono, questo widget viene disegnato dietro tali widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13986">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13987">Per inserire il nuovo widget all'inizio dell'ordine z, usare gx_widget_attach o gx_widget_front_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13987">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13988">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13989">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13989">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13990">**widget** Puntatore al widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13990">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13991">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13991">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13992">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Collegamento widget riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13992">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13993">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13993">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13994">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13994">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13995">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Padre o widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13995">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13996">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13996">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13997">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13997">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-13998">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-13998">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_back_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14036">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14036">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14037">Spostare il widget in avanti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14037">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14038">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14039">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14040">Questo servizio sposta il widget di nuovo nell'ordine Z dei widget figlio dell'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14040">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14041">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14041">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14042">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14042">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14043">**return_widget_moved** Puntatore alla destinazione per il flag che indica che il widget è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14043">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14044">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14044">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Il widget Successful (Operazione riuscita) viene spostato in avanti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14046">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14046">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14047">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14047">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14048">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Non vengono applicate modifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14048">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) No changes are applied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14049">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14049">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14050">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14051">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14052">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14052">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move “my_widget” to the back. */
status = gx_widget_back_move(&my_widget, &moved_flag);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “moved_flag” is GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” was moved to the back. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14089">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14089">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14090">Spostare un blocco rettangolare di pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14090">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14091">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14091">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14092">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14092">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14093">Questo servizio sposta un blocco rettangolare di pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14093">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14094">Questo servizio viene spesso usato per implementare lo scorrimento rapido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14094">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14095">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14095">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14096">**widget** Puntatore al widget che richiede lo spostamento del blocco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14096">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14097">**blocco** Blocco di delimitazione del rettangolo da spostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14097">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14098">**xshift** Quantità di spostamento x in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14098">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14099">**yshift** Quantità di spostamento y in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14099">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14100">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14100">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14101">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostamento riuscito del widget sul retro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14101">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14102">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Canvas widget non trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14102">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14103">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14103">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14104">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14104">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14105">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14105">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14106">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14106">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14107">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14107">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14108">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14108">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move a block of pixels 20 pixels to the right. */
status = gx_widget_block_move(&my_widget, &size, 20, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the block of pixels was moved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14145">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14145">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14146">Disegnare il bordo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14146">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14147">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14147">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14148">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14148">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14149">Questo servizio disegna il bordo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14149">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14150">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato come parte di una funzione di disegno del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14150">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14151">Questo servizio interpreta i flag di stile del bordo del widget per non disegnare alcun bordo, un bordo sottile, un bordo in rilievo, un bordo incassato o un bordo spesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14151">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14152">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14152">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14153">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14153">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14154">**border_color** Colore del bordo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14154">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14155">**L'appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14155">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14156">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14156">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14157">**upper_fill** Colore del riempimento superiore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14157">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14158">**L'appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14158">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14159">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14159">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14160">**lower_fill** Colore del riempimento inferiore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14160">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14161">**L'appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14161">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14162">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14162">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14163">**fill** Questo flag booleano indica se l'area del widget deve essere riempita con i colori di riempimento forniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14163">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14164">Se questo valore è GX_FALSE, viene disegnato solo il bordo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14164">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14165">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14165">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14166">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14166">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14167">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14167">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14168">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14168">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14169">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14169">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14206">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14206">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14207">Impostare lo stile del bordo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14207">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14208">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14208">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14209">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14209">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14210">Questo servizio imposta lo stile del bordo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14210">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14211">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14211">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14212">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14212">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14213">**style** Stile del bordo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14213">**style** Style of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14214">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14214">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14215">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14215">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14216">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correttamente impostato lo stile del bordo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14216">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget border style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14217">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14217">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14218">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14218">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14219">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14219">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14220">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14220">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14221">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14221">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14222">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14222">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set border style of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_style_set(&my_widget,
                                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” border style has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14259">gx_widget_border_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14259">gx_widget_border_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-border-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14260">Ottenere lo spessore del bordo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14260">Get widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14261">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14261">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14262">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14263">Questo servizio ottiene lo spessore del bordo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14263">This service gets the widget border width.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14264">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14265">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14265">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14266">**return_width** Puntatore alla destinazione per lo spessore del bordo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14266">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14267">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14267">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) È stato recuperato correttamente lo spessore del bordo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved border width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14271">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14272">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14272">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14273">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14273">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_width;

/* Get border width of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_width_get(&my_widget, &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_width” contains the border width of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14310">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14310">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14311">Ottenere l'area di disegno del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14311">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14312">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14312">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14313">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14314">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore all'area di disegno in cui viene eseguito il rendering del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14314">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14315">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14316">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14316">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14317">**return_canvas** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'area di disegno del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14317">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14318">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14318">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14319">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Operazione riuscita nell'area di disegno del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14319">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14320">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Area di disegno widget non trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14320">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14323">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14324">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14324">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14325">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get canvas associated with “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_canvas_get(&my_widget, &my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_canvas” contains the canvas of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_child_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14363">gx_widget_child_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14363">gx_widget_child_detect</span></span>
### <a name="detect-widget-child"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14364">Rilevare l'elemento figlio del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14364">Detect widget child</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14365">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_child_detect(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *child,
    GX_BOOL *return_detect);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14366">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14367">Questo servizio rileva se il widget è un elemento figlio del widget padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14367">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14368">Questo servizio annida per cercare gli elementi figlio degli elementi figlio e restituisce TRUE se il widget padre è a qualsiasi livello un predecessore del widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14368">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14369">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14370">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14370">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14371">**child** Puntatore al widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14371">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14372">**return_detect** Puntatore alla destinazione per il rilevamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14372">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14373">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14373">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14374">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Rilevamento figlio del widget riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14374">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget padre o figlio non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14377">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14377">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14378">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14378">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14379">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14379">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14416">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14416">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14417">Disegnare elementi figlio del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14417">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14418">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14419">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14420">Questo servizio disegna tutti gli elementi figlio del widget padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14420">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14421">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato da tutte le funzioni di disegno di widget standard per disegnare tutti i widget figlio esistenti e deve essere richiamato da qualsiasi funzione di disegno personalizzata per consentire l'associazione di widget figlio al tipo di widget padre personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14421">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14422">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14423">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14423">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14424">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14424">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14425">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14425">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14426">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14427">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14427">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14428">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14428">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14465">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14465">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14466">Ottenere l'area client del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14466">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14467">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14467">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14468">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14469">Questo servizio calcola l'area client del widget sottraendo la larghezza del bordo del widget dalle dimensioni complessive del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14469">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14470">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14470">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14471">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14471">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14472">**border_width** Larghezza del bordo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14472">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14473">**return_client_area** Destinazione per la restituzione dell'area client</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14473">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14474">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14474">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14475">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Operazione riuscita dell'area client del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14475">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14476">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14476">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14477">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14477">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14478">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Il bordo del widget non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14478">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14479">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14479">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14480">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14480">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14481">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14481">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE client_area
/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_client_get(&my_widget, my_widget_width,
                              &client_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “client_area” is the client area of “my_widget”. */
```
