## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14518">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14518">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14519">Ottenere il colore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14519">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14520">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14520">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14521">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14522">Questo servizio ottiene il colore associato all'ID risorsa fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14522">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14523">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato solo dai widget visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14523">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14524">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14525">**widget** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14525">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14526">**resource_id** ID risorsa di colore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14526">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14527">**L'appendice B** contiene ID risorsa a colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14527">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14528">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa a colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14528">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14529">**return_color** Puntatore alla destinazione per il colore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14529">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14530">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14530">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14531">Si noti che anche l'applicazione può aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14531">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14532">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14532">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14533">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14533">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14534">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14534">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14535">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Area di disegno widget non valida o widget invisibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14535">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14536">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14536">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14537">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14537">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14538">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14538">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14539">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14539">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14540">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14540">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14544">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14544">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14545">Creare un widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14545">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14546">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14546">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14547">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14547">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14548">Questo servizio crea un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14548">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14549">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14549">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14550">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14550">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14551">**name** Nome logico del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14551">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14552">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14552">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14553">**style** Stile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14553">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14554">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14554">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14566">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14566">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_created_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14603">gx_widget_created_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14603">gx_widget_created_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-if-widget-created"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14604">Verificare se il widget è stato creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14604">Test if widget created</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14605">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14605">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_created_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14606">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14606">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14607">Questo servizio verifica se il widget è stato creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14607">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14608">Se non vengono rilevati errori, questa funzione restituisce GX_SUCCESS, indipendentemente dal fatto che il widget sia ancora stato creato o meno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14608">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14609">Il risultato del test si trova nel puntatore return_test test.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14609">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14610">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14611">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14611">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14612">**return_test** Destinazione per il risultato del test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14612">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14613">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14613">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Completamento test riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful test completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14615">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14615">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14616">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14616">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14617">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14617">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14618">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14618">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */
status = gx_widget_created_test(&my_widget, &was_created);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14655">gx_widget_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14655">gx_widget_delete</span></span>
### <a name="delete-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14656">Eliminare un widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14656">Delete widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14657">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14657">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_delete(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14658">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14658">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14659">Questo servizio elimina il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14659">This service deletes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14660">Se il blocco di controllo widget viene allocato dinamicamente, il gx_system_memory_free viene richiamato per liberare l'archiviazione allocata dinamicamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14660">If the widget control block is dynamically allocated, the gx_system_memory_free service is invoked to free dynamically allocated storage.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14707">gx_widget_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14707">gx_widget_detach</span></span>
### <a name="detach-widget-from-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14708">Scollegare un widget dall'elemento padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14708">Detach widget from parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14709">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14709">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_detach(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14710">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14710">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14711">Questo servizio scollega il widget dal relativo elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14711">This service detaches the widget from its parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14712">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14712">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14716">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14716">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14717">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14717">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14719">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14719">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Detach widget “my_widget” from its parent. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been detached. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14757">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14757">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14758">Widget di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14758">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14759">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14760">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14761">Questo servizio disegna il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14761">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14762">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento dell'area di disegno GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14762">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14763">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14763">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14764">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14764">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14765">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14765">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14766">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14766">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14767">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14767">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14768">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14768">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14769">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14769">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14806">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14806">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14807">Assegnare la funzione di disegno del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14807">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14808">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14809">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14810">Questo servizio esegue l'override della funzione di disegno predefinita del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14810">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14811">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14812">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14812">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14813">**drawing_function** Puntatore alla funzione di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14813">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14814">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14814">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Riuscito l'override della funzione di disegno del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14819">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14820">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14821">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14821">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14858">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14858">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14859">Generare un evento widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14859">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14860">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14860">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14861">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14862">Questo servizio genera un GX_SIGNAL di evento, che è un tipo o una classe specifica di GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14862">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14863">gx_widget_event_generate() codifica l'ID widget a 16 bit, insieme all'oggetto passato event_type, in un singolo valore GX_EVENT.gx_event_type a 32 bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14863">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14864">Il parametro value viene codificato nell'oggetto gx_event.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14864">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14865">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14865">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14866">Il campo event.gx_event_target viene sempre caricato con l'elemento padre del widget chiamante, ovvero l'evento generato viene sempre inviato per primo all'elemento padre del widget di generazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14866">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14867">Si noti che gx_widget_event_generate deve essere usato solo per inviare GX_SIGNAL di eventi di intervallo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14867">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14868">Per tutti gli altri tipi di evento, inclusi i tipi di evento definiti dall'utente, usare l'API gx_system_event_send(), che concede il controllo completo su ogni campo dell'evento inserito nella coda di eventi GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14868">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14869">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14869">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14870">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14870">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14871">**event_type** Tipo di evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14871">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14872">**L'appendice E** contiene eventi GUIX predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14872">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14873">Altri eventi possono essere aggiunti dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14873">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14874">**value** Informazioni aggiuntive sull'evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14874">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14875">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14875">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14876">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Generazione di eventi widget riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14876">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14920">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14920">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14921">Evento del widget Di elaborazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14921">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14922">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14922">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14923">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14924">Si tratta della funzione di elaborazione degli eventi predefinita per tutti i widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14924">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14925">Quando viene scritta una funzione di elaborazione eventi personalizzata, l'azione predefinita per qualsiasi tipo di evento deve sempre essere passare l'evento al tipo di widget su cui si basa un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14925">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14926">I widget basati sul passaggio più semplice GX_WIDGET tipo usano gx_widget_event_process come funzione di elaborazione degli eventi predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14926">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14927">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14927">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14928">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14928">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14929">**evento** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14929">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14930">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14930">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Elaborazione degli eventi del widget completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14935">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14936">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14936">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14937">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process(&my_widget, &my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14974">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14974">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14975">Impostare la funzione di elaborazione degli eventi del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14975">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14976">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14977">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14978">Questo servizio esegue l'override della funzione di elaborazione degli eventi del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14978">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14979">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14979">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14980">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14980">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14981">**event_processing** Puntatore alla nuova funzione di elaborazione degli eventi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14981">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14982">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14982">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14983">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Override di elaborazione eventi widget riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14983">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14984">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14984">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14985">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14985">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14986">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14986">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14987">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14987">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-14988">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-14988">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_to_parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15025">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15025">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span></span>
### <a name="send-event-to-widgets-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15026">Inviare l'evento all'elemento padre del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15026">Send event to widget’s parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15027">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15027">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15028">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15028">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15029">Questo servizio invia un evento all'elemento padre del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15029">This service sends an event to the widget’s parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15030">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15030">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15031">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15031">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15032">**evento** Puntatore all'evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15032">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15033">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15033">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15034">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) L'evento è stato inviato correttamente all'elemento padre del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15034">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sent event to widget’s parent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15035">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15035">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15036">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15036">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15037">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15037">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15038">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15038">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15039">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15039">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send my_event to the widget’s parent */
status = gx_widget_event_to_parent(&my_widget, my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been delivered to the parent of my_widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15076">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15076">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15077">Impostare il colore di sfondo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15077">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15078">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15078">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15079">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15079">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15080">Questo servizio imposta i colori di sfondo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15080">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15081">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15082">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15082">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15083">**normal_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento nello stato normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15083">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15084">**L'Appendice A** contiene id risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15084">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15085">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15085">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15086">**selected_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15086">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15087">**L'Appendice A** contiene id risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15087">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15088">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15088">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15089">**disabled_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento quando lo stile GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15089">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15090">**L'Appendice A** contiene id risorsa di colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15090">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15091">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID risorsa colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15091">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15092">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15092">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostare correttamente il colore di riempimento del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15094">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15094">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15095">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15095">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15136">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15136">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15137">Trovare il widget figlio del widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15137">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15138">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15139">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15140">Questo servizio cerca nei figli dell'elemento padre specificato un widget con il valore ID richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15140">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15141">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15141">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15142">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre da cui viene avviata la ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15142">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15143">**widget_id** ID widget da cercare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15143">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15144">**search_depth** Definisce il livello di annidamento ricorsivo in cui la funzione ricercherà i widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15144">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15145">Se questo valore è <= 0, vengono cercati solo gli elementi figlio immediati del widget padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15145">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15146">Se questo valore è GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, tutti gli elementi figlio di tutti i widget figlio vengono cercati in modo esaustivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15146">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15147">Per qualsiasi altro valore > 0, questo valore limita il livello di annidato che questa funzione ricercherà nei widget figlio cercando l'ID del widget richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15147">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15148">**return_widget** Puntatore alla destinazione per il widget trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15148">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15149">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15149">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15150">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Trovato widget riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15150">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15151">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15151">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15152">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15152">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15153">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15153">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15154">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15154">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15155">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15155">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15156">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15156">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15193">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15193">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15194">Restituire il puntatore al primo widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15194">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15195">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15195">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15196">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15196">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15197">GUIX gestisce un elenco strutturato ad albero di widget padre e figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15197">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15198">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore al primo widget figlio dell'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15198">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15199">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15199">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15200">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15200">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15201">**widget_return** Puntatore per restituire il puntatore del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15201">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15202">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15202">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15203">**GX_SUCCESS** puntatore (0x00) restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15203">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15204">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15204">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15205">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15205">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15206">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15206">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15207">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15207">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15208">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15208">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15215">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15215">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15218">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15218">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15219">Questo servizio sposta lo stato attivo sul widget di pari livello successivo nell'elenco collegato di widget che accettano lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15219">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15220">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15220">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15222">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15222">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15223">**GX_SUCCESS** stato attivo (0x00) è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15223">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15224">**GX_FAILURE** stato attivo (0x00) non è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15224">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15225">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15225">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15227">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15227">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15228">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15228">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15229">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15229">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15230">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15230">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15248">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15248">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15249">Ottiene il tipo di carattere per l'ID risorsa specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15249">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15250">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15250">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15251">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15251">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15252">Questo servizio recupera il tipo di carattere associato all'ID risorsa specificato dalla tabella dei tipi di carattere dello schermo in cui è visibile questo widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15252">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15253">Questa funzione deve essere chiamata solo da un widget visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15253">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15254">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15255">**widget** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15255">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15256">**resource_id** ID risorsa del tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15256">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15257">**return_font** Puntatore alla destinazione per il puntatore del tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15257">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15258">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15258">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15259">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Il tipo di carattere è stato recuperato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15259">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15260">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15260">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15261">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) L'area di disegno del widget non è valida o il widget non è visibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15261">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15262">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15262">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15263">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15263">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15264">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15264">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15265">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15265">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15266">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15266">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15267">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15267">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15270">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15270">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15271">Rilasciare la memoria associata a un widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15271">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15272">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15272">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15273">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15274">Questo servizio rilascia la memoria associata a un blocco di controllo widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15274">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15275">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15275">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15276">**widget** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15276">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15277">**resource_id** ID risorsa del tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15277">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15278">**return_font** Puntatore alla destinazione per il puntatore del tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15278">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15279">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15279">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15280">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Il widget È stato liberato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15280">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15281">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) La funzione memory free non è definita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15281">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15282">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15282">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15283">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15284">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15284">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15285">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15285">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15322">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15322">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15323">Spostare il widget in primo piano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15323">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15324">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15324">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15325">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15325">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15326">Questo servizio sposta il widget in primo piano nell'elenco padre in ordine Z dei widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15326">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15327">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15328">**widget** Puntatore al widget da spostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15328">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15329">**return_moved** Il puntatore alla destinazione per il widget di indicazione è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15329">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15330">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15330">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15331">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostamento in primo piano del widget Riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15331">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15333">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) già in primo piano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15333">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15334">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15334">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15335">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15335">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15336">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15336">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15337">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15337">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15338">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15338">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15375">gx_widget_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15375">gx_widget_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15376">Ottenere l'altezza del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15376">Get widget height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15377">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15377">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15378">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15378">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15379">Questo servizio ottiene l'altezza del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15379">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15380">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15381">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15381">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15382">**return_height** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'altezza del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15382">**return_height** Pointer to destination for widget height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15383">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15383">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15385">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15385">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15386">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15386">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15388">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15388">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15389">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15389">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15390">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15390">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE widget_height;

/* Get height for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_height_get(&my_widget, &widget_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the height of the widget is contained in
“widget_height” . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15427">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15427">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15428">Nascondi widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15428">Hide widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15429">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15429">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_hide(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15430">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15430">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15431">Questo servizio nasconde il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15431">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15432">Questo widget è ancora collegato all'elemento padre, ma non è autorizzato a disegnare nell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15432">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15433">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15433">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15434">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15434">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15435">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Nascondi il widget Operazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15440">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15441">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15442">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15442">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Hide widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_hide(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is hidden. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15479">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15479">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15480">Restituire il puntatore all'ultimo widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15480">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15481">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15481">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15482">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15482">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15483">GUIX gestisce un elenco strutturato ad albero di widget padre e figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15483">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15484">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore all'ultimo widget figlio dell'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15484">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15485">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15485">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15486">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15486">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15487">**widget_return** Puntatore per restituire il puntatore del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15487">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15488">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15488">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15489">**GX_SUCCESS** puntatore (0x00) restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15490">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15490">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15492">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15492">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15493">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15493">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15494">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15494">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_next_sibling_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15501">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15501">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-next-sibling-of-current-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15502">Restituisce il puntatore al successivo elemento di pari livello del widget corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15502">Return pointer to next sibling of current widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15503">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15503">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_next_sibling_get(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15504">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15504">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15505">GUIX gestisce un elenco strutturato ad albero di widget padre e figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15505">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15506">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore al successivo elemento di pari livello del widget corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15506">This service returns a pointer to the next sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15507">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15507">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15508">**current** Puntatore al widget corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15508">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15509">**widget_return** Puntatore per restituire il puntatore del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15509">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15510">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15510">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15511">**GX_SUCCESS** puntatore (0x00) restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15512">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15512">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15514">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15514">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15515">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15515">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15516">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15516">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve next sibling widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_next(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_next_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```
