## <a name="gx_widget_parent_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15523">gx_widget_parent_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15523">gx_widget_parent_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-parent-of-current-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15524">Restituisce il puntatore all'elemento padre del widget corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15524">Return pointer to parent of current widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15525">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15525">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_parent_get(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15526">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15526">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15527">GUIX gestisce un elenco strutturato ad albero di widget padre e figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15527">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15528">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore all'elemento padre del widget corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15528">This service returns a pointer to the parent of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15529">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15529">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15530">**current** Puntatore al widget corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15530">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15531">**widget_return** Puntatore per restituire il puntatore del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15531">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15532">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15532">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15533">**GX_SUCCESS** puntatore (0x00) restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15533">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15535">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15535">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15536">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15536">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15537">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15537">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15538">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15538">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve parent widget */

GX_WIDGET *get_parent(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *parent;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_parent_get(current, &parent);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return parent;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15545">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15545">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-pixelmap"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15546">Ottenere una mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15546">Get pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15547">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15547">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_pixelmap_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15548">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15548">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15549">Questo servizio ottiene la mappa pixel associata all'ID risorsa fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15549">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15550">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato solo per i widget visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15550">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15551">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15551">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15552">**widget** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15552">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15553">**pixelmap_id** ID risorsa pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15553">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15554">**return_pixelmap** Puntatore al puntatore di destinazione della mappa pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15554">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15555">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15555">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15556">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ottenere una mappa pixel riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15556">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15557">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15557">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15558">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) L'area di disegno del widget non è valida o il widget non è visibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15558">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15561">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15561">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15562">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15562">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15563">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15563">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15589">gx_widget_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15589">gx_widget_resize</span></span>
### <a name="resize-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15590">Ridimensionare il widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15590">Resize widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15591">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15591">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_resize(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *new_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15592">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15592">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15593">Questo servizio ridimensiona il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15593">This service resizes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15594">Se il widget è visibile, viene automaticamente invalidato e accodato per il ridisegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15594">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15595">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15595">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15596">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15596">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15597">**new_size** Nuove dimensioni del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15597">**new_size** New widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15598">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15598">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15599">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ridimensionamento del widget riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15599">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15600">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15600">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15601">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15601">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15602">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15602">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15603">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15604">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15604">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15605">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15605">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE new_size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&new_size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Resize widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_resize(&my_widget, &new_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been resized. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15642">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15642">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15643">Widget Maiusc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15643">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15644">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15644">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15645">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15645">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15646">Questo servizio sposta il widget e facoltativamente lo contrassegna come dirty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15646">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15647">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15647">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15648">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15648">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15649">**x_shift** Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15649">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15650">**y_shift** Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15650">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15651">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE per indicare dirty, in caso contrario GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15651">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15652">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15652">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Spostamento del widget GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15655">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15655">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15656">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15656">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15657">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15657">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15658">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15658">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15695">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15695">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15696">Mostra widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15696">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15697">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15697">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15698">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15698">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15699">Questo servizio mostra il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15699">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15700">Il widget diventerà visibile solo se è collegato a un elemento padre e anche il widget padre è visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15700">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15701">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15701">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15702">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15702">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15703">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15703">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Visualizzazione del widget Completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15708">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15709">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15709">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15710">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15710">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Show widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_show(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shown. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15747">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15747">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15748">Aggiungere lo stato del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15748">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15749">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15749">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15750">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15750">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15751">Questo servizio aggiunge qualsiasi combinazione di flag di stato al widget specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15751">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15752">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15752">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15753">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15753">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15754">**stato** Stato da aggiungere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15754">**status** Status to add</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15755">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15755">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15756">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Aggiunta stato widget riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15756">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15757">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15757">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15758">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15758">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15759">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15759">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15760">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15760">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15761">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15761">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add status to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_add(&my_widget, status_to_add);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15798">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15798">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15799">Ottenere lo stato del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15799">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15800">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15801">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15802">Questo servizio recupera i flag di stato dal widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15802">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15803">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15804">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15804">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15805">**return_status** Puntatore allo stato restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15805">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15806">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15806">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15807">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Stato del widget Operazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15807">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15808">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15808">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15809">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15809">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15810">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15810">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15811">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15811">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15812">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15812">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15848">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15848">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15849">Rimuovere lo stato del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15849">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15850">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15850">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15851">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15851">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15852">Questo servizio rimuove i flag di stato specificati dalla variabile di stato interna dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15852">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15854">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15854">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15855">**stato** Stato da rimuovere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15855">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15856">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15856">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15858">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15858">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15859">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15859">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15899">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15899">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15900">Stato del widget di test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15900">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15901">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15902">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15903">Questo servizio verifica i flag di stato del widget specificato e archivia il risultato nella memoria a cui punta "return_test".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15903">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15904">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15904">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15905">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15905">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15906">**stato** Stato da testare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15906">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15907">**return_status** Puntatore alla destinazione per il risultato del test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15907">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15908">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15908">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Test di stato del widget completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15910">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15910">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15911">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15911">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15912">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15912">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15913">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15913">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15914">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15914">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15923">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15923">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15924">Recuperare la stringa associata a un widget visibile e a un ID stringa (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15924">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15925">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15925">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15926">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15926">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15927">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15927">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15928">Questo servizio restituisce la voce della tabella di stringhe per il valore ID stringa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15928">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15929">Questo servizio è simile a gx_display_string_get, ma la visualizzazione attiva viene determinata automaticamente anziché passata dal chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15929">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15930">Questo servizio può essere usato solo per i widget visibili, ovvero la visualizzazione associata a questo widget è nota.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15930">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15931">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15932">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15932">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15933">**string_id** Valore ID stringa dall'intestazione resources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15933">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15934">**string** Indirizzo della variabile da restituire come stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15934">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15935">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15935">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Test di stato del widget riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15938">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15938">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15939">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15939">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15940">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15940">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15941">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15941">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_string_get(&my_widget, GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN,
      &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15948">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15948">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15949">Questo servizio restituisce la voce della tabella di stringhe per il valore ID stringa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15949">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15950">Questo servizio è simile a gx_display_string_get, ad eccezione del fatto che la visualizzazione attiva viene determinata automaticamente anziché essere passata dal chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15950">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15951">Questo servizio può essere usato solo per i widget visibili, ovvero la visualizzazione associata a questo widget è nota.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15951">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15952">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15952">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15953">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15953">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15954">**string_id** Valore ID stringa dall'intestazione resources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15954">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15955">**string** Indirizzo della variabile da restituire come stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15955">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15956">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15956">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15957">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Test di stato del widget completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15957">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15958">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15958">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15959">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15959">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15960">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15960">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15961">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15961">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15962">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15962">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */

status = gx_widget_string_get_ext(&my_widget,
                          GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15966">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15966">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15967">Aggiungere lo stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15967">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15968">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15968">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15969">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15969">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15970">Questo servizio aggiunge uno stile al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15970">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15971">Vengono inoltre eseguite le azioni seguenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15971">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15972">Se lo stile aggiunto è GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, verrà aggiunto GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15972">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15973">Se lo stile aggiunto è GX_STYLE_ENABLED, verrà aggiunto GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15973">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15974">Se il widget è visibile, viene invalidato automaticamente e accodato per il ridisegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15974">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15975">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15976">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15976">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15977">**style** Nuovo stile da aggiungere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15977">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15978">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15978">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15979">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15979">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15980">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Aggiunta dello stile del widget completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15980">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15982">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15982">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15983">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15983">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15984">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15984">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15985">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15985">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-15986">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-15986">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16023">gx_widget_style_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16023">gx_widget_style_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16024">Ottenere lo stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16024">Get widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16025">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16025">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16026">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16027">Questo servizio recupera il flag di stile dal widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16027">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16028">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16028">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16029">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16029">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16030">**return_style** Puntatore allo stile restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16030">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16031">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16031">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16032">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperato correttamente lo stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16032">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved widget style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16033">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16033">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16034">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16034">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16035">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16035">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16036">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16036">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16037">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16037">Initialization and threads</span></span>


### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16038">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16038">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve style from widget into “style”. */
status = gx_widget_style_get(&my_widget, &style);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16075">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16075">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16076">Rimuovere lo stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16076">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16077">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16078">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16079">Questo servizio rimuove uno stile dal widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16079">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16080">Vengono inoltre eseguite le azioni seguenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16080">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16081">Se lo stile rimosso è GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, lo stato GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT verrà rimosso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16081">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16082">Se lo stile rimosso è GX_STYLE_ENABLED, lo stato GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE verrà rimosso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16082">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16083">Se il widget è visibile, viene automaticamente invalidato e accodato per il ridisegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16083">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16084">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16084">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16085">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16085">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16086">**style** Stile da rimuovere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16086">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16087">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16087">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16088">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16088">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16089">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Rimozione dello stile del widget Operazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16089">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16090">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16090">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16091">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16091">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16092">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16092">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16093">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16093">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16094">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16094">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16095">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16095">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16132">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16132">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16133">Impostare lo stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16133">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16134">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16134">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16135">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16135">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16136">Questo servizio imposta uno stile per il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16136">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16137">Se lo stile impostato include GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, lo stato GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT verrà aggiunto. In caso contrario, lo stato verrà rimosso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16137">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16138">Se lo stile impostato include GX_STYLE_ENABLED, lo stato GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE verrà aggiunto. In caso contrario, lo stato verrà rimosso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16138">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16139">Se il widget è visibile, viene automaticamente invalidato e accodato per il ridisegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16139">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16140">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16140">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16141">**widget** Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16141">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16142">**style** Stile da impostare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16142">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16143">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16143">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16144">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16144">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16145">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16145">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16147">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16147">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16148">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16148">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16149">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16149">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16150">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16150">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16151">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16151">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT to the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_set(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” style is set to GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16299">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16299">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16300">Restituire il puntatore all'elemento figlio visibile che si trova all'inizio dell'ordine Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16300">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16301">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16302">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16303">GUIX gestisce un elenco strutturato ad albero di widget padre e figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16303">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16304">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore all'elemento figlio visibile in primo piano del widget corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16304">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16305">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16306">**current** Puntatore al widget corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16306">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16307">**widget_return** Puntatore per restituire il puntatore del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16307">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16308">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16308">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16309">**GX_SUCCESS** puntatore (0x00) restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16309">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16310">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16310">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16312">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16312">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16313">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16313">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16314">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16314">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16424">gx_window_client_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16424">gx_window_client_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16425">Ottenere l'altezza del client della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16425">Get window client height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16426">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16426">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16427">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16427">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16428">Questo servizio ottiene l'altezza client della finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16428">This service gets the client height of the window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16429">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16429">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16430">**finestra** Puntatore alla finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16430">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16431">**return_height** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'altezza del client</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16431">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16432">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16432">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client height get (Altezza client finestra riuscita)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16434">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16434">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16435">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16435">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16436">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16436">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE my_client_height;

/* Get client height of “my_window”. */

                                     &my_client_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window “my_window” client height is contained in “my_client_height”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16454">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16454">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>
### <a name="scroll-window-clients"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16455">Client della finestra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16455">Scroll window clients</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16456">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16456">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16457">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16458">Questo servizio scorre i client della finestra in base alla quantità specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16458">This service scrolls the window clients by the specified amount.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16459">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16459">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16460">**finestra** Puntatore alla finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16460">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16461">**x_scroll** Quantità di scorrimento sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16461">**x_scroll** Amount to scroll on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16462">**y_scroll** Quantità di scorrimento sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16462">**y_scroll** Amount to scroll on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16463">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16463">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16464">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Scorrimento client finestra riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16464">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client scroll</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16465">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16465">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16466">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16466">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16467">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16467">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16468">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) I valori di scorrimento non sono validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16468">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16469">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16469">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16470">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16470">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16471">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16471">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Scroll clients of “my_window”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the clients of window “my_window” have been scrolled. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16486">gx_window_client_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16486">gx_window_client_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16487">Ottenere la larghezza del client della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16487">Get window client width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16488">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16488">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_width_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16489">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16490">Questo servizio ottiene la larghezza del client della finestra specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16490">This service gets the client width of the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16491">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16491">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16492">**finestra** Puntatore alla finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16492">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16493">**return_height** Puntatore alla destinazione per la larghezza del client</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16493">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16494">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16494">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16495">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client width get (Larghezza client finestra riuscita)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16495">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16496">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16496">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16497">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16497">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16498">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16498">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16499">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16499">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16501">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16501">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_client_widthl

/* Get client width of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_width_get(&my_window, &my_client_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_client_width” contains the client width of window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16516">gx_window_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16516">gx_window_close</span></span>
### <a name="close-modal-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16517">Chiudere la finestra modale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16517">Close modal window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16518">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_close(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16519">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16520">Questo servizio forza la disconnessione di una finestra modale dal relativo elemento padre e la restituzione dal ciclo di esecuzione modale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16520">This service forces a modal window to detach from its parent and return from the modal execution loop.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16521">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16521">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16522">**finestra** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16522">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16523">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16523">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16524">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Finestra Chiusa correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16524">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully closed window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16525">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16525">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16526">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16526">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16527">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16527">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16528">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16528">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16529">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16529">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16530">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16530">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Close window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_close(&my_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been closed. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16546">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16546">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16547">Finestra Crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16547">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16548">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16549">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16550">Questo servizio crea una finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16550">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16551">GX_WINDOW deriva da GX_WIDGET e supporta tutti i gx_widget API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16551">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16552">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16552">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16553">**finestra** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16553">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16554">**name** Nome logico della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16554">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16555">**padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16555">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16556">**style** Stile della finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16556">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16557">**L'appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e stili specifici del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16557">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16558">**window_id** ID definito dall'applicazione della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16558">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16559">**size** Dimensioni della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16559">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16560">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16560">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16561">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creazione della finestra completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16561">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16562">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16562">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16563">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16563">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16564">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16564">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16565">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16565">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16566">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16566">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16567">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16567">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16568">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16568">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16569">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16569">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WINDOW my_window;

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16585">gx_window_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16585">gx_window_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16586">Finestra di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16586">Draw window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16587">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16587">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16588">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16588">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16589">Questo servizio disegna una finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16589">This service draws a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16590">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente durante l'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma può essere chiamato anche da funzioni di disegno di finestre personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16590">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom window drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16591">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16591">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16592">**finestra** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16592">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16593">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16593">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16594">**Nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16594">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16595">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16595">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16596">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16596">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16597">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16597">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom window draw function. */

VOID my_custom_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```
