## <a name="gx_window_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16613">gx_window_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16613">gx_window_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16614">Evento della finestra di elaborazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16614">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16615">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16615">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16616">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16616">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16617">Questo servizio elabora un evento per questa finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16617">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16618">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16618">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16619">**finestra** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16619">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16620">**evento** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16620">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16621">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16621">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16622">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Elaborazione degli eventi della finestra completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16622">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16625">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16625">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16626">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16626">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16627">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16627">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16628">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16628">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16644">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16644">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16645">Eseguire una finestra modale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16645">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16646">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16646">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16647">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16647">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16648">Questo servizio esegue una finestra come modale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16648">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16649">Qualsiasi input dell'utente (eventi penna e così via) all'esterno dell'area client della finestra verrà ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16649">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16650">Si noti che questa funzione entra in un ciclo di esecuzione di blocco continuo e non torna al chiamante fino al termine dell'esecuzione del modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16650">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16651">L'esecuzione modale termina quando l'elaborazione dell'evento per qualsiasi evento ricevuto restituisce un valore di stato diverso da zero o quando viene richiamata la gx_window_close'API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16651">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16652">Il codice restituito per l'elaborazione di eventi diverso da zero viene restituito al chiamante tramite il return_ptr passato a questa API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16652">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16653">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16653">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16654">**finestra** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16654">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16655">**return_ptr** Posizione in cui salvare lo stato di uscita dell'esecuzione modale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16655">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16656">Può essere GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16656">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16657">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16657">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Esecuzione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16659">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** L'evento di ritiro dalla coda di eventi non è riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16659">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16660">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16660">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16663">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16664">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16665">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Execute a modal window. */
status = gx_window_execute(&my_window, &return_code);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window was executed, and return_code holds the execution return code. */
```

### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16733">Evento di elaborazione per la finestra radice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16733">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16734">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16734">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16735">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16735">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16736">Questo servizio elabora gli eventi per la finestra radice specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16736">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16737">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16737">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16738">**root_window** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della finestra radice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16738">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16739">**event** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16739">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16740">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16740">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16741">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event (Elaborazione dell'evento della finestra radice completata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16741">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16742">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16742">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16743">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16743">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16744">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16744">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16745">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16745">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16746">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16746">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16793">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16793">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16794">Ottenere informazioni di scorrimento della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16794">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16795">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16795">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16796">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16796">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16797">Questo servizio ottiene le informazioni sullo scorrimento della finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16797">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16798">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16798">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16799">**finestra** Puntatore alla finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16799">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16800">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL o GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16800">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16801">**return_scroll_info** Puntatore alla destinazione per le informazioni di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16801">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16802">La finestra padre inizializza questa struttura per informare la barra di scorrimento delle dimensioni totali della finestra padre, dell'area visualizzabile e dell'incremento e dei limiti di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16802">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16803">L'implementazione predefinita usa l'area client di Windows come area visualizzabile e scorre in base ai pixel, ma l'implementazione personalizzata della finestra può usare i parametri di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16803">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16804">**L'appendice I** contiene la definizione della GX_SCROLL_INFO struttura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16804">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16805">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16805">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16806">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Informazioni di scorrimento della finestra riuscite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16806">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16807">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16807">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16808">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16808">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16809">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Tipo non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16809">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16810">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16810">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16811">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16811">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16812">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16812">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16828">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16828">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-window-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16829">Barra di scorrimento della finestra Trova</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16829">Find window scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16830">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16831">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16832">Questo servizio trova la barra di scorrimento per la finestra specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16832">This service finds the scrollbar for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16833">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16834">**finestra** Puntatore alla finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16834">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16835">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL o GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16835">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16836">**return_scrollbar** Puntatore alla destinazione per la barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16836">**return_scrollbar** Pointer to destination for scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16837">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16837">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16838">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ricerca riuscita della barra di scorrimento della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16838">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scrollbar find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16839">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Barra di scorrimento non trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16839">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16840">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16840">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16841">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16841">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16842">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Tipo non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16842">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16843">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16843">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16844">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16844">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16845">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16845">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Find horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scrollbar_find(&my_window,
                 GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &my_scrollbar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_scrollbar” contains the horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16861">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16861">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16862">Ottenere lo sfondo della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16862">Get window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16863">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16864">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16865">Questo servizio ottiene lo sfondo per la finestra specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16865">This service gets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16866">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16866">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16867">**finestra** Puntatore alla finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16867">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16868">**return_wallpaper_id** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'ID risorsa dello sfondo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16868">**return_wallpaper_id** Pointer to destination for resource ID of wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16869">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16869">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Operazione riuscita dello sfondo della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16871">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16871">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16872">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16872">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16873">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16873">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16874">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16874">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16875">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16875">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RESOURCE_ID my_window_wallpaper;

/* Get wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_get(&my_window, &my_window_wallpaper);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_window_wallpaper” contains the wallpaper resource ID for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16891">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16891">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16892">Impostare lo sfondo della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16892">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16893">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16894">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16895">Questo servizio imposta lo sfondo per la finestra specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16895">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16896">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16897">**finestra** Puntatore alla finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16897">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16898">**wallpaper_id** ID risorsa dello sfondo da usare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16898">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16899">**riquadro** Lo sfondo è affiancato se GX_TRUE; in caso contrario, lo sfondo non è affiancato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16899">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16900">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16900">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Impostazione dello sfondo della finestra riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16904">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16904">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16905">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16905">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16906">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16906">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5b18c-16907">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5b18c-16907">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
